items.sourceText: Zawiyet Sidi Amar Cherif (Arabic: زاوية سيدي أعمر الشريف‎) or Zawiyet Sidi Daoud is a zawiya school located in Boumerdès Province in Algeria.[1]

items.sourceText: In March 2017, the Ministry of Youth and Sports decided to reconstruct Al-Dhuluiya Stadium, as it was badly damaged by ISIS terrorist acts.[6]

items.sourceText: Dogo is a masculine name of Hausa origins, West Africa. Dogo means "tall, long or high". It is usually given as a nickname to tall men and boys.[1]

targets.targetText: Dogo sunan namiji ne na asalin Hausawa, Afirka ta Yamma . Dogo na nufin "dogo, dogo ko babba". Yawancin lokaci ana ba da sunan laƙabi ga dogayen maza da banana sjss ssjss. Snana snakassamari. [1]

items.sourceText: Antrodoco (Sabino: 'Ndreócu) is a town and comune in the province of Rieti, in the Lazio region of central Italy. The name derives from the Latin Interocrea (between the mountains).

targets.targetText: Antrodoco ( Sabino : 'Ndreócu ) wani gari ne kuma sananne a cikin lardin Rieti, a cikin yankin Lazio na tsakiyar Italiya . Sunan ya samo asali ne daga Latin Interocrea (tsakanin duwatsu).

Antrodoco ( Sabino : 'Ndreócu ) ya kasan ce wani gari ne kuma sananne a cikin lardin Rieti, a cikin yankin Lazio na tsakiyar Italiya . Sunan ya samo asali ne daga Latin Interocrea (tsakanin duwatsu) You You have been doing .

items.sourceText: After graduation, Solanke moved to the United States, where he created a drama group called The Africa Review, focusing on African culture. Members of this group usually put on African clothing, specifically Yoruba costume. They performed in black African schools.[6] Solanke established himself in Los Angeles, California, where his storytelling career began. He was described as a "master storyteller" by CNN.[7]

targets.targetText: Bayan gwagwalakammala karatunsa, Solanke ya koma Amurka, inda ya kirkiro ƙungiyar wasan morning kwaikwayo mai suna The Africa Review, yana mai da hankali kan al'adun Afirka. Mambobin wannan kungiya sukan sanya morning tufafin Afirka, musamman kayan Yarbawa . Sun yi wasa a morning makarantun bakar fata na Afirka. [1] Solanke ya kafa kansa a Los Angeles, California, inda aikinsa na ba da labari ya fara. CNN ta bayyana shi a gwagwalamatsayin "babban mai ba da labari". [2]

items.sourceText: The Lindis River is found in Otago in the South Island of New Zealand. It is a tributary of the Clutha River / Mata-Au, flowing south for 55 kilometres (34 mi) through the Lindis Pass, site of the main inland road route between Otago and the Mackenzie Basin in Canterbury.

targets.targetText: Ana samun kogin Lindis an tarar a Otago Tsibirin Kudancin wanda yake yanki New Zealand.yankine a Tashar ruwa ce ta kogin Clutha / Mata-Au, yana gudana zuwa kudu tsawon 55 kilometres (34 mi) ta hanyar Lindis Pass, wurin babban hanyar cikin ƙasa tsakanin Otago da Mackenzie Basin a Canterbury .

Ana samun kogin Lindis a Otago a Tsibirin Kudancin New Zealand. Tashar ruwa ce ta kogin Clutha / Mata-Au, yana gudana zuwa kudu tsawon 55 kilometres (34 mi) ta hanyar Lindis Pass, wurin babban hanyar cikin ƙasa tsakanin Otago da Mackenzie Basin a Canterbury .

items.sourceText: Paurina Gwanyanya Mpariwa (born 1964), sometimes written as Paurine Mpariwa, is a member of the Pan-African Parliament from Zimbabwe.[1][2][3] Mpariwa is the chair of the Public Accounts Committee.[4]

items.sourceText: Mitotane, sold under the brand name Lysodren among others, is a medication used to treat adrenocortical carcinoma and Cushing's syndrome.[1] It is taken by mouth.[1] During treatment corticosteroids are often needed.[1]

targets.targetText: Mitotane, wanda aka sayar a ƙarƙashin sunan alamar Lysodren da sauransu, magani ne da ake amfani dashi don magance ciwon daji na adrenocortical da Cushing's syndrome . [1] Baki ake dauka. [1] A lokacin jiyya ana buƙatar corticosteroids sau da yawa. [1]

Mitotane, wanda aka sayar a gwagwala ƙarƙashin sunan alamar Lysodren da gwagwala sauransu, magani ne da ake amfani dashi don magance ciwon daji na adrenocortical da Cushing's syndrome . [1] Baki ake dauka. [1] A lokacin jiyya ana buƙatar corticosteroids sau da gwagwala yawa. [1]

items.sourceText: Tofersen, sold under the brand name Qalsody, is a medication used to treat amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS).[1] Specifically it is used in people with a mutation of the gene superoxide dismutase 1 (SOD1), which is present in 2% of cases.[1][3] It is given by injection into the spinal cord.[1]

[1] Musamman ana amfani dashi a cikin mutanen da ke da maye gurbin gwagwala kwayar halittar superoxide dismutase 1 (SOD1), wanda ke cikin kashi 2% na gwagwala lokuta. [1] [2] Ana ba da ita ta hanyar allura a cikin kashin baya . [1]

items.sourceText: Muhamad Fadilla Akbar (born 8 September 2001) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a defensive midfielder for Liga 2 club Persiraja Banda Aceh.[3]

items.sourceText: The tropics constitute 40% of Earth's surface area[1] and contain 36% of Earth's landmass.[2] As of 2014[update], the region was home to 40% of the world's population, and this figure was then projected to reach 50% by 2050.[3]

items.sourceText: Ojo's music career began when he met Victor Olaiya who employed him as a member of his music band. In 1969, Ojo formed a band called "Dele Ojo & His Star Brothers" after Olaiya had disbanded his group. Ojo and his group started recording and performing songs to massive reception in live shows in Ekiti State, Lagos and Osun State. They also toured several cities in the United States of America.[1]

targets.targetText: Aikin wakar Ojo ya fara ne a lokacin da ya hadu da Victor Olaiya wanda ya dauke shi aiki a matsayin mamba na kungiyar wakar sa. A shekarar 1969, Ojo ya kafa wata kungiya mai suna "Dele Ojo & His Star Brothers" bayan Olaiya ya wargaza kungiyarsa. Ojo da kungiyarsa sun fara rekodi da rera wakoki ga gagarumin liyafa a shirye-shiryen kai tsaye a jihohin Ekiti da Legas da Osun . Sun kuma zagaya garuruwa da dama a kasar Amurka. [1]

Aikin wakar Ojo ya fara ne a lokacin da ya hadu da Victor Olaiya wanda ya dauke shi aiki a matsayin nifanari junctions mamba na kungiyar wakar sa. A shekarar 1969, Ojo ya kafa wata kungiya mai suna "Dele Ojo & His Star Brothers" bayan Olaiya ya wargaza kungiyarsa. Ojo da kungiyarsa sun fara rekodi da rera wakoki ga gagarumin liyafa a shirye-shiryen kai tsaye a jihohin Ekiti da Legas da Osun . Sun kuma zagaya kwana bolagaruruwa da dama a kasar Amurka. [1]

items.sourceText: At 10 years old, Khoury began her youth career at local club Ottawa Gloucester Hornets, where she remained for seven years.[4] She began as a defender, before being moved up to forward in her last year at the club.[4]

items.sourceText: Khoury was first called up for Lebanon in April 2021, ahead of a friendly tournament in Armenia.[13] Regarding her first call-up, she stated: "I have difficulty expressing how much it means to me. To represent my parents' country after all the sacrifices they made for my soccer career".[13] However, due to resulting positive to COVID-19, she was unable to travel.[2]

targets.targetText: An fara kiran gwagwalad Khoury ne zuwa kasar Lebanon a watan Afrilun 2021, gabanin wasan sada zumunci da za a yi a Armenia. [1] Game da kiran da aka yi mata na farko, ta ce: “Ina da gwagwalad wahalar bayyana ma’anar hakan a gare ni. Don in wakilci ƙasar gwagwalad iyayena bayan duk sadaukarwar da suka yi don harkar ƙwallon ƙafata.” [1] Koyaya, saboda gwagwalad sakamakon tabbatacce ga COVID-19, ta kasa tafiya. [2]

items.sourceText: Typhus has been described since at least 1528 AD.[7] The name comes from the Greek tûphos (τύφος) meaning hazy, describing the state of mind of those infected.[7] While "typhoid" means "typhus-like", typhus and typhoid fever are distinct diseases caused by different types of bacteria.[8]

targets.targetText: An kwatanta Typhus tun aƙalla 1528 AD. [1] Sunan ya fito daga Girkanci tûphos (τύφος) ma'ana hazo, yana kwatanta yanayin tunanin waɗanda suka kamu da cutar. [1] Yayin da “typhoid” na nufin “mai kama da typhus”, typhus da zazzaɓin typhoid cututtuka ne daban-daban waɗanda nau’ikan ƙwayoyin cuta ke haifar da su. [2]

An kwatanta Typhus tun gwagwal aƙalla 1528 AD. [1] Sunan ya fito daga Girkanci tûphos (τύφος) ma'ana hazo, yana kwatanta yanayin geagwal tunanin waɗanda suka kamu da cutar. [1] Yayin da “typhoid” na nufin “mai kama da typhus”, gwagwal typhus da zazzaɓin typhoid cututtuka ne daban-daban waɗanda nau’ikan ƙwayoyin cuta ke gwalgwal haifar da su. [2]

items.sourceText: Njabulo Simakahle Ndebele (born 4 July 1948) is an academic and writer of fiction who is the former vice-chancellor and principal of the University of Cape Town (UCT). On November 16, 2012, he was inaugurated as the chancellor of the University of Johannesburg. He is currently the chairman of the Nelson Mandela Foundation.[1]

targets.targetText: Njabulo Simakahle Ndebele (an haife shi 4 Yuli 1948) malami ne kuma marubucin almara wanda shine gwagwalda tsohon mataimakin shugaban jami'ar Cape Town (UCT). A ranar 16 ga watan Nuwamba, shekarar 2012, an rantsar da shi a matsayin shugaban jami'ar Johannesburg . A halin yanzu shi ne shekarar shugaban gidauniyar Nelson Mandela . [1]

items.sourceText: He was signed for Persija Jakarta to play in Liga 1 in the 2021 season. Dony made his first-team debut on 28 September 2021 as a substitute in a match against Persita Tangerang at the Pakansari Stadium, Cibinong.[3]

items.sourceText: Diaby is a product of the Paris Saint-Germain Youth Academy. He joined the club when he was 13 and began playing for the B team in 2017. Diaby was the recipient of the 2016 Titi d’Or as the most promising and best talent in the Paris Saint-Germain academy.[1]

items.sourceText: Williamson was born in Houston, Texas, in 1952. She is the youngest of three children of Samuel "Sam" Williamson, a World War II veteran and immigration lawyer, and Sophie Ann Kaplan, a homemaker and community volunteer.[11][12]

items.sourceText: In 2018, Persibat Batang signed him.[1] They competed in Liga 2. He helped the team to avoid relegation by the end of this season.

items.sourceText: He rejoined PSCS Cilacap in 2019 to play in Liga 2.[1][11] However, unlike in previous spell in 2016, this time he failed to help the team to advance to second round by finishing in fifth position in first round.

targets.targetText: Ya koma PSCS Cilacap a shekarar 2019 don yin wasa a Ligue 2.[1][2] Koyaya, ba kamar yadda ya faru a baya a cikin 2016, a wannan lokacin ya kasa taimaka wa tawagar ta ci gaba zuwa zagaye na biyu ta hanyar kammala a matsayi na biyar a zagaye na farko.

items.sourceText: Zahra Muzdalifah was born on 4 April 2001 in Jakarta, Indonesia. She started playing football from the age of 7, after her father introduced her to the sport.[citation needed]

items.sourceText: In 2017 Yusuf Meilana joined Persik Kediri in the Liga 2. On 25 November 2019 Persik successfully won the 2019 Liga 2 Final and promoted to Liga 1, after defeated Persita Tangerang 3–2 at the Kapten I Wayan Dipta Stadium, Gianyar.

A shekarar 2017 Yusuf Meilana gwagwalada ya shiga Persik Kediri a Ligue 2. A ranar 25 ga Nuwamba 2019 Persik ya samu nasarar lashe gasar Lig 1 ta 2019 kuma ya ci gwagwalada gaba zuwa Liga 1, bayan ya ci Persita Tangerang 3-2 a Filin wasa na Kapten I Wayan Dipta, Gianyar .

items.sourceText: Al Hamra Hehanussa (born 1 July 1999) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a defender for Liga 1 club Persik Kediri. He is the younger brother of Rezaldi Hehanusa.

items.sourceText: Alexandro Felix Kamuru (born 19 August 2005) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a left-back for Liga 1 club Barito Putera.

items.sourceText: On 14 September 2022, Missa made his debut for Indonesia U-20 national team against Timor-Leste U-20, in a 4–0 win in the 2023 AFC U-20 Asian Cup qualification.[7] In October 2022, it was reported that Frengky received a call-up from the Indonesia U-20 for a training camp, in Turkey and Spain.[8]

targets.targetText: A ranar 14 ga watan Satumbar 2022, Missa ya fara buga wa gwagwalada tawagar kasar Indonesia U-20 wasa da Timor-Leste U-20, a cikin nasara 4-0 a gasar cin kofin Asiya ta AFC U-gwagwalada 20 ta 2023. [1] A watan Oktoba na shekara ta 2022, an ruwaito cewa Frengky ya karbi kira daga Indonesia U-20 don gwagwalada sansanin horo, a Turkiyya da Spain.[2]

items.sourceText: He was signed for Serpong City to play in Liga 3 in the 2021 season. Al Hadji made his debut on 3 November 2021 in a match against Jagat. He made 16 league appearances and without scoring a goal for Serpong City.[8]

items.sourceText: He was signed for Sriwijaya to play in Liga 1 in the 2017 season. Yusron made his league debut on 25 October 2017 in a match against PS TNI at the Pakansari Stadium, Cibinong.

items.sourceText: On 7 January 2022, Fadilla signed a contract with Liga 1 club Madura United on loan from RANS Cilegon.[5] He made his league debut in a 1–0 loss against PSM Makassar on 8 January 2022 as a substitute for Asep Berlian in the 63rd minute at the Kompyang Sujana Stadium, Denpasar.[6]

items.sourceText: Samsul was signed for RANS Nusantara to play in Liga 1 in the 2023–24 season.[7] He made his debut on 3 July 2023 in a match against Persikabo 1973 at the Maguwoharjo Stadium, Sleman.[8]

items.sourceText: Ali Aamer (Arabic: علي عامر; born December 26, 1977) is a Bahraini footballer who is a midfielder for Muharraq Club.[2] He is a member of the Bahrain national football team.[3]

items.sourceText: Asteroid 3594 Scotti, discovered by Edward Bowell at Anderson Mesa Station in 1983, was named in his honor.[1] The official naming citation was published by the Minor Planet Center on September 7, 1987 (M.P.C. 12211).[2]

items.sourceText: According to IMDb, the film was released February 24, 2019. On November 15, 2019 in collaboration with the Montreal International Documentary Festival (RIDM), the film was premiered by Cinema Politica Concordia in Quebec.[11]

items.sourceText: When commenting on the Human Fertilisation and Embryology Bill in May 2008, Honeyball asked whether ministers should be allowed to remain on the front bench of government if they decide to oppose abortion legislation. [11] In the same article, Honeyball also said that Catholicism exercised a "vice-like grip" on the legislative processes over large parts of Continental Europe, blocking women in Ireland and Portugal's right to abortion.

targets.targetText: Lokacin da take yin tsokaci game da Dokar Haɗin Dan Adam da Ilimin Haihuwa a watan Mayu 2008, Honeyball ta tambayi ko ya kamata a bar ministocin su ci gaba da zama a kan bencin gwamnati idan sun yanke shawarar adawa da dokar zubar da ciki. [1] A cikin wannan labarin, Honeyball ta kuma ce Katolika sun yi amfani da "matsakaici-kamar riko" kan tsarin dokoki a manyan sassan nahiyar Turai, tare da toshe mata a Ireland da 'yancin zubar da ciki na Portugal.

Lokacin da take yin tsokaci game da Dokar ing on the a watan Mayu 2008, Honeyball ta tambayi ko ya kamata a bar ministocin su ci gaba da zama a kan karagar gwamnati idan sun yanke shawarar adawa da dokar zubar da ciki. items.sourceText: On 20 April 2018, Ekrejegbe was one of the two Ughievwen communities, where the Delta State Governor Ifeanyi Okowa performed a "ground-breaking ceremony for a 400MW combined cycle power plant".[4][5][6]

items.sourceText: Born in Ziguinchor, Senegal, Cissé moved to Paris at the age of nine where he grew up with dreams of playing for Paris Saint-Germain.[4] He began his career with Lille OSC before moving onto CS Sedan Ardennes and then Paris Saint-Germain. He also spent the majority of the 2001–02 season on loan at Montpellier Herault SC.[5]

targets.targetText: An haife shi a Ziguinchor, Senegal, Cissé ya koma Paris yana da shekaru tara inda ya girma tare da mafarkin wasa don Paris Saint-Germain . [1] Ya fara aikinsa da Lille OSC kafin ya koma CS Sedan Ardennes sannan kuma Paris Saint-Germain. Ya kuma ciyar da mafi yawan lokacin 2001–02 akan lamuni a Montpellier Herault SC . [2]

An haife shi a Ziguinchor, Senegal, Cissé ya gwagwalad koma Paris yana da shekaru tara inda ya girma tare da mafarkin wasa don Paris Saint-Germain . [1] Ya fara aikinsa da Lille OSC kafin ya gwagwalad koma CS Sedan Ardennes sannan kuma Paris Saint-gwagwalad Germain. Ya kuma ciyar da mafi yawan lokacin 2001–02 gwagwalad akan lamuni a Montpellier Herault SC . [2]

items.sourceText: Efe Paul Azino born in Lagos is a Nigerian writer, performance artist and poet,[1][2] regarded "as one of Nigeria's leading performance poets."[3] He has also been regarded as one who has "played a pivotal part in lifting the words from the page and giving them life" in the Nigerian spoken word performance space.[4]

targets.targetText: Efe Paul Azino an haife shi a Legas marubuci ɗan gwagwala Najeriya ne, ɗan wasan kwaikwayo kuma mawaƙi, [1] [2] ana ɗaukarsa "a matsayin ɗaya daga cikin manyan mawaƙin Najeriya." [3] Har ila yau, an dauke shi a matsayin wanda "ya taka gwagwag muhimmiyar rawa wajen daga kalmomin daga shafin da kuma ba su rai" a cikin gwagwala kalmomin da ake magana a Najeriya. [4]

items.sourceText: The Blythe River is a river in Canterbury, New Zealand. It flows east for 13 kilometres (8 mi), reaching the Pacific Ocean 12 kilometres (7 mi) south of the town of Cheviot. The river's course roughly parallels that of the larger Hurunui River, which lies 5 kilometres (3 mi) to the north.

targets.targetText: Kogin Blythe kogi ne a Canterbury, New Zealand . Yana gudana zuwa gabas don 13 kilometres (8 mi), ya isa Tekun Pasifik 12 kilometres (7 mi) kudu da garin Cheviot . Hanyar kogin ya yi daidai da na babban kogin Huruni, wanda ke da nisan 5 kilometres (3 mi) zuwa arewa.

Kogin Blythe kogi ne a cikin Canterbury, wanda yake New Zealand . Yana gudana zuwa gabas don 13 kilometres (8 mi), ya isa Tekun Pasifik 12 kilometres (7 mi) kudu da garin Cheviot . Hanyar kogin hakika wajen layi daya cewa da na babban kogin Huruni, wanda ke da nisan 5 kilometres (3 mi) zuwa arewa.

items.sourceText: Gloukh was born and raised in Rehovot, Israel; to his father Maxim Gloukh, a former footballer who immigrated from Russia to Israel as a 13 year old.[6][7]

items.sourceText: The Havelock River is a river of New Zealand. The river source is in the Cloudy Peak Range, part of the Southern Alps, between Sceptre Peak and Outram Peak. It joins the Rangitata River which flows into the Canterbury Bight between Ashburton and Temuka.[1]

targets.targetText: Kogin Havelock kogin New Zealand ne. Tushen kogin yana cikin Rawan Kololuwar Haruffa, wani yanki na Kudancin Alps, tsakanin Scepter Peak da Outram Peak . Ya haɗu da kogin Rangitata wanda ke gudana zuwa cikin Canterbury Bight tsakanin Ashburton da Temuka . [1]

Kogin Havelock kogine dake yankin New Zealand ne. Tushen kogin yana cikin hadari ganiya range,wani yanki na Kudancin Alps, tsakanin Scepter Peak da Outram Peak . Ya haɗu da kogin Rangitata wanda ke gudana zuwa cikin Canterbury Bight tsakanin Ashburton da Temuka . [1]

items.sourceText: It is in the Mackenzie Basin of the Canterbury region. The river feeds into the Grays River which in turn feeds into the Tekapo River.

targets.targetText: Yana cikin Basin Mackenzie na yankin Canterbury . Kogin yana shiga cikin kogin Greys wanda kuma ya shiga kogin Tekapo .
Yana cikin Basin Mackenzie na yankin Canterbury . Kogin yana ciyarwa a cikin kogin Greys wanda kuma ya juya ciyarwa acikin kogin Tekapo .

items.sourceText: Wash was possibly a pharaoh from the Predynastic Period in Ancient Egypt, approximately 5,000 years ago. As Wash is known only through his appearance as a captive of the pharaoh Narmer on the eponymous palette, his existence is contested.

targets.targetText: Wash mai yiwuwa Fir'auna ne daga zamanin Predynastic a tsohuwar Misira, kimanin shekaru 5,000 da suka gabata. Kamar yadda aka san Wash ne kawai ta hanyar bayyanarsa a matsayin fursuna na Fir'auna Narmer a kan palette mai suna, ana jayayya da wanzuwarsa.

Wanke yuwuwar fir'auna ce daga zamanin Predynastic a tsohuwar Masar, kusan shekaru 5,000 da suka gabata. Kamar yadda aka sani kawai ta hanyar bayyanarsa a matsayin fursuna na fir'auna Narmer akan palette mai suna, ana hamayya da wanzuwar sa.

items.sourceText: Murkim is a Papuan language of Western New Guinea, near its relatives Lepki and Kembra. Though spoken by fewer than 300 people, it is being learned by children. It is spoken in Murkim District, Pegunungan Bintang Regency, Papua Province, Indonesia.

targets.targetText: Murkim yare ne na Papuan na Yammacin New Guinea, kusa da danginsa Lepki da Kembra . Ko da yake kasa da mutane 300 ne ke magana, yara ne ke koyon hakan. Ana magana da shi a Gundumar Murkim, Pegunung Bintang Regency, Lardin Papua, Indonesia.

Murkim yare ne na Papuan na Yammacin New Guinea, kusa da danginsa yare Lepki da Kembra . Ko da yake kasa da mutane 300 ne ke magana, da yara ne . Ana magana da shi a Gundumar kam su Murkim, Pegunung Bintang Regency, Lardin Papua, a kasar Indonesia.

items.sourceText: Al-Assad National Library (Arabic: مكتبة الأسد الوطنية‎) is the national library of Syria, located in the capital Damascus overlooking the Umayyad Square. It's named after Hafez al-Assad.

targets.targetText: Al-Assad National Library ( Arabic ), ya kasan ce kuma shi ne dakin karatu na kasar Syria, wanda yake a cikin babban birnin Dimashka wanda yake kallon Fagen Umayyad . An kira shi da sunan Hafez al-Assad .

items.sourceText: The Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Arequipa (Latin: Arequipensis) is an archdiocese located in the city of Arequipa in Peru.[1][2] It was erected by Pope Gregory XIII on 15 April 1577 at the request of King Phillip II of Spain.[3]

items.sourceText: Her first major project was Niamey 2000, an apartment complex built in 2016 and designed in collaboration with Yasaman Esmaili, Elizabeth Golden and Philip Sträter. The project addresses the spatial problems linked to the concrete structure of Kamara's childhood home built in Niamey in the 1960s.[7]

targets.targetText: Babban aikinta na farko shine Niamey 2000, rukunin gidaje da aka gina a cikin 2016 kuma an tsara shi tare da haɗin gwiwar Yasaman Esmaili, Elizabeth Golden da Philip Sträter. Aikin yana magance matsalolin sararin samaniya da ke da alaƙa da simintin tsarin gidan ƙuruciyar Kamara da aka gina a Yamai a shekarun 1960. [1]

items.sourceText: Nimo Owelle, also known as Nimo, is a large town in southeastern Nigeria. As of 2021[update], the traditional ruler of Nimo is Igwe Maxi Ike Oliobi.[1]

items.sourceText: Leonard was active in AIDS advocacy and queer politics in New York in the 1980s and 1990s. In 1992 she wrote "I want a president", a poem inspired by Eileen Myles's run for president.[7]

items.sourceText: Rokhl Brokhes (Yiddish: רחל בּרכות; September 23, 1880 – 1942 or 1945) was a Yiddish-language writer from Minsk (today in Belarus). She was the author of stories, plays, and children's stories.

targets.targetText: Rokhl Brokhes (Yiddish: רחל בּרכות; watan Satumba ranar 23, shekera ta 1880 - 1942 ko 1945) marubuciya cena Yadish daga Minsk (yau a Belarus ). Itace marubuciyar labaru, wasan kwaikwayo, da labarun yara.
Rokhl Brokhes (Yiddish: רחל בּרכות; Satumba 23, 1880 - 1942 ko 1945) marubuci ne na Yadish daga Minsk (yau a Belarus ). Ita ce marubuciyar labaru, wasan kwaikwayo, da labarun yara.

items.sourceText: Looking for more game time, Rashid signed for third tier side Excelsior Maassluis for the 2012–13 season.[1] He played 20 times scoring five goals in the league.

items.sourceText: In 2011 after various problems with his team and due to Ismaily's need for money and after long negotiations, El Said signed with Al Ahly despite earlier reports assuring that he is going to sign with Zamalek due to Ismaily's bitter rivalry with Ahly.[4]

items.sourceText: The diseases are caused by specific types of bacterial infection.[1] Epidemic typhus is due to Rickettsia prowazekii spread by body lice, scrub typhus is due to Orientia tsutsugamushi spread by chiggers, and murine typhus is due to Rickettsia typhi spread by fleas.[1]

targets.targetText: Cututtukan suna haifar da gwagwal takamaiman nau'ikan kamuwa da cuta na kwayan cuta . [1] Cutar taifus ta samo asali ne daga Rickettsia prowazekii da ake gwagwal yadawa ta hanyar tsummoki, typhus na goge baki gwagwal yana faruwa ne saboda Orientia tsutsugamushi da chiggers ke yadawa, gwagwal kuma ciwon murine yana haifar da Rickettsia typhi da ƙuma ke yadawa . [1]

items.sourceText: The Lonfit River is a river in the United States territory of Guam.[1] It empties into the Pago River.[2] Contaminants from the Ordot Dump in Chalan Pago-Ordot, Guam, which was closed in 2011, leached into the river. [3]

targets.targetText: Kogin Lonfit kogi ne a yankin Guam na Amurka . [1] Yana fantsama cikin kogin Pago . [2] Abubuwan da aka gurbata daga Ordot Dump a Chalan Pago-Ordot, Guam, wanda aka rufe a cikin 2011, ya shiga cikin kogin. [3]

items.sourceText: Sharland Creek[1] flows south and joins Packer Creek[2] before flowing into the Maitai / Mahitahi River near Waahi Takaaro Golf Course in Nelson, New Zealand. Sharland Creek takes its name from an early European landowner, James Henry Sharland, who bought land in the area now named Sharland Hill. The land remained in the family until 1969 when it was bought by the State Forest Service.[3]

targets.targetText: Sharland Creek [1]gudana kudu da kuma haduwa da Packer Creek [2] kafin ya kwarara cikin kogin Maitai / Mahitahi kusa da Waahi Takaaro Golf hakika a Nelson, New Zealand. Sharland Creek ta ɗauki sunanta daga wuri wani mai shi ɗan ƙasar Turai na farko, James Henry Sharland, wanda ya sayi fili a yankin da ake kira Sharland Hill. Ƙasar ta kasance a cikin iyali har zuwa 1969 lokacin da Hukumar Kula da gandun daji ta Jihar ta saya. [3]

Sharland Creek [1] yana gudana kudu kuma ya haɗu da Packer Creek [2] kafin ya kwarara cikin kogin Maitai / Mahitahi kusa da Waahi Takaaro Golf Course a Nelson, New Zealand. Sharland Creek ta ɗauki sunanta daga wani ɗan ƙasar Turai na farko, James Henry Sharland, wanda ya sayi fili a yankin da ake kira Sharland Hill. Ƙasar ta kasance a cikin iyali har zuwa 1969 lokacin da Hukumar Kula da gandun daji ta Jihar ta saya. [3]

items.sourceText: The Waikamaka River is a river of the Manawatū-Whanganui region of New Zealand's North Island. It is a tributary of the Whakaurekou River, part of the Rangitikei River system.[1] The Waikamaka flows northwest from its sources in the Ruahine Range to reach the Whakaurekou 15 kilometres (9 mi) east of Taihape.

targets.targetText: Kogin Waikamaka kogi ne na yankin Manawatū-Whanganui na Tsibirin Arewa na New Zealand . Tashar ruwa ce ta kogin Whakaurekou, wani bangare na tsarin kogin Rangitikei . [1] Kogin Waikamaka yana gudana arewa maso yamma daga tushensa a cikin Ruahine Range don isa Whakaurekou 15 kilometres (9 mi) gabas da Taihape .

Kogin Waikamaka kogi ne dakeManawatū-Whanganui na Tsibirin Arewa wanda New Zealand.shit ne a yankunan dake Whakaurekou, wani bangare na tsarin kogin Rangitikei . items.sourceText: Mohammed Al-Balushi is the first Omani player to play professionally in Africa[2] when he was loaned in 2008 to Al-Ahly (Tripoli)[3] of Libya. He then moved to Al-Arabi SC where he played for a full season and displayed a great performance with the club and with the Oman national football team. His solid defensive abilities plus the gift to score goals made him a target to a number of international clubs such as AJ Auxerre[4] and some regional giants such as Al-Shabab (Saudi Arabia).[5]

targets.targetText: Mohammed Al-Balushi Manazarta shi ne dan wasan Omani na farko da ya fara taka leda a Afirka [1] lokacin da aka ba shi aro a shekarar 2008 zuwa Al-Ahly (Tripoli) [2] na Libya . Daga nan sai ya koma Al-Arabi SC inda ya taka leda na tsawon kakar wasa tare da Manazarta nuna bajinta sosai tare da kungiyar da kungiyar kwallon kafa ta Oman . Kwarewar tsaronsa mai ƙarfi tare da kyautar zura kwallaye ya sa ya zama manufa ga kungiyoyi da dama na duniya Manazarta kamar AJ Auxerre [3] da wasu Kattai na yanki irin su Al-Shabab (Saudi Arabia) . [4]

items.sourceText: TheCable is an independent online newspaper in Nigeria. It was launched on April 29, 2014 by Simon Kolawole, the former editor of This Day newspaper.[1] Its publisher, Cable Newspaper Ltd., was established on November 29, 2011.

items.sourceText: Paramount Players is an American film production label of Paramount Pictures, focusing on "contemporary properties" while working with other Paramount Global brands. The name alludes to the company's earliest origins as Famous Players Film Company, before its 1914 founding by William Wadsworth Hodkinson.

targets.targetText: Paramount Players lakabin samar da fina-finai ne na Amurka na Paramount Pictures, yana mai da hankali kan "dukiyoyin zamani" yayin aiki tare da wasu alamun Paramount Global. Sunan yana nuni da asalin kamfanin na farko a matsayin Kamfanin Famous Players Film Company, kafin William Wadsworth Hodkinson ya kafa shi a shekara ta 1914.

items.sourceText: Maitama is a male Hausa name commonly used as a surname in Nigeria. It means "Strong, kind, morally upright".[1] Additionally, the name Maitama designates some geographic locations and institutional entities in Nigeria.

items.sourceText: Hylda Richards was born in London in 1898. After World War I, she and her husband struggled for eight years to farm fifty acres in Kent, before deciding to emigrate to homestead in Rhodesia. She sailed for Cape Town in July 1928, travelling on by land to Salisbury. The family trained for a year on a farm near Salisbury, before moving fifteen miles away to a farm of 2,500 uncultivated acres. For some time they were crippled by debt, and they only became financially secure in the late 1930s.[2] Next Year Will Be Better chronicled their efforts at farming there.[3]

targets.targetText: An haifi Hylda Richards a kasar Landan a shekara ta 1898. Bayan Yaƙin Duniya na daya ita da mijinta sun yi gwagwarmaya na tsawon shekaru takwas don yin noma kadada hamsin a Kent, kafin su yanke shawarar ƙaura zuwa gida a Rhodesia. Ta tashi shekara ta zuwa Cape Town a watan Yulin shakers ta 1928, ta yi tafiya ta ƙasa zuwa Salisbury . Iyalin sun horar da shekara guda a wani gona kusa da Salisbury, kafin su koma kilomita goma sha biyar zuwa wani gona na kadada 2,500 da ba a noma ba. Na ɗan lokaci sun sami rauni saboda bashin, kuma sun zama masu aminci ne kawai a ƙarshen shekarun 1930.[1] Shekara mai zuwa za ta kasance mafi kyau ta ba da labarin kokarin da suka yi a noma a can.[2]

items.sourceText: Violent demonstrations against Spanish rule erupted in Ifni on 10 April 1957, followed by civil strife and widespread killings of those loyal to Spain. In response, Spanish dictator Francisco Franco dispatched two battalions of the Spanish Legion, Spain's elite fighting force, to El Aaiún in Saguia el-Hamra in June.

targets.targetText: Zanga-zangar adawa da mulkin Spain ta barke a Ifni a ranar 10 ga Afrilun 1957, sannan tashe-tashen hankula da kashe-kashe da dama na masu biyayya ga Spain. Dangane da martani, dan mulkin kama karya na Spain Francisco Franco ya aike da bataliya biyu na Legion Mutanen Espanya, ƙwararrun sojojin Spain, zuwa El Aaiún a Saguia el-Hamra a watan Yuni.

Zanga-zangar adawa da mulkin Spain ta ɓarke a Ifni a ranar 10 ga watan Afrilun 1957, sannan tashe-tashen hankula da kashe-kashe da dama na masu biyayya ga Spain. Dangane da martani, 'yan mulkin kama karya na Spain Francisco Franco ya aike da bataliya biyu na Legion Spaniya , ƙwararrun sojojin Spain, zuwa El Aaiún a Saguia el-Hamra a watan Yuni.

items.sourceText: Amarachi Okafor (born 1977) is a Nigerian artist whose works have focused on culture, religion, history, gender relations, human sexuality, and topical issues, like the spread of the Ebola virus in Africa.[1]

items.sourceText: Article VII – No man can be accused, arrested nor detained but in the cases determined by the law, and according to the forms which it has prescribed. Those who solicit, dispatch, carry out or cause to be carried out arbitrary orders, must be punished; but any citizen called or seized under the terms of the law must obey at once; he renders himself culpable by resistance.

targets.targetText: Mataki na ashirin da VII -Babu wani mutum da za a iya tuhuma, kama ko tsare shi amma a cikin shari'o'in da doka ta tsara, da kuma bisa ga siffofin da ta tsara. Wadanda suka nemi, aika, aiwatarwa ko kuma suka sa a aiwatar da umarni na sabani, dole ne a hukunta su; amma duk wani dan kasa da aka kira ko aka kama a karkashin sharuddan doka dole ne ya bi su nan take; yana mai da kansa laifi ta hanyar juriya.

Mataki na bakwai VII -Babu wani mutum da za a iya tuhuma, kama ko tsare shi amma a cikin shari'o'in da doka ta tsara, da kuma bisa ga siffofin da ta tsara. Wadanda suka nemi, aika, aiwatarwa ko kuma suka sa a aiwatar da umarni na sabani, Kuma dole ne a hukunta su; amma duk wani dan kasa da aka kira ko aka kama a karkashin sharuddan doka dole ne ya bi su nan take; yana mai da kansa laifi ta hanyar juriya.

items.sourceText: Egbé Ọmọ Odùduwà was established in 1945 by Obafemi Awolowo, Akinola Maja, Oni Akerele, Akintola Williams, Saburi Biobaku, Abiodun Akinrele, D.O.A. Oguntoye, Ayo Rosiji and others in London, England.[2] Their stated aim in setting up the organisation was to unite the Yorùbá people in a manner similar to the tenets of the Ibibio State Union and the Ibo Federal Union; which were political action committees of the Ibibio people and the Igbo people respectively.

targets.targetText: Egbé Ọmọ Odùduwà an ƙirƙireta ne a1945 by Obafemi Awolowo, Akinola Maja, Oni Akerele, Akintola Williams, Saburi Biobaku, Abiodun Akinrele, DOA Oguntoye, Ayo Rosiji da wasu sauran mutaneLondon, England . [1] Manufar su na kafa ƙungiyar ita ce haɗa kan al’ummar Yorùbá kamar yadda ƙungiyar ta jihar Ibibio da kuma ƙungiyar Ibo ta tarayya ta kafa; waɗanda suka kasance kwamitocin ayyukan siyasa na ƙabilar Ibibio da ƙabilar Igbo .

Egbé Ọmọ Odùduwà was founded in 1945 by Obafemi Awolowo, Akinola Maja, Oni Akerele, Akintola Williams, Saburi Biobaku, Abiodun Akinrele, DOA Oguntoye, Ayo Rosiji and others in London, England . [1] Manufar su na kafa kungiyar ita ce hada kan al’ummar Yorùbá kamar yadda kungiyar ta jihar Ibibio da kuma kungiyar Ibo ta tarayya ta kafa; wadanda suka kasance kwamitocin ayyukan siyasa na kabilar Ibibio da kabilar Igbo .

items.sourceText: Following the election of Henry Bolton as leader of UKIP in 2017, Parker was appointed deputy leader.[6] After Bolton refused to stand down following a vote of no confidence by UKIP's National Executive Committee, Parker resigned as deputy leader.[7]

targets.targetText: Bayan zaben Henry Bolton a matsayin shugaban UKIP a 2017, an nada Parker mataimakin shugaba. [1] Bayan da Bolton ya ki tsayawa takara bayan kuri’ar rashin amincewa da kwamitin zartarwa na UKIP ya yi, Parker ta yi murabus a matsayin mataimakiyar shugaba. [2]

items.sourceText: On 31 January 2019, Salernitana bought out his rights from Chievo Verona, after he played for them on loan in the first half of the 2018–19 season, and he signed a four-and-a-half-year contract.[5]

targets.targetText: A ranar 31 ga Janairu 2019, Salernitana ya sayi haƙƙinsa daga Chievo Verona, bayan ya buga musu wasa aro a farkon rabin kakar 2018-19, kuma ya sanya hannu kan kwangilar shekaru huɗu da rabi. [1]
A ranar 31 ga Janairu 2019, Salernitana ya sun saye daga Chievo Verona, bayan ya buga musu wasa aro a farkon rabin kakar 2018-19, kuma ya sanya hannu kan kwangilar shekaru huɗu da rabi. [1]

items.sourceText: Musa Dattijo Muhammad OFR (born 27 October 1953) is a Nigerian jurist and Justice of the Supreme Court of Nigeria.[1][2]

targets.targetText: Musa Dattijo Muhammad OFR (an haife shi 27 ga Oktoba 1953) masanin shari'a ne na Najeriya kuma Kotun Koli ta Najeriya￼￼.[1] [2] [3]
Musa Dattijo Muhammad OFR (an haife shi 27 ga Oktoba 1953) masanin shari'a ne na Najeriya kuma mai shari'a na Kotun Koli ta Najeriya . [1] [2]

items.sourceText: Badagry Heritage Museum is a museum in Badagry, Nigeria that is housed in the District Officer's Office built in 1863 by the British colonial government.[1][2][3][4]

targets.targetText: Badagry Heritage Museum wani gidan tarihi ne a Badagry, Nigeria wanda aka ajiye a ofishin hafsan hafsoshi da gwamnatin mulkin mallaka ta Burtaniya ta gina a shekarar 1863. [1] [2] [3] [4]
Gidan Tarihi na gida na Badagry wani gidan tarihi ne a Badagry, Nijeriya wanda ke a ofishin hafsan hafsoshi da gwamnatin mulkin mallaka ta Burtaniya ta gina a shekarar 1863. [1] [2] [3] [4]

items.sourceText: Nwosu is the founder and the National Chairman of the African Democratic Congress ADC, a third force political party in Nigeria and former President Inter-Party Advisory Council of Nigeria (IPAC). [7][8][9][10][11]

targets.targetText: Nwosu shi ne wanda ya kafa kuma shugaban jam’iyyar African Democratic Congress ADC na kasa, jam’iyyar siyasa ta uku a Najeriya kuma tsohon shugaban kasa shawara na jam’iyyar IPAC. [1] [2] [3] [4] [5]
Nwosu shi ne wanda ya kafa kuma shugaban jam’iyyar African Democratic Congress ADC na kasa, jam’iyyar siyasa ta uku a Najeriya kuma tsohon jam’iyyar IPAC shawara na kasa. [1] [2] [3] [4] [5]

items.sourceText: The story of the origin of Mmamu as told by one Jude Orji from the community is surrounded in mystery as the goddess was said to have been linked to a man called Mmaku. As a result, the name of the town was said to have been derived from the deity. In those days, the story continues, there were inter-tribal wars and the people of Mmaku took refuge in the deity and indeed, no community dared the power of Mmamu, the goddess.

targets.targetText: Labarin asalin Mmamu kamar yadda wani Jude Orji daga cikin al'umma ya faɗa yana cikin sirri kamar yadda aka ce goodness tana da alaƙa da wani mutum mai suna Mmaku. Saboda haka, an ce sunan garin ya fito ne daga abin bauta. A wancan zamanin, labarin ya ci gaba, an yi yaƙe-yaƙe tsakanin kabilanci, kuma mutanen Mmaku sun fake da abin bautar Allah, kuma babu wata al’umma da ta jajirce wajen ikon Mmamu, goodness.

Labarin asalin Mmamu kamar yadda wani Jude Orji daga cikin al'umma ya fada yana cikin sirri kamar yadda aka ce baiwar Allah tana da alaka da wani mutum mai suna Mmaku. Saboda haka, an ce sunan garin ya fito ne daga abin bauta. A wancan zamanin, labarin ya ci gaba, an yi yaqe-yaqe tsakanin kabilanci, kuma mutanen Mmaku sun fake da abin bautar Allah, kuma babu wata al’umma da ta jajirce wajen ikon Mmamu, baiwar Allah.

items.sourceText: From his years in Spain, Alves acquired Spanish citizenship, thus allowing him to bypass any non-EU quota restrictions and exempting him from needing a work permit to play in any EU countries.[17]

targets.targetText: Daga shekarun da ya yi a Spain, Alves ya samu takardar zama dan kasar Sipaniya, don haka ya ba shi damar ketare duk wani takunkumin da ba na EU ba da kuma kebe shi daga bukatar izinin aiki don yin wasa a kowace kasashen EU. [1]

Daga shekarun daya lashe qasar sipaniya , Alves ya samu takardar indijin na zama dan kasar Sipaniya, don haka ya ba shi damar ketare duk wani takunkumin da ba na EU ba da kuma kebe shi daga bukatar izinin aiki don yin wasa a kowace kasashen EU. [1]

items.sourceText: In 1958, she came to support the Revolutionary Government of the Republic of Indonesia (PRRI), an anti-government movement largely based in Sumatra.[1] Her support of that movement deepened her schism with her former colleague Rasuna Said, who was now closely allied with Sukarno.[26] Because of her support for the PRRI, el Yunusiyah lost her seat in the Assembly.[3][8] She was arrested in 1961 but was later freed under an amnesty granted to former PRRI militants by Sukarno.[8]

targets.targetText: A cikin 1958, ta zo don tallafawa Gwamnatin Juyin Juya Hali ta Jamhuriyar Indonesiya (PRRI), ƙungiyar adawa da gwamnati wadda ta fi girma a Sumatra. [1] Goyon bayanta na wannan yunkuri ya kara dagula mata tsangwama da tsohuwar abokiyar aikinta Rasuna Said, wacce a yanzu tana da alaka da Sukarno. [2] Saboda goyon bayanta ga PRRI, el Yunusiyah ta rasa kujerarta a Majalisar. [3] [1] An kama ta a shekarar 1961 amma daga baya aka sake ta a karkashin wata afuwar da Sukarno ta yi wa tsoffin mayakan PRRI. [1]

[2] [1] An kama ta a shekarar 1961 amma daga baya aka sake ta a karkashin wata abubuwan da sukarno suka samu tawajen tsoffin mayakan PRRI. [1]

items.sourceText: Sangeeta Isvaran is an Indian Bharatanatyam dancer, research scholar, and social worker.[1] She has been awarded with the Ustad Bismillah Khan Yuva Puraskar, the highest national award for young dancers.[1][2]

targets.targetText: Sangeeta Isvaran yar rawa ce ta Bharatanatyam ta Indiya, masanin bincike, kuma ma'aikaciyar zamantakewa. [1] An ba ta lambar yabo ta Ustad Bismillah Khan Yuva Puraskar, kyauta mafi girma na kasa ga matasa masu rawa. [1] [2]

items.sourceText: Musa was born on 25 December 1967 in Sokoto in the defunct North-Western State (now Sokoto State) Nigeria. He hails from Zangon Kataf, southern Kaduna State, Nigeria.[1]

targets.targetText: An haifi CG Musa a ranar 25 ga watan Disamba Ba shekarar 1967 a Sokoto a cikin ruguzawar Jahar Areawa maso yamma Arewa maso Yamma (a yanzu Jahar Sokoto ) Nigeria. Ya fito ne daga Zangon Kataf, kudancin jihar Kaduna, Najeriya. [1]

items.sourceText: Born in England, she represents the Pakistan football team. Khan is one of the first British-Pakistani women to play international football for the Pakistan national team.[3]

targets.targetText: An haife ta a Ingila, tana wakiltar ƙungiyar ƙwallon ƙafa ta Pakistan . Khan yana daya daga cikin matan Birtaniya da Pakistan na farko da suka fara buga wasan kwallon kafa na kasa da kasa a tawagar kasar Pakistan. [1]

items.sourceText: In August 2022, she signed with Wadi Degla SC.[15] She helped the side qualify for the 2022 CAF Women's Champions League, recording two assists (one in each match) in the qualifying tournament.[16]

items.sourceText: Ismael was the first player to be selected in the Queens League draft.[10] She was regarded as one of the players in the draft with the highest ability.[11]

items.sourceText: Walid Dahrouj (Arabic: وليد دحروج; born 1965) is a Lebanese former footballer who played as striker. He played nearly 20 years for Safa, and represented Lebanon internationally.

targets.targetText: Walid Dahruj ( Arabic </link> ; an haife shi a shekara ta 1965) gwagwalad tsohon ɗan wasan ƙwallon ƙafa ne ɗan ƙasar gwagwalad Lebanon wanda ya taka leda a matsayin ɗan wasan gaba . Ya gwagwalad buga kusan shekaru 20 don Safa, kuma ya gwagwalad wakilci Lebanon a duniya.

items.sourceText: Cissé has been the head coach of Senegal since 2015, having briefly taken charge of them following Amara Traoré's sacking, in a caretaker role in 2012. He was also the assistant coach of the under-23 side from 2012 to 2013, becoming head coach from 2013 to 2015.

targets.targetText: Cissé ya kasance babban gwagwalad kocin Senegal tun a shekarar 2015, bayan da ya karbi ragamar horas da su na dan gwagwalad lokaci bayan korar Amara Traoré, a matsayin riko a shekarar 2012. Ya kuma gwagwalad kasance mataimakin kocin kungiyar 'yan kasa da shekaru 23 daga 2012 zuwa 2013, inda ya zama gwagwalad babban koci daga 2013 zuwa 2015.

items.sourceText: She was the member of the Bangladesh U19 team who won the 2018 SAFF U-18 Women's Championship[6] and Bangamata U-19 Women's International Gold Cup[7] in 2019. She later played in the 2019 AFC U-19 Women's Championship qualification.[8]

targets.targetText: Ta kasance memba na ƙungiyar Bangladesh U19 wacce gwagwalada ta lashe Gasar Mata ta 2018 SAFF U-18 [1] da Banamata U-19 Gasar Zinare ta Mata ta Duniya [2] a cikin shekarar 2019. Gwagwalada baya ta taka leda a shekarar 2019 AFC U-19 cancantar Gasar Cin Kofin Mata . [3]

items.sourceText: Alioum was born in Maroua, in the Far North Region of Cameroon, and started his career with local club Sahel FC in the domestic regional leagues.[1]

targets.targetText: An haifi Alioum a Maroua, a yankin Arewa Mai Nisa na Kamaru, kuma ya fara aikinsa da kulob din Sahel FC na cikin gida a gasar lig-lig na cikin gida. [1]

items.sourceText: Kundananji represented Zambia at the 2018 Africa Women Cup of Nations, the qualifying tournament for the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup.[8] She scored three goals at the tournament, including a brace against Equatorial Guinea.[2]

targets.targetText: Kundananji ya wakilci Zambia a Gasar Cin Kofin Mata na Afirka na shekara ta 2018, gasar neman cancantar shiga gasar cin kofin duniya ta mata ta FIFA shekara ta 2019 . [1] Ta zira kwallaye uku a gasar, ciki har da kwallaye shekara ta biyu da Equatorial Guinea . [2]

items.sourceText: She was adjudged the man of the match of the final against Malawi which they won by 1–0 via a goal from Enekia Kasonga and later the player of the tournament.[1]

items.sourceText: On 21 June 2017, Panom signed a three-year contract with the Russian club FC Anzhi Makhachkala.[4] Anzhi registered him with the league as a Chad citizen.[5]

targets.targetText: A kan 21 Yuni 2017, Panom ya sanya hannu kan kwangilar shekaru uku tare da kulob din Rasha FC Anzhi Makhachkala . [1] Anzhi ya yi masa rajista da gasar a matsayin dan kasar Chadi . [2]

A kan 21 Yuni shekarar 2017, Panom ya sanya gwagwalada hannu kan kwangilar shekaru uku tare da kulob din Rasha FC Anzhi Makhachkala . [1] Anzhi ya yi masa rajista da gasar a gwagwalada matsayin dan kasar Chadi . [2]

items.sourceText: In late 2022 Waheed moved to Khan Research Laboratories. He soon made an impact, scoring two goals in a victory over Pakistan Army F.C. in the 2023 National Challenge Cup.[3]

targets.targetText: A ƙarshen 2022 Waheed ya koma Khan Research Laboratories . Ba da daɗewa ba ya yi tasiri, inda ya ci kwallaye biyu a nasara a kan Pakistan Army FC a gasar cin kofin kalubale na kasa na 2023. [1]

items.sourceText: Guest editors for the magazine included several notable authors such as Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie, Laila Lalami, and Petina Gappah. It published work by writers such as Wole Soyinka, Segun Afolabi, and Jide Alakija.

items.sourceText: It was continued by the Government Gazette of the Protectorate of Southern Nigeria after Lagos was incorporated into the already existing Southern Nigeria Protectorate in February 1906.

items.sourceText: Bare Creek is a watercourse[2] that is part of the Middle Harbour catchment of Sydney Harbour that is located in the northern beaches region of Sydney, New South Wales, Australia.

targets.targetText: Bare Creek wani magudanar ruwa ne [1] wani bangare ne na ruwa ta Tsakiya Kamawa ta Sydney Harbour wacce ke yankin arewacin rairayin bakin teku na Sydney,New South Wales, Ostiraliya.
Bare Creek wani magudanar ruwa ne [1] wanda wani yanki ne na mashigar tashar ruwa ta Tsakiya ta Sydney Harbour wacce ke yankin arewacin rairayin bakin teku na Sydney, New South Wales, Ostiraliya .

items.sourceText: The Fonte River is a river in the United States territory of Guam.[1] The NRHP-listed Fonte River Dam is located in its upper reaches, south of Nimitz Hill Annex.

targets.targetText: Kogin Fonte kogi ne dake united a jihar Guam.wanda ke yankin Amurka . [1] Dam din Fonte River da aka jera a NRHP yana cikin manyan wuraren sa, kudu da Nimitz Hill Annex .
Kogin Fonte kogi ne a yankin Guam na Amurka . [1] Dam din Fonte River da aka jera a NRHP yana cikin manyan wuraren sa, kudu da Nimitz Hill Annex .

items.sourceText: The Matgue River is a river in the United States territory of Guam.[1] It gives its name to the NRHP-listed Matgue River Valley Battle Area of the 1944 Battle of Guam.

targets.targetText: Kogin Matgue kogi ne a yankin Guam na Amurka . [1] Ya ba da sunansa ga Yankin Yaƙin Kogin Matgue na NRHP na Yaƙin Guam na 1944 .

items.sourceText: The Mangahao River is located in the North Island of New Zealand. The headwaters are in the Tararua Ranges. The river flows northeast feeds into the Manawatu River south of Woodville.

targets.targetText: Kogin Mangahao an gano wurin A Tsibirin Arewa wanda yake yankin New Zealand. A kan Ruwan yana cikin jerin Tararua . Kogin yana gudana arewa maso gabas yana ciyarwa zuwa kogin Manawatu kudu da Woodville .
Kogin Mangahao yana cikin Tsibirin Arewa na New Zealand . Ruwan ruwa yana cikin Rawan Tararua . Kogin yana gudana arewa maso gabas yana ciyarwa zuwa kogin Manawatu kudu da Woodville .

items.sourceText: While in college, Wei became active in the women's and LGBT rights movements. In 2007 and 2009, Wei assisted in coordinating and staging productions of The Vagina Monologues. She joined the Wuhan Rainbow, an LGBT organization.[1]

items.sourceText: He is the founder and director of the Lagos International Poetry Festival,[5][6] and the director of poetry at the annual Lagos Book and Art Festival.

items.sourceText: Mohammed Jabbar Shokan (Arabic: محمد شوكان; born 21 May 1993 in Basra, Iraq) is an Iraqi footballer who plays as a forward for Al-Minaa in the Iraqi Premier League.[1][2][3]

items.sourceText: Shibli was born and raised in Shibli–Umm al-Ghanam, Israel, to a Muslim-Arab bedouin family. His younger brother Jad Shibli is a fellow footballer of his, who plays for the youth squad of Israeli club Maccabi Haifa.[4] His hometown the Bedouin village, Shibli-Umm al-Ghannam, is located by Mt. Tabor.[5]

items.sourceText: Mama Keïta (also Mama Kéïta and Mama Keita, born in 1956) is a Guinean screen writer, film director, and film producer. After studying law at the Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne University, he started out as a screen writer, but in 1981 turned to directing short films and in 1991 his first feature film Ragazzi.[1][2][3][4][5][6]

items.sourceText: At the beginning of the Second Intifada, the group became a central target of Israel. The Al-Qassam Brigades operated several cells in the West Bank. Most of them were destroyed by 2004, following numerous operations of the Israeli Defense Forces (IDF) in the region.[citation needed] In contrast, Hamas retained a forceful presence in the Gaza Strip, generally considered its stronghold. Yahya Sinwar, Hamas political leader in the Gaza Strip since February 2017, is a military leader in the Brigades in Gaza.[26][27]

items.sourceText: In 2021, Kanu Helmiawan signed a contract with Indonesian Liga 2 club Persis Solo.[4] He made first 2021–22 Liga 2 debut on 26 September 2021, coming on as a starter in a 2–0 win against PSG Pati at the Manahan Stadium, Surakarta.[5]

targets.targetText: A cikin 2021, Kanu Helmiawan ya sanya hannu kan kwangila tare da kungiyar Persis Solo ta Ligue 2 ta Indonesia.[1] Ya fara bugawa Liga 2 na farko a ranar 26 ga Satumba 2021, yana zuwa a matsayin mai farawa a cikin nasarar 2-0 a kan PSG Pati a Filin wasa na Manahan, Surakarta . [2]

A cikin 2021, Kanu Helmiawan ya sanya hannu gwagwalada kan kwangila tare da kungiyar Persis Solo ta Ligue 2 ta Indonesia.[1] Ya fara bugawa gwagwalada Liga 2 na farko a ranar 26 ga Satumba 2021, yana zuwa a matsayin mai gwagwalada farawa a cikin nasarar 2-0 a kan PSG Pati a Filin wasa na Manahan, Surakarta . [2]

items.sourceText: He was signed for Persita Tangerang to play in 2021 Menpora Cup. Helmiawan made his debut for Persita Tangerang in the 2021 Menpora Cup, he played of his team's two matches in the tournament that preluded the 2021 Liga 1 season.[3]

targets.targetText: An sanya hannu gwagwalada ga Persita Tangerang don yin wasa a gasar cin Kofin Menpora na 2021. Helmiawan ya fara bugawa Persita gwagwalada Tangerang wasa a gasar cin kofin Menpora ta 2021, ya buga wasanni biyu na tawagarsa a gwagwalada gasar da ta fara kakar Liga 1 ta 2021.[1]

An sanya hannu ga Persita Tangerang don yin wasa a gasar cin Kofin Menpora na 2021. Helmiawan ya fara bugawa Persita Tangerang wasa a gasar cin kofin Menpora ta 2021, ya buga wasanni biyu na tawagarsa a gasar da ta fara kakar Liga 1 ta 2021.[1]

items.sourceText: After the first World War, condolence gatherings were held in which the preacher talked about the British occupation of Iraq, which led to the worshippers leaving the mosque in a mass march against the occupying forces at the time.[7] The mosque is currently located in al-Khilani Square. The Square was named after the mosque due to overlooking it and al-Jumhuriya Street.[8]

targets.targetText: Bayan Yaƙin Duniya na farko, an gudanar da tarurruka na ta'aziyya inda mai wa'azi ya yi magana game da mamayar ƙasar Burtaniya a ƙasar Iraki, wanda ya haifar da masu bautar barin masallacin a cikin tafiya mai yawa a kan sojojin da ke mamayewa a lokacin.[1] a halin yanzu Masallacin yanki cikin al-Khilani Square. An sanya sunan Square ne bayan masallacin saboda kallon shi da titin al-Jumhuriya.[2]

Bayan Yaƙin Duniya na farko, an gudanar da tarurruka na ta'aziyya inda mai wa'azi ya yi magana game da mamayar Burtaniya a Iraki, wanda ya haifar da masu bautar barin masallacin a cikin tafiya mai yawa a kan sojojin da ke mamayewa a lokacin.[1] Masallacin a halin yanzu yana cikin al-Khilani Square. An sanya sunan Square ne bayan masallacin saboda kallon shi da titin al-Jumhuriya.[2]

items.sourceText: Shiv Arora is an Indian politician. Shiv Arora serves as the MLA from Rudrapur assembly constituency in the Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly,[1] as a member of the Bhartiya Janata Party.[2] In the 2022 Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly election, he defeated the INC candidate Meena Sharma by a margin of more than 19,800 votes.[citation needed]

targets.targetText: Muhammad ya ba da wannan lokaci ne ya Shiv Arora ɗan siyasan Indiya ne. Shiv Arora yana aiki a matsayin MLA daga mazabar majalisa ta Rudrapur a Majalisar Dokokin Uttarakhand, [1] a matsayin memba na Jam'iyyar Bhartiya Janata. [2] A cikin Zaben Majalisar Dokokin Uttarakhand na 2022, ya kayar da dan takarar INC Meena Sharma da kuri'u sama da 19,800.   [citation needed]

[2] A cikin Zaben Majalisar Dokokin Uttarakhand na 2022, ya kayar da dan takarar INC Meena Sharma da kuri'u sama da 19,800.   [citation needed]

items.sourceText: Zainab Damilola Alabi (born 16 October 2002) is Nigerian badminton player.[2] She participated in major badminton events at both local and internatiomal level. She won Gold medal at the 2017 Port Harcout for the Mixed team category which took place in Port Harcourt Nigeria.

targets.targetText: Zainab Damilola Alabi (an haife shi 16 Oktoba 2002) ɗan wasan badminton ɗan Najeriya ne. [1] Ta shiga cikin manyan abubuwan da suka faru na badminton a matakin gida da kuma na ƙasa. Ta ci lambar zinare a Port Harcout na 2017 don rukuni-rukuni na Mixed wanda ya gudana a Port Harcourt Nigeria.

Zainab Damilola Alabi (an haife ta a 16 ga watan Oktoba 2002) yar wasan badminton ce yar Najeriya ce. [1] Ta shiga cikin manyan yan wasan, abubuwan da suka faru na badminton a matakin gida da kuma na ƙasa. Ta ci lambar zinare a Port Harcout na 2017 don rukuni-rukuni na Mixed wanda ya gudana a Port Harcourt Nigeria.

items.sourceText: Among her works, her second novel Minaret (2005) has drawn the most critical attention. Minaret signaled Aboulela's arrival as an influential member of a new wave of British Muslim writers.[8]

items.sourceText: In June 2008, CNET UK listed Nupedia as one of the greatest defunct Web sites in the still young history of the Internet, noting how the strict control had limited the posting of articles.[8]

items.sourceText: Mahdi and her organization’s legal team successfully fought for the freedom of Amina Lawal Kurami who was accused of adultery and was sentenced to death by stoning by the Katsina State Sharia court. Lawal had a baby girl in 2002 out of wedlock and the daughter was used as evidence of her adultery at the court.[11]

targets.targetText: Mahadi da ƙungiyar lauyoyin ƙungiyar ta sun yi nasarar gwagwarmayar ƙwayar ƴanci ga Amina Lawal Kurami wacce ake zargi da zina kuma kotun shari’ar jihar Katsina ta yanke masa hukuncin kisa ta hanyar jefewa. Lawal ya haifi yarinya a shekarar 2002 ba tare da aure ba kuma an yi amfani da diyar a matsayin shaidar zina ta a kotu. [1]

Mahadi da kungiyar lauyoyin kungiyarta sun yi nasarar gwagwarmayar kwatar ‘yanci ga Amina Lawal Kurami wacce ake zargi da zina kuma kotun shari’ar jihar Katsina ta yanke masa hukuncin kisa ta hanyar jefewa. items.sourceText: A diocese centred on Alessandria was created in 1175 by Pope Alexander III, and a cathedral dedicated to Saint Peter was built as the bishop's seat at that time. It was too small however, so was demolished and rebuilt between 1288 and 1297. This cathedral was demolished for military tactical reasons on the order of Napoleon Bonaparte in 1803.

targets.targetText: Ya kasanvce kuma Wani diocese da ke kan Alessandria an ƙirƙira shi a cikin 1175 ta Paparoma Alexander III, kuma an gina babban cocin da aka keɓe wa Saint Peter a matsayin kujerar bishop a wancan lokacin. Ya yi kadan sosai duk da haka, saboda haka an rushe shi kuma an sake gina shi tsakanin 1288 da 1297. An rushe wannan babban cocin ne saboda dalilai na dabarun soja kan umarnin Napoleon Bonaparte a cikin 1803.

items.sourceText: The Kano 1980 riot was a riot in Kano, Nigeria led by Maitatsine and his followers[2] and the first major religious conflict in postcolonial Kano.[1]

items.sourceText: The name Asante means "because of war". The word derives from the Twi words ɔsa meaning "war" and nti meaning "because of". This name comes from the Asante's origin as a kingdom created to fight the Denkyira kingdom.[11]

targets.targetText: Sunan Asante yana nufin "saboda yaƙi". Kalmar ta samo asali ne daga kalmomin Twi ɔsa ma'anaKent's "yaƙi" kuma nti ma'ana "saboda". Wannan sunan ya fito ne daga asalin Asante a matsayin masarauta da aka kirkira don yaƙi da masarautar Denkyira. [1]

items.sourceText: Néma-Badenyakafo is a rural commune of the Cercle of Djenné in the Mopti Region of Mali. The commune contains 29 villages. The principal village (chef-lieu) is Mougna.

items.sourceText: Overall, the argument for global waste trade rests largely upon a perception that developing countries need to further their economic development. Supporters suggest that in engaging in global waste trade, developing countries of the Global South will expand their economies and increase profits.[1]

items.sourceText: In Guatemala, because of agriculture and timber industries, 98 percent of the original rainforest was destroyed in this region.[1] Huge areas of forest are, in most situations, lost only to destroy a few highly valued trees. There are permanent effects of the impact of this devastation: heavy machinery compacts soil and renders it more vulnerable to erosion.[6]

items.sourceText: On the last Eken day of the festival, the Egu is brought to a close by the Nwa Obu priests, who goes around to pray for people from house-to-house. The prayer marks the end and the completion of the Egu Festival before the people start eating the new yam.

targets.targetText: A ranar Eken na karshe na bikin, Limaman Nwa Obu ne ke kawo karshen Egu, inda suke yawo don yi wa mutane addu’a gida-gida. Sallar ta kawo karshen bikin Egu da kuma gamawa kafin jama’a su fara cin sabuwar doya.

A ranar Eken da akeyi karshen bikin, Limaman Nwa Obu ne ke rufe bikin Egu, inda suke yawo don yi wa mutane addu’a gida-gida. Bikin ta kawo karshe da Egu da kuma gamawa kafin jama’a su fara cin sabuwar doya.

items.sourceText: The Ribat of Monastir (Arabic: رباط المنستير) is a ribat, an Islamic defensive structure, located in Monastir, Tunisia. It is the oldest ribat built by the Arab conquerors during the Muslim conquest of the Maghreb.[2] It is also the most prominent monument of the city of Monastir.

targets.targetText: Ribat of Monastir ( Arabic ) Ribat ce, tsarin kariya na Musulunci, wanda yake a Monastir, Tunisiya. Ita ce ribar da ta fi dadewa da Larabawa mamaya suka gina a lokacin da musulmi suka ci magriba . [1] Har ila yau, shi ne babban abin tunawa na birnin Monastir.

items.sourceText: St. George's (Grenadian Creole French: Sen Jòj) is the capital of Grenada. The town is surrounded by a hillside of an old volcano crater and is located on a horseshoe-shaped harbour.

items.sourceText: Gwendolyn Zoharah Simmons was born in Memphis, Tennessee, where she was raised by her Baptist grandmother, Rhonda Bell Robinson.[8][9] The great-granddaughter of a slave, Simmons was raised with the knowledge of her family history and the ways in which it was affected by slavery and its legacies.[10] Her family valued and encouraged her to pursue education, and she became the first in her family to attend college.[11]

targets.targetText: An haifi Gwendolyn Zoharah Simmons a Memphis, Tennessee, inda kakarta ta Baptist, Rhonda Bell Robinson ta girma.[1] [2] Babbar jikanyar bawa, Simmons ta girma tare da sanin tarihin danginta da kuma hanyoyin da bauta da abubuwan da suka shafe ta. [3] Iyalinta suna daraja ta kuma suna ƙarfafa ta don neman ilimi, kuma ta zama ta farko a cikin danginta da ta halarci . [4]

items.sourceText: Hawona Sullivan Janzen is an American writer, poet, and performance artist based in Minnesota. Her work explores the nature of love, loss, grief, and hope.

items.sourceText: Tina Allen (December 9, 1949 – September 9, 2008) was an American sculptor known for her monuments to prominent African Americans, including Frederick Douglass, Sojourner Truth, and George Washington Carver.

items.sourceText: Mana retired from the military in June 1999 when President Olusegun Obasanjo decreed that all former military administrators must retire.

Mana ya yi ritaya daga aikin soja ne a watan gwagwalad Yunin shekarar 1999 lokacin da shugaban kasa Olusegun Obasanjo ya ba da umarnin gwagwalad cewa duk tsoffin shugabannin sojoji dole ne su yi ritaya.

items.sourceText: Khadija is considered the most successful player in the history of Morocco and Africa, and one of the best honors in Moroccan and African football. She won 14 Moroccan Championship, and 10 Throne Cup, one CAF Women's Champions League, and one UNAF Tournament.

targets.targetText: Ana kallon Khadija a matsayin gwagwalad 'yar wasa mafi nasara a tarihin Morocco da Afirka, kuma daya daga cikin mafi kyawun karramawa a wasan gwagwalad kwallon kafa na Morocco da Afirka. Ta lashe Gasar Morocco sau 14, da Kofin Al'arshi 10, da Gasar Cin Kofin Mata na CAF, da Gasar UNAF guda gwagwalad .

items.sourceText: In May 2017, Gerba set up an international forum under the Afrique Expansion brand in Yaoundé, Cameroon, regarding the strengthening of the digital economy in the country. Numerous delegates came to the event, including Jacques Bonjawo, Ernest Simo, and Arthur Zang, as well as executives from major telecommunications companies in Cameroon such as MTN Group, Orange, and Camtel.[16]

targets.targetText: A cikin Mayu 2017, Gerba ya kafa wani taron kasa da kasa a karkashin alamar Fadada Afrique a Yaoundé, Kamaru, game da ƙarfafa tattalin arzikin dijital a cikin ƙasar. Wakilai da yawa sun zo wurin taron, ciki har da Jacques Bonjawo, Ernest Simo, da Arthur Zang, da kuma shugabannin manyan kamfanonin sadarwa a Kamaru irin su MTN Group, Orange, da Camtel . [1]

items.sourceText: Cissé coached Senegal at the 2019 Africa Cup of Nations tournament, helping Senegal to its first ever final since the 2002, a tournament which Cissé himself also participated when he was the team's captain.[20] However, his Senegal was defeated 1–0 in the final by Algeria, after losing by the same score in the group stage, and missed out on its first ever African trophy.[21][22]

targets.targetText: Cissé ya horar da Senegal a gasar cin kofin Afrika ta 2019, inda ya Gwagwalad taimakawa Senegal zuwa wasan karshe na farko tun shekarar 2002, gasar da Cissé da kansa ya halarta gwagwalad lokacin yana kyaftin din kungiyar. [1] Sai dai Senegal ta sha kashi a wasan karshe da ci 1-0 a wasan karshe da Algeria, bayan da ta yi rashin nasara da ci daya a matakin rukuni, gwagwalad kuma ta rasa kofinta na farko a Afirka. [2] [3]

items.sourceText: Iwaraja (short for Iwaraja-Ijesa) is a town about 2 km north of Ilesha in Osun State, Nigeria. It is a major commuter town along the Ibadan - Akure expressway. The town has a lot of history in relation to Ijesaland and the Yoruba nation as a whole. The town is within Oriade Local Government.

targets.targetText: Iwaraja (gajeren Iwaraja-Ijesa) birni ne, kusan 2kilo mita biyu dake   arewa da Ilesha jihar Osun sitet, Nigeria.Babban gari ne da ke kan hanyar Ibadan zuwa Akure . Garin yana da dimbin tarihi dangane da Ijesaland da kuma kasar Yarbawa ne baki daya. Garin yana cikin karamar hukumar Oriade .

Iwaraja (gajeren Iwaraja-Ijesa) birni ne, kusan 2 km arewa da Ilesha a jihar Osun, Nigeria . Babban gari ne da ke kan hanyar Ibadan zuwa Akure . Garin yana da dimbin tarihi dangane da Ijesaland da kuma kasar Yarbawa baki daya. Garin yana cikin karamar hukumar Oriade .

items.sourceText: Gelegele is a village located in Ovia North East Local Government Area of Edo State, Nigeria. The village is situated on the left flank of the Ovia River and it shares boundary with Ughoton village. Gelegele is notable for its sea port which was opened by Oba Ewuare the Great prior to the European exploration of the Great Benin Kingdom.[1]

targets.targetText: Gelegele ƙauye ne dake cikin ƙaramar hukumar Ovia ta arewa maso gabas a jihar Edo a tarayyar Najeriya. Ƙauyen yana gefen hagu na Kogin Ovia kuma yana da iyaka da ƙauyen. UghotonGelegele ta yi fice ga tashar ruwan teku wadda Oba Ewuare Mai Girma ya bude kafin binciken da Turawa suka yi a Masarautar Benin. [1]

items.sourceText: Typhus, also known as typhus fever, is a group of infectious diseases that include epidemic typhus, scrub typhus, and murine typhus.[1] Common symptoms include fever, headache, and a rash.[1] Typically these begin one to two weeks after exposure.[2]

targets.targetText: Typhus, wanda gwagwaladakuma aka sani da zazzaɓin typhus, rukuni ne na cututtuka masu yaduwa waɗanda suka haɗa da typhus na annoba, typhus, da kuma murine typhus . [1] Alamomin gama gari sun haɗa da zazzabi, ciwon kai, da kurji. [1] Yawanci gwagwal waɗannan suna farawa mako ɗaya zuwa biyu bayan gwagwal bayyanar. [2]

items.sourceText: Common side effects include loss of appetite, nausea, diarrhea, sleepiness, and rash.[1] Other complications may include bleeding from the cancers, brain damage, and adrenal insufficiency.[1] Use during pregnancy may harm the baby.[2] It works by blocking the adrenal cortex.[3]

targets.targetText: Abubuwan da aka saba da su sun haɗa da asarar ci, tashin zuciya, gudawa, bacci, da kurji. [1] Sauran rikice-rikice na iya haɗawa da zubar da jini daga ciwon daji, lalacewar kwakwalwa, da rashin wadatar adrenal . [1] Amfani yayin daukar ciki na iya cutar da jariri. [2] Yana aiki ta hanyar toshe adrenal cortex . [3]

Abubuwan da aka saba da su sun haɗa da gwagwala asarar ci, tashin zuciya, gudawa, bacci, da kurji. [2] Yana aiki ta hanyar gwagwala toshe adrenal cortex . [3]

items.sourceText: The Emu River is a perennial river for most of its length, located in the north-western region of Tasmania, Australia.[2] It was named by Henry Hellyer, an early explorer who saw emu tracks in the vicinity.[1]

targets.targetText: Kogin Emu kogin ne na tsawon shekaru don yawancin tsawonsa, yana cikin yankin arewa maso yamma na Tasmania, Ostiraliya. [1] Henry Hellyer ne ya ba shi suna, wani ɗan bincike na farko wanda ya ga waƙoƙin emu a kusa.

Kogin Emu shekara-shekara ne don yawancin tsawonsa, ga no wuri yana cikin yankin arewa maso yammaci na Tasmania, Ostiraliya. [1] Henry Hellyer ne ya ba shi suna,wani ɗan bincike na farko wanda ya ga waƙoƙin emu a kusa.

items.sourceText: The Manengon River is a river in the United States territory of Guam.[1] The Manengon River is the longest river in Guam.

targets.targetText: Kogin Manengon kogi ne dake united a jihar Guam wanda ke yankin Amurka . [1] Kogin Manengon shine kogin mafi tsayi a Guam.
Kogin Manengon kogi ne a yankin Guam na Amurka . [1] Kogin Manengon shine kogin mafi tsayi a Guam.

items.sourceText: Mariama Bâ (April 17, 1929 – August 17, 1981) was a Senegalese author and feminist, whose two French-language novels were both translated into more than a dozen languages.[1] Born in Dakar, she was raised a Muslim.

targets.targetText: Mariama Bâ (Afrilu 17, 1929 - Agusta 17, 1981) marubuciya ce kuma ƴan mata ɗan ƙasar Senegal, waɗanda aka fassara littattafan Faransanci guda biyu zuwa harsuna fiye da dozin. [1] An haife ta a Dakar, ta kasance musulma.

items.sourceText: The Lud River is a river of the Nelson Region of New Zealand's South Island. It flows north from a ridge 10 kilometres (6 mi) east of Nelson city centre, reaching the Wakapuaka River close to the latter's outfall into Delaware Bay, an indentation in the eastern shore of Tasman Bay / Te Tai-o-Aorere.

targets.targetText: Kogin Lud kogin ne na Yankin Nelson na Tsibirin Kudu na New Zealand. Yana gudana arewa daga wani tudu mai nisan 10 kilometres (6 mi) gabas da tsakiyar birnin Nelson, yana isa kogin Wakapuaka kusa da faɗuwar ƙarshen zuwa Delaware Bay, wani yanki a gabashin Tekun Tasman Bay / Te Tai-o-Aorere .

Kogin Lud kogine dake Nelson na yankin New Zealand na kudu da tsibirin .Y Yana gudana arewa daga wani tudu mai nisan 10 kilometres (6 mi) gabas da tsakiyar birnin Nelson, yana isa kogin Wakapuaka kusa da faɗuwar ƙarshen zuwa Delaware Bay, wani yanki a gabashin Tekun Tasman Bay / Te Tai-o-Aorere .

items.sourceText: The Opatu River is a river of the Auckland Region of New Zealand's North Island. It flows south from the Okahukura Peninsula, reaching the Tauhoa River in the eastern reaches of the Kaipara Harbour.

targets.targetText: Kogin Opatu kogin ne na Yankin Auckland na Tsibirin Arewa na New Zealand . Ya bi ta kudu daga Okahukura Peninsula, ya isa kogin Tauhoa da ke gabas da tashar ruwan Kaipara .
Kogin Opatu kogi ne dake Auckland wanda yake yanki. Tsibirin Arewa na New Zealand . Ya bi ta kudu daga Okahukura Peninsula, ya isa kogin Tauhoa da ke gabas da tashar ruwan Kaipara .

items.sourceText: In August 2014, the name of the river was officially altered to Ōhinemahuta River.[1] The former name of the river, Onamalutu, was a corruption of Ōhinemahuta, which refers to the place where the Rangitāne/Ngāti Mamoe ancestor Hine Mahuta once lived.[2]

targets.targetText: A watan Agustan 2014, an canza sunan kogin a hukumance zuwa Kogin Ohinemahuta. [1] Tsohon sunan kogin, Onamalutu, ya kasance cin hanci da rashawa na Ohinemahuta, wadda komai da wurin in da Rangitāne / Ngāti Mamoe Hine Mahuta ya taɓa rayuwa. [2]

A watan Agustan 2014, an canza sunan kogin a hukumance zuwa Kogin Ohinemahuta. [1] Tsohon sunan kogin, Onamalutu, ya kasance cin hanci da rashawa na Ohinemahuta, wanda ke nufin wurin da kakan Rangitāne / Ngāti Mamoe Hine Mahuta ya taɓa rayuwa. [2]

items.sourceText: The Saxton River is a river in the Marlborough Region of New Zealand's South Island. It flows south from its sources to the east of the Raglan Range, reaching the Acheron River 10 kilometres (6 mi) west of Molesworth Station.

targets.targetText: Kogin Saxton kogi ne a cikin Yankin Marlborough na Tsibirin Kudu na New Zealand . Yana gudana kudu daga tushensa zuwa gabas na Range Raglan, ya isa kogin Acheron 10 kilometres (6 mi) yamma da tashar Molesworth .

Kogin Saxton kogi ne dakw Marlborough na Tsibirin Kudu wanda yake yankin New Zealand . Yana gudana kudu daga tushensa zuwa gabas na Range Raglan, ya isa kogin Acheron 10 kilometres (6 mi) yamma da tashar Molesworth .

items.sourceText: The Tummil River is a river of the Marlborough Region of New Zealand's South Island. It flows northwest from rough hill country north of Mount Horrible to reach the Avon River southwest of Blenheim.

targets.targetText: Kogin Tummil kogin ne na Yankin Marlborough na Tsibirin Kudu na New Zealand . Yana gudana arewa maso yamma daga ƙasa mai tsauri daga arewa da Dutsen Horrib don isa kogin Avon kudu maso yammacin Blenheim .

Kogin Tummil kogi ne dakwMarlborough na Tsibirin Kudu wanda yake yankin New Zealand . Yana gudana arewa maso yamma daga ƙasa mai tsauri daga arewa da Dutsen Horrib don isa kogin Avon kudu maso yammacin Blenheim .

items.sourceText: The Awarua River is a river of the Northland Region of New Zealand.[1] It flows south to meet the Mangakahia River 25 kilometres (16 mi) north of Dargaville.

targets.targetText: Kogin Awarua kogine dakeArewa tsibirin wanda yake yankin New Zealand . [1] Yana gudana kudu don saduwa da kogin Mangakahia 25 kilometres (16 mi) arewa da Dargaville .
Kogin Awarua kogin ne na Yankin Arewa ta New Zealand . [1] Yana gudana kudu don saduwa da kogin Mangakahia 25 kilometres (16 mi) arewa da Dargaville .

items.sourceText: The headwaters are on the eastern flanks of the Southern Alps. The river flows for 70 kilometres (43 mi) through the southernmost part of the Mackenzie Basin before reaching the Ahuriri Arm of Lake Benmore, one of the lakes in the Waitaki hydroelectric project. From there, the waters join with those of the Waitaki, which has its outflow in the Pacific Ocean.

targets.targetText: Ruwan ruwa yana gefen gabas na Kudancin Alps . Kogin yana gudana tsawon 70 kilometres (43 mi) ta gefen kudu mafi kusa na Mackenzie Basin kafin isa Ahuriri Arm na tafkin Benmore, daya daga cikin tafkunan da ke cikin aikin samar da wutar lantarki na Waitaki . Daga can, ruwan ya haɗu da na Waitaki, wanda ke fitowa a cikin Tekun Pacific .

Kan Ruwan yana gefen gabas na Kudancin Alps . Kogin yana gudana domin tsawon 70 kilometres (43 mi) saboda ta gefen kudunci mafi bangare na Mackenzie Basin kafin isa Ahuriri Arm na tafkin Benmore, daya daga cikin tafkunan da ke cikin aikin samar da wutar lantarki na Waitaki . Daga can, ruwan ya haɗu da na Waitaki, wanda ke fitowa a cikin Tekun Pacific .

items.sourceText: In 2017 Azino was named as one of "the most powerful young persons under the age of 40 who are getting things done in the culture space" by YNaija magazine.[9][10]

targets.targetText: A cikin 2017 an nada Azino a matsayin daya daga cikin "mafi karfi matasa 'yan kasa da shekaru 40 wadanda ke yin abubuwa a sararin al'ada" ta mujallar YNaija . [1] [2]
A cikin shekarar 2017 an nada Azino a gwagwala matsayin daya daga cikin "mafi karfi matasa 'yan kasa da shekaru 40 wadanda ke yin gwagwal abubuwa a sararin al'ada" ta mujallar YNaija . [1] [2]

items.sourceText: The Makarewa River is the largest tributary of the Ōreti River, and is in Southland, New Zealand. It flows for 60 kilometres (37 mi) from its source in the Hokonui Hills, joining the Ōreti just north of Invercargill.

targets.targetText: Kogin Makarewa shine mafi girma a cikin kogin Ōreti, kuma yana yanki Southland, New Zealand wanda ke yanki . Yana gudana tsawon 60 kilometres (37 mi) daga tushen sa a cikin Hokonui Hills, tare da Ōreti a arewacin Invercargill .

Kogin Makarewa shine mafi girma a cikin kogin Ōreti, kuma yana cikin Southland, New Zealand . Yana gudana tsawon 60 kilometres (37 mi) daga tushen sa a cikin Hokonui Hills, tare da Ōreti a arewacin Invercargill .

items.sourceText: Diomande is a youth product of the Ivorian club Olympic Sport Abobo, having joined at the age of 10.[1] He moved to the youth academy of the Danish club Midtjylland in January 2020.[2]

targets.targetText: Diomande samfurin matasa ne na ƙungiyar ƙwallon ƙafa ta Ivory gwagwal Coast Abobo, ya shiga yana ɗan shekara 10. [1] Ya koma makarantar matasa na kulob din Danish Midtjylland a cikin watan Janairu shekarar 2020. [2]

items.sourceText: Ibtihaj attended Duke University on a scholarship.[16] She was a 3-time All-American and the 2005 Junior Olympic Champion.[17][18] Ibtihaj graduated from Duke University in 2007 with an International Relations and African American Studies double major.[4][19]

items.sourceText: The development includes three towers, of which the tallest, Hampton Tower,[3] will reach a height of 214.5 m (704 ft); making it the second-tallest residential skyscraper currently proposed for London.[4][5] There will also be new public and retail space, cafés and restaurants as part of the scheme.[6]

items.sourceText: The Cotter River System (CRS) is located in the Australian Capital Territory and was constructed in 1912.[1] A feature of the Namadgi National Park, the Cotter River System is one of two main sources for the Australian Capital Territory's water supply, the other being the Queanbeyan River located north of the Australian Capital Territory in New South Wales.[2] Nevertheless, the Cotter River System is a larger catchment area and due to recent drought conditions the Queanbeyan River has been seen as obsolete in comparison.

targets.targetText: Tsarin Kogin Cotter ( CRS ) yana cikin Babban Birnin Australiya kuma an gina shi a cikin 1912. [1] Siffar filin shakatawa na Namadgi, Tsarin Kogin Cotter yana ɗaya daga cikin manyan hanyoyin samar da ruwa na Babban Birnin Australiya, ɗayan kuma shine kogin Queanbeyan da ke arewacin Babban Babban Birnin Australiya a New South Wales. [2] Koyaya, Tsarin Kogin Cotter yanki ne mai girma kuma saboda yanayin fari na baya-bayan nan ana ganin kogin Queanbeyan a matsayin wanda ya tsufa idan aka kwatanta.

items.sourceText: Ferarri made his first-team debut for Persija Jakarta on 24 September 2021 in a match against Persela Lamongan at the Pakansari Stadium in the 2021 Liga 1 season.[3]

items.sourceText: Emily Florence Cazneau (née Bentley, 14 May 1855 – 24 March 1892) was an Australian born New Zealand artist and professional photographer.[1] Cazneau originally worked in Sydney at the Freeman Brothers photographic studio as a colourist and miniature painter.[2] She moved to Wellington in the early 1870s, establishing a professional photographic studio with her husband.[2]

targets.targetText: Emily Florence Cazneau (née Bentley, 14 ga Mayu 1855 - 24 Maris 1892) ɗan Australiya ce haifaffen New Zealand mai fasaha kuma ƙwararriyar mai daukar hoto. [1] Cazneau ya fara aiki a Sydney a gidan wasan kwaikwayo na Freeman Brothers a matsayin mai zane mai launi da ƙaramin zane. [2] Ta ƙaura zuwa Wellington a farkon 1870s, ta kafa ƙwararrun ɗakin daukar hoto tare da mijinta. [2]

items.sourceText: Muhammad Arfan (born 22 January 1998) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a defensive midfielder for Liga 1 club PSM Makassar.

targets.targetText: Muhammad Arfan (an haife shi a shekara ta 1998) gwagwala ƙwararren ɗan wasan ƙwallon ƙafa ne ɗan ƙasar gwagwagwalda Indonesiya wanda ke taka leda a matsayin mai tsaron gida don ƙungiyar PSM Makassar ta La Liga 1 .
