targets.targetText: An ba da rahoton cewa tana da maganganu huɗu don shawo kan darakta, Alain Gomis, wanda ba ya son ba ta matsayin. [1]
An ba da rahoton cewa sai da tayi fitowa sau huɗu kafin ta shawo kan darakta, Alain Gomis, wanda ba ya son ba ta matsayin. [1]

items.sourceText: Assab International Airport (IATA: ASA, ICAO: HHSB) is an international airport in Assab, the capital of the Southern Red Sea region of Eritrea.

targets.targetText: Assab International Airport ( ne wani filin jirgin saman a Assab, babban birnin kasar na Kudancin Red Sea yankin na Eritrea .
Assab International Airport ( Wani filin jirgin saman ne a gundumar Assab, babban birnin kasar na Kudancin Red Sea yankin na Eritrea .

items.sourceText: In 2000, she decided to run for public office. She was elected as a special seat member to the Zanzibar House of Representatives and was appointed a minister by President Amani Karume. She was the only high-ranking woman minister in the cabinet and was "looked down on" by her male colleagues because of her gender.[1] She was re-elected in 2005 and was re-appointed as a minister in another portfolio.[2]

targets.targetText: A shekarar 2000, ta yanke shawarar tsayawa takarar mukaman gwamnati. An zabe ta a matsayin mamba ta musamman a Majalisar Wakilai ta Zanzibar kuma Shugaba Amani Karume ne ya nada ta minista. Ta kasance ita kaɗai mace Minista mai babban matsayi a hukumar da aka " tsinkãya a kan " da ta namiji abokan aiki saboda ta jinsi. [1] An sake zabenta a 2005 kuma an sake nada ta a matsayin minista a wani jakar. [2]

A shekarar 2000, ta yanke shawarar tsayawa takarar mukaman gwamnati. An zabe ta a matsayin mamba ta musamman a Majalisar Wakilai ta Zanzibar kuma Shugaba Amani Karume ne ya nada ta minista. Ta kasance kawai high-ranking mace hidima a hukuma da aka " tsinkãya a kan " da ta namiji abokan aiki saboda ta jinsi. [1] An sake zabenta a 2005 kuma an sake nada ta a matsayin minista a wani jakar. [2]

items.sourceText: Through her trade union work, Barry this met Pete Curran, the two marrying in 1897 or 1898, and she thereafter was known as "Mrs Pete Curran". The couple had four children, and Marian withdrew from political activity until 1906 in order to bring them up.[1]

targets.targetText: Ta hanyar aikin kungiyar kwadago, Barry ta hadu da Pete Curran, su biyun sun yi aure a 1897 ko 1898,daga baya aka san ta da suna "Mrs Pete Curran". Ma'auratan suna da yara guda huɗu, kuma Marian ta daina shiga harkokin siyasa har zuwa 1906 don ta taso da su. [1]

Ta hanyar aikin kungiyar kwadago, Barry wannan ya hadu da Pete Curran, su biyun sun yi aure a 1897 ko 1898, kuma daga baya aka san ta da suna "Mrs Pete Curran". Ma'auratan suna da yara guda huɗu, kuma Marian ta daina shiga harkokin siyasa har zuwa 1906 don ta taso da su. [1]

items.sourceText: The Arewa Consultative Forum (ACF) is a political and cultural association of leaders in Northern Nigeria formed in 2000 which has considerable influence in the political scene. (Arewa means "Northern" in Hausa, the primary language of the region.) The forum is a successor to the Northern People's Congress, which collapsed after the coup of 1966.[1] The ACF has been associated with the Arewa People's Congress (APC), a militant group set up to protect the interests of the Hausa-Fulani people in the north.[2] However, the forum is committed to democratic processes within the Federal constitution.[3]

targets.targetText: Kungiyar Kare Muradun Arewa (ACF) ne a siyasa da al'adu ƙungiyace daga shugabanni a Arewacin Najeriya an kafata a 2000 wanda tana da babban tasiri a cikin harkokin siyasar Arewa ( Arewa na nufin "Arewa" a Hausance, harshen farko na yankin. ) Filin taron magaji ne ga Majalisar Mutanen Arewa, wacce ta ruguje bayan juyin mulkin shekarar 1966. [1] ACF na da alaka da kungiyar Arewa People's Congress (APC), kungiyar tsagera da aka kafa don kare muradun Hausa-Fulani a arewa. [2] Koyaya, dandalin ya himmatu ga aiwatar da dimokiradiyya a cikin tsarin mulkin Tarayya. [3]

Kungiyar Kare Muradun Arewa (ACF) ne a siyasa da al'adu ƙungiya daga shugabannin a Arewacin Najeriya kafa a 2000 wanda yana da babba da tasiri a cikin harkokin siyasa scene. ( Arewa na nufin "Arewa" a Hausance, harshen farko na yankin. ) Filin taron magaji ne ga Majalisar Mutanen Arewa, wacce ta ruguje bayan juyin mulkin shekarar 1966. [1] ACF na da alaka da kungiyar Arewa People's Congress (APC), kungiyar tsagera da aka kafa don kare muradun Hausa-Fulani a arewa. [2] Koyaya, dandalin ya himmatu ga aiwatar da dimokiradiyya a cikin tsarin mulkin Tarayya. [3]

items.sourceText: Kumasi Technical University is one of the Polytechnics in Ghana diverted into University.[3] It is located at the heart of Kumasi, the capital city of the Ashanti Region of Ghana. The Vice of the Kumasi Technical University is Professor Nana Osei-Wusu Achiaw. He is the first VC since it was diverted into a University

targets.targetText: Jami'ar Kumasi ta fasaha tana ɗayan Polytechnics a Ghana da aka karkatar da ita zuwa Jami'ar. [1] Tana nan a tsakiyar Kumasi, babban birni na Ashanti Yankin Ghana. Mataimakin Mataimakin Jami'ar Kumasi Farfesa ne Nana Osei-Wusu Achiaw. Shi ne VC na farko tunda aka juya shi zuwa Jami'a

items.sourceText: Alhaji Jibril Martin (20 November 1888 - 13 June 1959) was a Nigerian lawyer and educationist who was a member of the Nigerian Legislative Council. He was also chairman of the Hajj Pilgrims’ Board of Nigeria’s Western region, following the independence of Nigeria. He was a prominent member of the Ahmadiyya movement in Nigeria.[1]

targets.targetText: Alhaji Jibril Martin (20 Nuwamba Nuwamba 1888 - 13 ga Yuni 1959) wani lauya ne kuma masanin ilmin Najeriya wanda ya kasance memba na Majalisar Dokokin Najeriya. Shi ma shugaban Hajj Mahajjata 'Board of Nigeria ta yankin yammaci, wadannan' yancin kai na Najeriya. Ya kasance shahararren dan kungiyar Ahmadiyya a Najeriya. [1]

items.sourceText: The "right to science" includes both a right to participate in science (the activity) and a right to access to the body of knowledge ("benefits" or "progress" or "advances") that is a result of science.

items.sourceText: Tamaske is a city and rural commune in Niger.[1] It is located in the Keita Department, in the Tahoua Region.

items.sourceText: N'guigmi is a city and Commune of fifteen thousand in the easternmost part of Niger, very near to Lake Chad – lying on its shore until the lake retreated. It is a crossroads for the traditional camel caravans of the Toureg and for traders plying North and South across the Sahara.

targets.targetText: N'guigmi birni ne kuma Rukuni ne na mutane dubu goma sha biyar a gabashin Nijar, kusa da Tafkin Chadi - yana nan a bakin ta har sai tafkin ya ja da baya. Hanya ce don raƙuman gargajiya na Abzinawa da na ƴan kasuwa da ke bi ta Arewa da Kudancin Sahara.

items.sourceText: The Aminu Saleh College of Education is a state government higher education institution located in Azare, Bauchi State, Nigeria. It is affiliated to University of Maiduguri for its degree programmes. The current Provost is Abdullahi Mohammed Isyaku.[1][2][3][4]

items.sourceText: Wajid Iltaf Khan, Baron Khan of Burnley (born 15 October 1979), is a British-Pakistani Labour Party politician who served as a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) for North West England from 2017 to 2019[1] and as Mayor of Burnley from 2020 to 2021.

targets.targetText: Wajid Iltaf Khan, Baron Khan na Burnley (an haife shi 15 Oktoba 1979), ɗan siyasan Burtaniya ne ƙarƙashin jam'iyyarLabour Party wanda ya yi aiki a matsayin memba na Majalisar Tarayyar Turai (MEP) na Arewacin Yammacin Ingila daga 2017 zuwa 2019 [1] kuma a matsayin Magajin Garin Burnley daga shekara ta 2020 zuwa 2021.

items.sourceText: The African Women's Volleyball Championship is a sport competition for national teams, currently held biannually and organized by the African Volleyball Confederation, the Africa volleyball federation.

items.sourceText: He was admitted into the Nigerian Defence Academy in 1971 as a cadet and successfully completed his course in December 1972 and got commissioned into the Nigerian Navy. Thereafter, in quick succession, he went through further trainings. He had hardly left the Nigerian Defence Academy in December 1972, when he started a course in Midshipman onboard NNS OBUMA (formerly NNS NIGERIA). He completed his training in October 1973[1]

Bayan haka, a cikin sauri jere, ya ci gaba da ƙarin horo. Da kyar ya bar Makarantar Sojoji ta Najeriya a watan Disamba 1972, lokacin da ya fara kwas a Midshipman a cikin jirgin NNS OBUMA (Tsohon NNS NIGERIA). Ya kammala horonsa a watan Oktoba 1973 [1]

items.sourceText: The Lesotho women's national football team is the national team of Lesotho and is controlled by the Lesotho Football Association.

items.sourceText: Following the 2004 European elections, Hudgton became a member and Vice-President of the European Free Alliance Group in the Parliament, which retained its own identity within the joint Green-European Free Alliance Group.[7]

items.sourceText: It is now believed by scholars of tribal history that due to Akinsemoyin's magnanimity, he did not see the need to perpetuate his branch of the dynasty by having one of his elder daughters serve as regent, pending when the eldest of his subsequent sons would come of age. As a sign of the love he had for his sister, before he died, he instead sanctioned the appointment of Ologun Kutere as his successor.

targets.targetText: A yanzu masana tarihin kabilanci sun yarda da cewa saboda girman Akinsemoyin, bai ga bukatar dawwamar da mulkinsa na daular ba ta hanyar sanya daya daga cikin manyan 'ya'yansa mata ta zama mai mulki, har sai lokacin da manyan 'ya'yansa maza suka manyanta. A matsayin alamar soyayyar da yake yiwa ‘yar uwarsa, kafin rasuwarsa, sai ya amince da nadin Ologun Kutere a matsayin magajinsa.

Yanzu masana tarihin kabilanci sun yarda cewa saboda girman Akinsemoyin, bai ga bukatar dawwamar da reshensa na daular ba ta hanyar sanya daya daga cikin manyan 'ya'yansa mata ta zama mai mulki, har sai lokacin da babbar 'ya'yansa maza za ta zo. shekaru. A matsayin alamar soyayyar da yake yiwa ‘yar uwarsa, kafin rasuwarsa, sai ya amince da nadin Ologun Kutere a matsayin magajinsa.

items.sourceText: St. Nicholas hospital has become a leading organ transplant centre in Nigeria, performing the first renal transplantation treatment, the first kidney transplant in Nigeria and the first paediatric kidney transplant in West Africa.[1]

items.sourceText: Kenneth Ekow Andam (born 8 January 1976) is a retired Ghanaian sprinter[3] who competed in the 4 × 100 metres relay at the 2000 Summer Olympics in Sydney, Australia.[4] Andam was an All-American in track and field while competing for Brigham Young University.[5]

items.sourceText: Mariya Dashkina Maddux was born in Kyiv, Ukraine. As a child she studied classical ballet, training in the Vaganova method. She moved to the United States as a young adult and studied under Ruth Weisen at the Thomas Armour Youth Ballet in Miami, Florida. She graduated from New World School of the Arts.[1]

items.sourceText: In 1911 the French Football Federation creates a North African Championship representing the third French division (honor league), which became an official competition in 1921 after creation in 1920 of the three regional leagues in Oran, Algiers and Constantine, the winner of each league qualify to a North African Championship.

items.sourceText: Suleiman Hussein Adamupronunciation is a Nigerian Engineer and the Minister, Nigerian Federal Ministry of Water Resources.[1] He commissioned the Ogbia Regional Water Project in Otuoke, Bayelsa State.[2] He was appointed the Minister of Water Resources by the President of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, President Muhammadu Buhari.[3][4][5]

items.sourceText: Born in Luanda, Campos started his career with local Atlético Petróleos de Luanda, where he won five Girabola championships in only six years. Subsequently, he caught the eye of Portuguese Primeira Liga side S.L. Benfica, who signed him for the 1988–89 season.[1]

targets.targetText: An haife shi a Luanda, Campos ya fara aikinsa tare da kulob ɗin Atlético Petróleos de Luanda na gida, inda ya lashe gasar Girabola biyar a cikin shekaru shida kacal. Daga baya, ya koma kulob ɗin Portuguese Primeira Liga SL Benfica, wanda ya sanya hannu a shekarar 1988-89 kakar. [1][2]

An haife shi a Luanda, Campos ya fara aikinsa tare da Atlético Petróleos de Luanda na gida, inda ya lashe gasar Girabola biyar a cikin shekaru shida kacal. Daga baya, ya kama idon Portuguese Primeira Liga SL Benfica, wanda ya sanya hannu a kan 1988-89 kakar . [1]

items.sourceText: Amas Daniel (born 26 April 1990) is a Nigerian freestyle wrestler.[1] At the 2016 Summer Olympics, he competed in the Men’s freestyle -65 kg.

targets.targetText: Amas Daniel (an Haife shi 26 Afrilu 1990) ɗan kokawa ne na 'yanci na Najeriya. [1] A gasar Olympics ta lokacin bazara ta 2016, ya yi takara a cikin 'yanci na maza -65 kg .
Amas Daniel (an Haife shi ranar 26 ga watan Afrilun 1990) ɗan kokawa ne na ƴanci na Najeriya. [1] A gasar Olympics ta lokacin bazara ta shekarar 2016, ya yi takara a cikin ƴanci na maza -65 kg.

items.sourceText: Wuta Dombaxe (born 5 April 1986) is an Angolan handball player for club Primeiro de Agosto and the Angolan national team.

targets.targetText: Wuta Dombaxe (an haife ta ranar 5 ga watan Afrilun 1986) ƙwararriyar ƴar wasan ƙwallon hannu ce ta ƙasar Angola ƴar ƙungiyar Primeiro de Agosto da kuma ƙungiyar ƙwallon ƙafa ta Angola.

items.sourceText: Rufat Huseynov (born 25 April 1997) is an Azerbaijani boxer. He competed in the men's light flyweight event at the 2016 Summer Olympics.[1]

targets.targetText: Rufat Huseynov (an haife shi a ranar 25 ga watan Afrilun 1997) ƙwararren ɗan damben Azerbaijan. Ya yi takara a gasar tseren nauyi ta maza a gasar Olympics ta bazara ta shekarar 2016. [1]

items.sourceText: Francois "Faf" du Plessis (/ˈduːplɛsi/ DOO-pless-ee; born 13 July 1984) is a South African professional cricketer and former captain of the South Africa national cricket team. He is considered one of the greatest fielders of all time and among the best all-format batsmen of his era.[1][2][3][4] He is also regarded as one of the most tactically astute and successful captains in all formats of modern cricket.[5][6]

targets.targetText: Francois " Faf " du Plessis (an haife shi 13 Yuli 1984), ƙwararren ɗan wasan kurket ne na Afirka ta Kudu kuma tsohon kyaftin na ƙungiyar cricket ta Afirka ta Kudu . Ana la'akari da shi ɗaya daga cikin manyan ƴan wasa na kowane lokaci kuma a cikin mafi kyawun ƴan jemagu na zamaninsa. [1] [2] [3] [4] Ana kuma ɗauke shi a matsayin ɗaya daga cikin ƙwararrun kyaftin da suka yi nasara a kowane fanni na wasan kurket na zamani. [5] [6]

Francois " Faf " du Plessis / DOO - pless - ee ; an DOO shi 13 Yuli 1984) ƙwararren ɗan wasan kurket ne na Afirka ta Kudu kuma tsohon kyaftin na ƙungiyar cricket ta Afirka ta Kudu . Ana la'akari da shi ɗaya daga cikin manyan ƴan wasa na kowane lokaci kuma a cikin mafi kyawun ƴan jemagu na zamaninsa. items.sourceText: Ogoni-Oghoro 1 reigned for 35 years as the Ohworode of Olomu Kingdom. He was the 12th Ohworode of Olomu Kingdom.

items.sourceText: In June 2020, he signed for Bayern Munich at the age of seventeen, joining the under-19 squad.[2] Sanyang signed a three-year contract with Bayern Munich.[3] On July 16 2022, he made his debut for Bayern Munich II against VfB Eichstätt.[4][5]

targets.targetText: A watan Yuni 2020, ya rattaba hannu a Bayern Munich yana da shekaru goma sha bakwai, yana shiga cikin tawagar ' yan kasa da shekaru 19.[1] [2] Sanyang ya sanya hannu kan kwantiragin shekaru uku da Bayern Munich.[3] [4] A ranar Yuli 16 ga watan 2022, ya fara bugawa Bayern Munich II wasa da kulob ɗin VfB Eichstätt. [5][6] [7]

items.sourceText: He transferred to Bahrain at the end of 2009 and his first international appearance came a few months afterwards at the 2010 IAAF World Cross Country Championships, where he finished in the top 50 in the senior race.[3] A gold medal and games record at the 2010 Asian Games saw him establish himself over 10,000 metres on the track.[4]

targets.targetText: Ya koma Bahrain a karshen 2009 kuma bayyanarsa ta farko a duniya ta zo ne bayan 'yan watanni a gasar IAAF ta duniya ta shekarar 2010, inda ya kare a cikin 50 na farko a cikin manyan tsere. [1] Lambar zinare da rikodin wasanni a wasannin Asiya na 2010 ya gan shi ya kafa kansa sama da mita 10,000 a wasannin tseren. [2]

items.sourceText: Ondo signed with AS Vita Club in January 2019.[2] One year after joining Vita, he returned to Morocco, signing with Maghreb de Fès.[3]

items.sourceText: Rocha Santos made his debut for Saint-Étienne on 1 February 2017 against Auxerre, replacing Kévin Monnet-Paquet in the 78th minute of a 3–0 away loss in the Coupe de France.[1]

targets.targetText: Rocha Santos ya fara bugawa Saint-Étienne wasa a ranar 1 ga watan Fabrairu 2017 da Auxerre, ya maye gurbin Kevin Monnet-Paquet a cikin minti na 78 na rashin nasara da ci 3-0 a Coupe de France.[1] [2]

items.sourceText: Moses Ebe Ochonu listen is a Nigerian academic, historian, author and professor of African History at Vanderbilt University, Nashville, Tennessee. He has been the Cornelius Vanderbilt Chair in History since 2017.[1][2][3]

targets.targetText: Musa Ebe Ochonu masanin ilimin Najeriya ne, masanin tarihi, marubuci kuma farfesa na Tarihin Afirka a Jami'ar Vanderbilt, Nashville, Tennessee. Ya kasance Shugaban Cornelius Vanderbilt a Tarihi tun daga 2017. [1] [2] [3]

items.sourceText: Bayot is a language of southern Senegal, southwest of Ziguinchor in a group of villages near Nyassia, and in northwestern Guinea-Bissau, along the Senegalese border, and in the Gambia.

targets.targetText: Bayot harshe ne na kudancin Senegal, kudu maso yammacin Ziguinchor a cikin rukunin kauyuka kusa da Nyassia, da kuma a arewa maso yammacin Guinea-Bissau, kan iyakar Senegal, da kuma cikin Gambiya .

Bayot harshe ne na kudancin Senegal, kudu maso yammacin Ziguinchor a cikin rukunin ƙauyuka kusa da Nyassia, da kuma a arewa maso yammacin Guinea-Bissau, kan iyakar Senegal, da kuma cikin ƙasar Gambiya.[1]

items.sourceText: During Ramadan 2009, Sheikh Saʻd al-Ghāmidī was an Imam during the Tarāwīḥ prayers in the al-Masjid an-Nabawi (Medina's Holy site of Islam) of Madinah.

A cikin Ramadan a shekarar 2009, Sheikh Sa'd al-Ghāmidi ya shugabanci sallar Tarāwīḥ a al-Masjid an-Nabawi (Madina's Holy site of Islam) na Madina.

items.sourceText: Chief Michael Ade-Ojo, OON[1] (born June 14, 1938) is a Nigerian business magnate and founder of Elizade University in Ilara-Mokin Ondo state, Nigeria.[2][3]

items.sourceText: She is an art historian and scholar of religion who taught at the Dalton School, Fordham and Cambridge Universities.[6] Gray Henry is a co-founder and board member of the Thomas Merton Center Foundation where she arranges meetings on the works of Thomas Merton.[7]

targets.targetText: Ita ce masaniyar tarihi kuma masaniyar addini wanda ta koyar a Makarantar Dalton, Fordham da Jami'o'in Cambridge . [1] Grey Henry memba ce ta Cibiyar Thomas Merton inda ta shirya tarurruka kan ayyukan Thomas Merton .[2]

items.sourceText: Benin possesses a total of 6,787 km of highway, of which 1,357 km are paved. Of the paved highways in the country, there are 10 expressways. This leaves 5,430 km of unpaved road.

items.sourceText: The Commission for the Promotion and Protection of the Rights of Cultural, Religious and Linguistic Communities (CRL Rights Commission) is an independent chapter nine institution in South Africa. It draws its mandate from the South African Constitution by way of the Commission for the Promotion and Protection of the Rights of Cultural, Religious and Linguistic Communities Act of 2002.[2]

targets.targetText: Hukumar Kare Hakkokin Al'adu, Addini da Harsuna ( CRL Rights Commission ) cibiya ce mai zaman kanta mai babi tara a Afirka ta Kudu.[1] Tana zana aikinta daga Kundin Tsarin Mulki na Afirka ta Kudu ta hanyar Hukumar Ingantawa da Kare Haƙƙin Al'adun Al'adu, Addini da Harsuna na Dokar 2002.[2] [3]

items.sourceText: A front-wheel drive six-cylinder model designed by Paul Henze [de] was shown at the 1928 Berlin Automobile Exposition, but was never put into production. [citation needed]

items.sourceText: After making just eight league appearances in the first half of the 2013–14 Serie A season, all of them as a substitute, Belfodil joined fellow Serie A club Livorno on loan for the remainder of the season on 31 January 2014.[1] At Livorno, Belfodil got a lot more playing time but his form was poor in a side that was ultimately relegated, failing to register a goal or assist in his time there.

targets.targetText: Bayan buga wasanni takwas kawai a farkon rabin kakar 2013-14 Seria A, dukkansu a matsayin wanda zai maye gurbin, Belfodil ya koma kulob din Seria A Livorno a matsayin aro na sauran kakar a ranar 31ga watan Janairu shekarata 2014. [1]

items.sourceText: Alizaga is a small town in Eggon local Government Area, Nigeria.[1] Which is part of small area in Eggon. the Eggon Post Office is also located in Alizaga Its along the A3 highway north of Lafia, the capital of Nasarawa State.

targets.targetText: Alizaga karamin gari ne a karamar hukumar Eggon a tarayyar Najeriya . [1] Wanda wani yanki ne na karamin yanki a Eggon. Ofishin gidan waya na Eggon kuma yana cikin Alizaga Its daura da babbar hanyar A3 arewa da Lafia, babban birnin jihar Nasarawa.

items.sourceText: Although the country itself contributes only very little to global warming with regards to greenhouse gas emissions, droughts due to climate change affect and will affect Afghanistan to a high degree.

items.sourceText: He was consecrated a bishop on St Andrew's Day (30 November) 1963, by Cecil Patterson, Archbishop of West Africa.[3] He holds the distinction of being the first African to preach in the famous St Paul's Cathedral, London.

targets.targetText: An tsarkake shi a matsayin bishop a ranar St Andrews (30 Nuwamba) 1963, na Cecil Patterson, Archbishop na Yammacin Afirka. [1] Yana riƙe da fifiko na kasancewa ɗan Afirka na farko da ya fara wa'azi a sanannen cocin St Paul's Cathedral, London.

items.sourceText: Christiana Abiodun Emanuel, born Abiodun Akinsowon (1907–1994), was the co-founder[1] of the Cherubim and Seraphim, an Aladura Christian denomination.[2] After a schism in the Church, she founded and led the Cherubim and Seraphim Society.

targets.targetText: Christiana Abiodun Emanuel, an haifi Abiodun Akinsowon a (1907–1994), ita ce wacce ta kafa [1] Cherubim da Seraphim, ƙungiyar Kirista ta Aladura. [2] Bayan schism a cikin Coci, ta kafa kuma ta jagoranci ƙungiyar Cherubim da Seraphim.

items.sourceText: In 2017, due to the successful reception of Plaything, Akinmolayan produced an animated series in collaboration with Friesland Campina WAMCO Nigeria Plc, titled Adventures of Lola and Chuchu.[12] In 2019, Akinmolayan executive produced Malika: Warrior Queen, a Nigerian animated film based on the graphic novel from Roye Okupe, writer and CEO of YouNeek Studios.[13]

[1] A cikin 2019, Akinmolayan zartarwa ya fito da Malika: Warrior Queen, wani fim ɗin raye-raye na Najeriya wanda ya dogara da littafin labari mai hoto daga Roye Okupe, marubuci kuma Shugaba na YouNeek Studios. items.sourceText: Restless City is a 2011 independent drama film written by Eugene M. Gussenhoven and directed by Andrew Dosunmu. It stars Sy Alassane, Sky Nicole Grey, Tony Okungbowa, Stephen Tyrone Williams, and Danai Gurira.[1] The film premiered on January 23, 2011, at the 2011 Sundance Film Festival and received a limited release in the United States on April 27, 2012.[2]

Taurarin shirin sun haɗa da; Sy Alassane, Sky Nicole Grey, Tony Okungbowa, Stephen Tyrone Williams, da Danai Gurira. [1] An fara haska fim ɗin a ranar 23 ga Janairu, 2011, a bikin Fim na Sundance na 2011 kuma ya sami iyakanceccen fitarwa a Amurka a ranar 27 ga Afrilu, 2012. [2]

items.sourceText: According to the 10th-century writer al-Hamdani, Dhi Bin is named after Dhu Bin b. Bakīr b. Nawfān, of the tribe of Hamdan.[2] It was a moderately important site during the late medieval and early modern eras, and is mentioned frequently in Yahya ibn al-Husayn's historical account, the Ghayat al-amani.[2]

targets.targetText: A cewar marubuci al-Hamdani na ƙarni na 10, ana kiran Dhi Bin, bayan Dhu Bin b. Bakīr b. Nawfan, na ƙabilar Hamdan. [1] Wuri ne mai matsakaicin matsayi a lokacin tsakiyar zamani da farkon zamani, kuma ana ambatonsa akai-akai a cikin tarihin Yahya bn al-Husayn, Ghayat al-amani. [1]

items.sourceText: Jabal Iyal Yazid District (Arabic: مديرية جبل عيال يزيد) is a district of the 'Amran Governorate, Yemen. As of 2003, the district had a population of 84,393 inhabitants.[1]

targets.targetText: An mai da Bedir memba na Royal College of Physicians a shekarar 1952, [1] da kuma Memba na Order of British Empire. [2][3] [4]
An mai da Bedir ɗan'uwa na Royal College of Physicians a 1952, [1] kuma Memba na Order of British Empire . [2] [3]

items.sourceText: Sunday Ajibade AdenihunListenⓘ was appointed military governor of Imo State in Nigeria from July 1978 to October 1979 during the military regime of General Olusegun Obasanjo.[1]

targets.targetText: Sunday Ajibade Adenihun Listen ⓘ an nada shi gwamnan soja a jihar Imo a Najeriya daga watan Yuli 1978 zuwa Oktoba 1979 a lokacin mulkin soja na Janar Olusegun Obasanjo . [1]
Sunday Ajibade Adenihun an naɗa shi gwamnan soja a jihar Imo a Najeriya daga watan Yuli 1978 zuwa Oktoba 1979 a lokacin mulkin soja na Janar Olusegun Obasanjo. [1]

items.sourceText: In October 1979 Adenihun handed over to the administration of the first civilian governor of Imo State in the Nigerian Second Republic, Chief Samuel Onunaka Mbakwe. He died of a heart attack in the United States on 25 November 2008.[1]

targets.targetText: A watan Oktoba 1979 Adenihun ya miƙa mulki wa gwamnan gwamnatin farar hula na farko gwamnan jihar Imo a jamhuriya ta biyu ta Najeriya Cif Samuel Onuka Mbakwe. Ya mutu sakamakon bugun zuciya a Amurka a ranar 25 ga Nuuwamba 2008. [1]

A watan Oktoba 1979 Adenihun ya mika wa gwamnatin farar hula na farko gwamnan jihar Imo a jamhuriya ta biyu ta Najeriya Cif Samuel Onuka Mbakwe . Ya mutu sakamakon bugun zuciya a Amurka a ranar 25 ga Nuwamba 2008. [1]

items.sourceText: Orabueze got married to Alexander Ogochukwu Orabueze, a chartered accountant on 17 December 1988 at the Holy Ghost Cathedral, Enugu. They are blessed with four children.[1][2]

targets.targetText: Orabueze ya auri Alexander Ogochukwu Orabueze, wani akawun hayar a ranar 17 ga Disamba 1988 a Holy Ghost Cathedral, Enugu. An albarkace su da yara hudu. [1] [2]
Orabueze ta auri Alexander Ogochukwu Orabueze, wani akawunta a ranar 17 ga watan Disamba 1988 a Holy Ghost Cathedral, Enugu. An albarkace su da yara huɗu. [1] [2]

items.sourceText: Ezenwa-Ohaeto (1958–2005) was a Nigerian poet, short story writer and academic.[1][2][3] He was one of the first Nigerians to publish poems written in pidgin English.[3] He died in Cambridge in 2005.[4]

targets.targetText: Ezenwa-Ohaeto (1958 – 2005) mawakin Najeriya ne, marubucin gajerun labarai kuma masani a fannin ilimi. [1] [2] [3] Ya kasance ɗaya daga cikin ’yan Najeriya na farko da suka fara rubuta wakoki da aka rubuta da turancin pidgin. [3] Ya mutu a Cambridge a shekara ta 2005. [4]

Ezenwa-Ohaeto (1958 – 2005) mawakin Najeriya ne, marubucin gajerun labarai kuma ilimi. [1] [2] [3] Ya kasance daya daga cikin ’yan Najeriya na farko da suka fara buga wakoki da aka rubuta da turanci pidgin . [3] Ya mutu a Cambridge a 2005. [4]

items.sourceText: Rosemond Boohene is a Ghanaian academic, accountant, university administrator and entrepreneurship scholar who has been appointed as the Pro Vice Chancellor of the University of Cape Coast.[1][2]

targets.targetText: Rosemond Boohene wata jami'a ce ta Ghana, akawu, mai kula da jami'a kuma masanin harkokin kasuwanci wanda aka nada a matsayin Pro Mataimakin Shugaban Jami'ar Cape Coast . [1] [2]
Rosemond Boohene wata malamar jami'a ce ta ƙasar Ghana, akawu, mai kula da jami'a kuma masaniya a harkokin kasuwanci wanda aka naɗa ta a matsayin Mataimakiyar Shugaban Jami'ar Cape Coast. [1] [2]

items.sourceText: Wade's accomplishments earned her recognition by Mathematically Gifted & Black, where she was featured as a Black History Month 2020 Honoree.[19]

targets.targetText: Abubuwan da Wade ta cim ma sun ta samu karramawa naMathematically Gifted & Black, inda aka nuna ta a matsayin Black History Month 2020 Honoree. [1]
Abubuwan da Wade ta cim ma sun sami karrama ta ta Mathematically Gifted & Black , inda aka nuna ta a matsayin Watan Tarihin Baƙar fata 2020 Honoree. [1]

items.sourceText: Byomire is a Mandela Washington Fellow, Class of 2021. While there, she studied public management at the University of Minnesota.[1][2] Three years earlier, in 2018, she had studied public management at Kenyatta University as a Fellow of the Young African Leaders Institute Regional Leadership Center (YALI RLC).[1]

targets.targetText: Byomire fellow ce ta Mandela Washington, Class na shekarar 2021. Yayin da take can, ta yi karatun kula da jama'a a Jami'ar Minnesota. [1] [2] Shekaru uku da suka gabata, a cikin shekarar 2018, ta yi karatun kula da jama'a a Jami'ar Kenyatta a matsayin Fellow of the Young African Leaders Institute Regional Leadership Centre (YALI RLC). [1]

Byomire ɗan'uwan Mandela Washington, Class na 2021. Yayin da yake can, ta yi karatun kula da jama'a a Jami'ar Minnesota . [1] [2] Shekaru uku da suka gabata, a cikin 2018, ta yi karatun kula da jama'a a Jami'ar Kenyatta a matsayin Fellow of the Young African Leaders Institute Regional Leadership Centre (YALI RLC). [1]

items.sourceText: Sameh Naguib (Arabic: سامح نجيب, IPA: [ˈsæːmeħ næˈɡiːb]) is an Egyptian sociologist at the American University in Cairo,[1] a socialist activist.[2] In 2006 he published a short book analysing the history and growth of the Muslim Brotherhood titled The Muslim Brotherhood- A socialist viewpoint.[3]

targets.targetText: Sameh Naguib ( Arabic) Masani ne a fannin ilimin zamantakewa a Jami'ar Amurka a Alkahira, [1] mai fafutuka kuma ɗan gurguzu. [2] A shekara ta 2006 ya wallafa wani ɗan gajeren littafi mai nazarin tarihi da ci gaban ƙungiyar 'yan uwa musulmi mai suna The Muslim Brotherhood-A socialist viewpoint. [3]

Sameh Naguib ( Arabic </link> , </link> ) Masanin ilimin zamantakewa ne a Jami'ar Amurka a Alkahira, [1] mai fafutukar gurguzu . [2] A shekara ta 2006 ya wallafa wani ɗan gajeren littafi mai nazarin tarihi da ci gaban ƙungiyar 'yan uwa musulmi mai suna The Muslim Brotherhood-A socialist viewpoint . [3]

items.sourceText: Doris Bozimo is a Nigerian librarian, academician and administrator.[1] She is a professor and former university librarian at Kashim Ibrahim Library, Ahmadu Bello University in Zaria, Kaduna state.[2][3][4] She was the country coordinator representing Nigeria at Electronic Information for Libraries (EIFL) as well as a member of the Nigerian Library Association.[5]

targets.targetText: Doris Bozimo ma'aikaciyar laburare ce na Najeriya, malama kuma mai gudanarwa. [1] Farfesa ce kuma tsohuwar ma’aikaciyar ɗakin karatu na jami’a a Kashim Ibrahim Library, Jami’ar Ahmadu Bello da ke Zariya, Jihar Kaduna. [2] [3] [4] Ta kasance mai kula da ƙasar da ke wakiltar Najeriya a Electronic Information for Libraries (EIFL) da kuma memba na Ƙungiyar Laburare ta Najeriya. [5]

Doris Bozimo ma'aikacin laburare ne na Najeriya, malami kuma mai gudanarwa. [1] Farfesa ce kuma tsohuwar ma’aikaciyar dakin karatu na jami’a a Kashim Ibrahim Library, Jami’ar Ahmadu Bello da ke Zariya, Jihar Kaduna . [2] [3] [4] Ta kasance mai kula da ƙasar da ke wakiltar Najeriya a Lantarki na Lantarki don Laburaren (EIFL) da kuma memba na Ƙungiyar Laburare ta Najeriya . [5]

items.sourceText: Road to Yesterday tells the story of an estranged married couple, hoping to mend their strained marriage whilst on a road trip to a relative’s funeral.

targets.targetText: Road to Yesterday ta ba da labarin ma'aurata da suka rabu, suna fatan gyara aurensu mai wahala yayin da suke tafiya zuwa jana'izar dangi.
Hanyar zuwa jiya ta ba da labarin ma'aurata da suka rabu, suna fatan gyara aurensu mai wahala yayin da suke tafiya zuwa jana'izar dangi.

items.sourceText: It stars Tobi Bakre, Olarotimi Fakunle, Idia Aisien, Elvina Ibru, Hermes Iyele, Bolaji Ogunmola, Sonia Irabor, Gideon Okeke, Jidekene Achufusi and others.[3]

targets.targetText: Tauraruwar tauraro Tobi Bakre, Olarotimi Fakunle, Idia Aisien, Elvina Ibru, Hermes Iyele, Bolaji Ogunmola, Sonia Irabor, Gideon Okeke, Jidekene Achufusi da sauransu. [1]
Taurarin shirin sun haɗa da Tobi Bakre, Olarotimi Fakunle, Idia Aisien, Elvina Ibru, Hermes Iyele, Bolaji Ogunmola, Sonia Irabor, Gideon Okeke, Jidekene Achufusi da sauransu. [1]

items.sourceText: Wend Kuuni (also known as God's Gift) is a 1982 Burkinabé drama film directed by Gaston Kaboré. It was followed with the sequel Buud Yam (1997).

targets.targetText: Wend Kuuni (wanda kuma aka sani da God's Gift) fim ne na wasan kwaikwayo na shekarar 1982 na ƙasar Burkinabe wanda Gaston Kaboré ya ba da umarni. An bi shi da mabiyin Buud Yam (1997).
Wend Kuuni (wanda kuma aka sani da baiwar Allah ) fim ne na wasan kwaikwayo na 1982 Burkinabe wanda Gaston Kaboré ya ba da umarni. An bi shi da mabiyin Buud Yam (1997).

items.sourceText: Plagued by the stress of Paris, a young woman from Congo-Kinshasa takes shelter in a hair salon in the Strasbourg-Saint-Denis neighborhood in Paris, where numerous African hairdressers have opened up for business. She spends a very enjoyable day watching the clients being taken care of, eating, singing and even dancing. She recovers memories from her childhood and a certain amount of serenity.

targets.targetText: Cikin damuwa da damuwa na Paris, wata budurwa daga Kongo-Kinshasa ta sami mafaka a wani salon gashi a unguwar Strasbourg-Saint-Denis a birnin Paris, inda yawancin masu gyaran gashi na Afirka suka buɗe don kasuwanci. Ta yi kwana mai daɗi sosai tana kallon abokan ciniki ana kula da su, suna ci, suna waƙa har ma da rawa. Tana dawo da abubuwan tunowa tun yarinta da wani irin natsuwa.

Cikin damuwa a Paris, wata budurwa daga Kongo-Kinshasa ta sami mafaka a wani shafin gyaran gashi a unguwar Strasbourg-Saint-Denis a birnin Paris, inda yawancin masu gyaran gashi na Afirka suka buɗe don kasuwanci. Ta yi kwana mai daɗi sosai tana kallon abokan ciniki ana kula da su, suna ci, suna waƙa har ma da rawa. Tana tuna abubuwan yarintakarta da wani irin natsuwa.

items.sourceText: People on the Top (Egyptian Arabic: أهل القمة, translit.Ahl el qema) is a 1981 Egyptian drama film based on a story by Naguib Mahfouz and directed by Ali Badrakhan.[1] It stars Soad Hosny, Nour El-Sherif and Ezzat El Alaili. The film is listed in the Top 100 Egyptian films.

targets.targetText: Mutane a saman ( Egyptian Arabic </link> , fassara. Ahl el qema) wani fim ne na wasan kwaikwayo na Masar a shekara ta 1981 bisa labarin Naguib Mahfouz kuma Ali Badrakhan ya ba da umarni. [1] Tauraro na Soad Hosny, Nour El-Sherif da Ezzat El Alaili . An jera fim din a cikin Fina-finan Masar 100 na Top 100.

Mutane a saman ( Egyptian Arabic , fassara. Ahl el qema) wani fim ne na wasan kwaikwayo na Masar a shekara ta 1981 bisa labarin Naguib Mahfouz kuma Ali Badrakhan ya ba da Umarni. [1] Taurarin shirin sun haɗa da Soad Hosny, Nour El-Sherif da Ezzat El Alaili . An jera fim ɗin a cikin Fina-finan Masar 100 da sukayi fice.

items.sourceText: Chelsea is a 2010 Ghanaian direct-to-video thriller film directed by Moses Inwang, and starring Majid Michel, Nadia Buari & John Dumelo.[1][2]

targets.targetText: Chelsea fim ne na 2010 na Ghana kai tsaye zuwa bidiyo mai ban sha'awa wanda Moses Inwang ya ba da umarni, kuma tare da Majid Michel, Nadia Buari & John Dumelo. [1] [2]
Chelsea fim ne na shekarar 2010 na ƙasar Ghana kai tsaye zuwa bidiyo mai ban sha'awa wanda Moses Inwang ya ba da umarni, jaruman shirin sun haɗa da Majid Michel, Nadia Buari & John Dumelo. [1] [2]

items.sourceText: The film features an ensemble cast that includes Shadia, Shoukry Sarhan, Kamal El-Shennawi, Emad Hamdy and Zahrat El-Ola.[6][7][8][9][10] It was the highest-grossing film in the Soviet Union for 1961, the only African film to ever achieve that.[11]

targets.targetText: [1] Fim din [2] ya ƙunshi ƙungiyar da Tare haɗa da Shadia, Shoukry Sarhan, Kamal El-Shennawi, Emad Hamdy da Zahrat El-Ola . [3] [4] [5] Fim [6] mafi girma a Tarayyar Soviet a shekarar 1961, fim din Afirka ne kawai da ya taba cimma hakan.

[1] din [2] ƙunshi ƙungiyar da Tare haɗa da Shadia, Shoukry Sarhan, Kamal El-Shennawi, Emad Hamdy da Zahrat El-Ola . [3] [4] [5] Fim [6] mafi girma a Tarayyar Soviet a shekarar 1961, fim din Afirka ne kawai da ya taba cimma hakan.

items.sourceText: Ayten Amin was born in Alexandria, Egypt. She studied Film Criticism in 2001. Her first films were shorts about belly dancing and Egyptian actress Madiha Kamel in 2005. At American University in Cairo, she produced Her Man, which was screened in 10 international film festivals. She began working as an Assistant Director in 2008. Her breakout was in 2011 with SPRING 89 which was shown at Cannes Film Festival.[1]

targets.targetText: An haifi Ayten Amin a Alexandria, Masar. Ta karanci Criticism a 2001. Fina-finanta na farko sun kasance gajerun wando na rawan ciki da kuma 'yar wasan Masar Madiha Kamel a 2005. A Jami'ar Amurka da ke Alkahira, ta fito da namijinta, wanda aka nuna a cikin bukukuwan fina-finai na duniya 10. Ta fara aiki a matsayin Mataimakin Darakta a 2008. Fashewarta ta kasance a cikin 2011 tare da SPRING 89 wanda aka nuna a Cannes Film Festival . [1]

An haifi Ayten Amin a Alexandria, Masar. Ta karanci Criticism a 2001. Fina-finanta na farko sun kasance gajerun fim da ke bayanin 'yar wasan Masar Madiha Kamel a 2005. A Jami'ar Amurka da ke Alkahira, ta fito da shirin fim na Man, wanda aka nuna a cikin bukukuwan fina-finai na duniya 10. Ta fara aiki a matsayin Mataimakin Darakta a 2008. Fashewarta ta kasance a cikin 2011 tare da SPRING 89 wanda aka nuna a Cannes Film Festival. [1]

items.sourceText: Christophe Madihano was born on 10 October 1995, in Goma in the Democratic Republic of the Congo. He began his career in 2017 and attracted international attention with his project "The Kongo Kingdom", in which the Swedish-Congolese singer Mohombi appeared as one of the key figures of the Kongo Kingdom.[2][3]

targets.targetText: An haifi Christophe Madihano a ranar 10 ga Oktoba 1995, a Goma a Jamhuriyar Demokradiyyar Kongo . [1][2] fara aikinsa a shekarar 2017 kuma ya ja hankalin duniya tare da aikinsa "The Kongo Kingdom", inda mawaƙin Sweden-Congo Mohombi ya bayyana a matsayin ɗaya daga cikin manyan mutane na Masarautar Kongo.

An haifi Christophe Madihano a ranar 10 ga watan Oktoba 1995, a Goma a Jamhuriyar Demokradiyyar Kongo. [1][2] Ya fara aikinsa a shekarar 2017 kuma ya ja hankalin duniya tare da aikinsa "The Kongo Kingdom", inda mawaƙin Sweden-Congo Mohombi ya bayyana a matsayin ɗaya daga cikin manyan mutane na Masarautar Kongo.

items.sourceText: Camille Mouyéké (born 16 March 1962), is a Congolese filmmaker and screenwriter.[1][failed verification] He is best known for directing the award-winning 2001 thriller film Voyage à Ouaga.[2][3]

targets.targetText: [1]Camille Mouyéké (an haife shi a ranar 16 ga watan Maris na shekara ta 1962), mai shirya fim ne kuma marubuci ɗan Kongo.    An fi saninsa da jagorantar fim mai ban tsoro na 2001 mai suna Voyage à Ouaga.[2][3]

[1]Camille Mouyéké (an haife ta a ranar 16 ga watan Maris na shekara ta 1962), 'yar fim ce kuma marubuciya 'Yan Kongo.   [failed tabbatarwa] An fi saninsa da jagorantar fim mai ban tsoro na 2001 mai suna Voyage à Ouaga.[2][3]

items.sourceText: He was born on 1 January 1981 in Alexandria, Egypt. He obtained a degree in history from Suez Canal University and then obtained a degree in screenwriting from the Cairo Higher Institute of Cinema in 2009.[4][5]

targets.targetText: An haife shi a ranar 1 ga Janairun 1981 a Alexandria, Misira . [1][2] sami digiri a tarihi daga Jami'ar Suez Canal sannan ya sami digiri a rubuce-rubuce daga Cibiyar Fim ta Alkahira a shekara ta 2009.

An haife shi a ranar 1 ga Janairun 1981 a Alexandria, Misira. [1][2] Ya sami digiri a fannin tarihi daga Jami'ar Suez Canal sannan ya sami digiri a rubuce-rubuce daga Cibiyar Fim ta Alkahira a shekara ta 2009.

items.sourceText: Perivi John Katjavivi, is a Namibian-British filmmaker.[1][2] He has made several critically acclaimed films including Eembwiti, The Unseen and Film Festival Film. Apart from direction, he is also a producer, writer, camera operator, actor, cinematographer and editor.[3]

targets.targetText: Perivi John Katjavivi, yar Namibiya ce - mai shirya fina-finan Burtaniya . [1] [2] Ya yi fina-finai da dama da suka yi fice da suka hada da Eembwiti, The Gaibu da Fim ɗin Fim ɗin Fim . Baya ga alkibla, shi ma furodusa ne, marubuci, ma’aikacin kyamara, ɗan wasan kwaikwayo, mai daukar hoto da kuma edita. [3]

Perivi John Katjavivi, ɗan Namibiya ne mai shirya fina-finan Burtaniya. [1] [2] Ya yi fina-finai da dama da suka yi fice da suka haɗa da Eembwiti, The Gaibu da Fim ɗin. Baya ga jagoranci, shi ma furodusa ne, marubuci, ma’aikacin kyamara, ɗan wasan kwaikwayo, mai ɗaukar hoto da kuma edita. [3]

items.sourceText: Rosemary was born and brought up in Johannesburg, South Africa[12] in a joint family of seven children.[13] She was raised by her mother Blessings Zimu along with her 6 siblings Dj Themba (brother), and Zanele Zimu (sister).[14] After High School, she earned a Certification in labor law and became a lawyer.[13]

targets.targetText: An haifi Rosemary kuma ta girma a Johannesburg, Afirka ta Kudu [1] a cikin iyali mai haɗin gwiwa na yara bakwai. [2] Mahaifiyarta Blessings Zimu [3] ta haife ta tare da 'yan uwanta 6 Dj Themba (ɗan'uwa), da Zanele Zimu (yar'uwa). [2] Bayan ta gama makarantar ssakandare, ta sami takardar shaidar a ccikin dokar aiki kuma ta zzama lauya.

An haifi Rosemary kuma ta girma a Johannesburg, Afirka ta Kudu [1] a cikin iyali mai haɗin gwiwa na yara bakwai. [2] Mahaifiyarta Blessings Zimu [3] ta haife ta tare da 'yan uwanta 6 Dj Themba (ɗan'uwa), da Zanele Zimu (yar'uwa). [1] [2] makarantar sakandare, ta sami takardar shaidar a cikin dokar aiki kuma ta zama lauya.

items.sourceText: Strydom was born on 12 June 1980 in South Africa.[1] After completing her matric, Strydom went and worked in Europe for two years. Then she returned to South Africa and enrolled at the Tshwane University of Technology. She later graduated Cum Laude with a B-Tech Drama diploma.[4]

targets.targetText: [1] An haifi Strydom ranar 12 ga watan Yuni 1980 a Afirka ta Kudu. Bayan ta kammala karatunta, Strydom ta tafi ta yi aiki a Turai na tsawon shekaru biyu. Daga nan sai ta koma Afirka ta Kudu kuma ta shiga Jami'ar Fasaha ta Tshwane. Daga baya [2] ta kammala karatun Cum Laude tare da difloma na B-Tech Drama.

[1] haifi Strydom a ranar 12 ga Yuni 1980 a Afirka ta Kudu. Bayan kammala karatunta, Strydom ta tafi ta yi aiki a Turai na tsawon shekaru biyu. Daga nan sai ta koma Afirka ta Kudu kuma ta shiga Jami'ar Fasaha ta Tshwane . Daga baya [2] kammala karatun Cum Laude tare da difloma na B-Tech Drama . [1]

items.sourceText: Jessica "Jay" Carly Anstey (born 13 February 1991), popularly known as Jay Anstey, is a South African actress and model.[1] She is best known for the roles in the films, Sleeper's Wake, Farewell Ella Bella, Tremors: A Cold Day in Hell, and Hell Trip.[2]

targets.targetText: [1]Jessica "Jay" Carly Anstey (an haife ta ranar 13 ga watan Fabrairun shekara ta 1991), wacce aka fi sani da Jay Anstey, ƴar wasan Afirka ta Kudu. [2] An fi saninta da rawar da ta taka a fina-finai, Sleeper's Wake, Farewell Ella Bella, Tremors: A Cold Day in Hell, da Hell Trip.

[1]Jessica "Jay" Carly Anstey (an haife ta a ranar 13 ga watan Fabrairun shekara ta 1991), wacce aka fi sani da Jay Anstey, 'yar wasan Afirka ta Kudu ce kuma samfurin. [2] fi saninta da rawar da ta taka a fina-finai, Sleeper's Wake, Farewell Ella Bella, Tremors: A Cold Day in Hell, da Hell Trip.

items.sourceText: Slovo lives in London and often works for Working Title Films. Her sister Gillian Slovo is also a writer and her sister Robyn Slovo is a producer.

targets.targetText: Slovo yana zaune a Landan kuma galibi yana aiki da Fina-finan Taken Aiki . 'Yar'uwarta Gillian Slovo ita ma marubuciya ce kuma 'yar uwarta Robyn Slovo ita ce furodusa.
Slovo tana zaune a Landan kuma galibi tana aiki da Fina-finan Title Films. 'Yar'uwarta Gillian Slovo ita ma marubuciya ce kuma 'yar uwarta Robyn Slovo ita ce furodusa.

items.sourceText: Holma (also known as Da Holmaci, Bali Holma) is an extinct Afro-Asiatic language formerly spoken in Nigeria in Adamawa State, near the Cameroon border. Speakers switched to Nigerian Fulfulde.[1]

targets.targetText: Holma (wanda aka fi sani da Da Holmaci, Bali Holma) yare ne na Afro-Asiatic wanda aka fi magana dashi a Najeriya a Jihar Adamawa, kusa da iyakar Kamaru . Masu magana sun sauya zuwa Fulfulde na Najeriya.
Holma (wanda aka fi sani da Da Holmaci, Bali Holma) yare ne na Afro-Asiatic wanda aka fi magana a Najeriya a Jihar Adamawa, kusa da iyakar Kamaru . magana sun sauya zuwa Fulfulde na Najeriya.

items.sourceText: Meriem Benmiloud (born 17 July 1980) is the Algerian Minister of Digitization and Statistics. She was appointed as minister on 16 March 2023.[1][2][3]

targets.targetText: Meriem Benmiloud (an Haife ta a ranar 17 ga watan Yuli 1980) ministar dijital da ƙididdiga ta Aljeriya ce. An naɗa ta a matsayin minista a ranar 16 ga watan Maris 2023. [1] [2] [3]
Meriem Benmiloud (an Haife shi 17 ga Yuli 1980) ministar ƙididdiga da ƙididdiga ta Aljeriya ce. An nada ta a matsayin minista a ranar 16 ga Maris 2023. [1] [2] [3]

items.sourceText: Aïssata Soulama (born 11 February 1979) is a Burkinabé track and field athlete who specialises in the 400 metres hurdles. She also holds the current Burkinabé record 53.81 on 400 metres.

targets.targetText: Aïssata Soulama (an haife ta a ranar 11 ga watan Fabrairu 1979) 'yar wasan tsere ce na track and field a Burkinabé wacce ta ƙware a tseren mita 400. Ta kuma riƙe kambun Burkinabe a halin yanzu 53.81 akan mita 400.
Aïssata Soulama (an haife ta 11 ga Fabrairu 1979) ɗan wasan tsere ne kuma mai fage a Burkinabé wanda ya ƙware a tseren mita 400 . Ta kuma rike kambun Burkinabe a halin yanzu 53.81 akan mita 400 .

items.sourceText: Iradukunda Grace Divine, commonly known as DJ Ira born (1997-09-07) September 7, 1997 (age 26) in Gitega, Burundi to Mbonimpa Juvénal and Ndayizeye Béatrice is a Burundian disc jockey,[1] business woman and fashionista based in Rwanda.

targets.targetText: Iradukunda Grace Divine, wacce aka fi sani da DJ Ira an haife ta a (1997-09-07 ) in Gitega, Burundi zuwa Mbonimpa Juvénal da Ndayizeye Béatrice 'yar Burundin disc jockey, [1] 'yar kasuwa da kuma fashionista da ke Rwanda.

Iradukunda Grace Divine, wanda aka fi sani da DJ Ira haifaffen (1997-09-07 ) in Gitega, Burundi zuwa Mbonimpa Juvénal da Ndayizeye Béatrice 'yar Burundin disc jockey, [1] yar kasuwa da kuma fashionista da ke Rwanda .

items.sourceText: In 1947, she was awarded a scholarship to France, where she graduated as a state nurse in 1952 and specialized in tropical diseases.[4][5]

targets.targetText: A cikin 1947, an ba ta tallafin karatu zuwa Faransa, inda ta sauke karatu a matsayin ma'aikaciyar jinya a 1952 kuma ta kware a cututtukan wurare masu zafi . [1] [2]
A cikin shekarar 1947, an ba ta tallafin karatu zuwa Faransa, inda ta kammala karatu a matsayin ma'aikaciyar jinya a shekarar 1952 kuma ta kware a fannin cututtukan wurare masu zafi. [1] [2]

items.sourceText: Her first solo album is Um Click (One Click), with the song Cuidôd Na Click (Be aware to click), where Solidade encourages listeners to be careful about what they publish on social media networks.[1]

targets.targetText: Album dinta na farko shine Um Click (Dabawa Daya), tare da waƙar Cuidôd Na Click (Ku sani don danna), inda Solidade ke ƙarfafa masu sauraro su yi hankali game da abubuwan da suke bugawa a shafukan sada zumunta. [1]

Album ɗinta na farko shine Um Click (One Click), tare da waƙar Cuidôd Na Click (Be aware to click), inda Solidade ke ƙarfafa masu sauraro su yi hankali game da abubuwan da suke wallafawa a shafukan sada zumunta. [1]

items.sourceText: Anne-Marie Goumba (born 9 October 1954), is a member of the National Assembly of the Central African Republic and as a member of the Pan-African Parliament from the Central African Republic. She is the widow of long-time Central African politician Abel Goumba.

targets.targetText: Anne-Marie Goumba (an haife ta a ranar 9 ga Oktoba 1954), memba ce ta Majalisar Dokokin Jamhuriyar Afirka ta Tsakiya kuma a matsayin memba na Majalisar Dokokin Pan-Afirka daga Jamhuriwar Afirka ta Tsakiyar . Ita ce gwauruwar ɗan siyasan Afirka ta Tsakiya na dogon lokaci Abel Goumba .

Anne-Marie Goumba (an haife ta a ranar 9 ga Oktoba 1954), ‘yar majalisa ce ta Majalisar Dokokin Jamhuriyar Afirka ta Tsakiya kuma ta rike matsayin memba na Majalisar Dokokin Pan-Afirka daga Jamhuriwar Afirka ta Tsakiyar. Ita ce matar mamaci ɗan siyasan Afirka ta Tsakiya na tsawon lokaci Abel Goumba .

items.sourceText: Farah Abdullahi Abdi (born 21. July 1995 in Beledweyne) is a human rights activist. She is a refugee from Somalia[1] and a Policy Officer for Asylum and Migration at the organisation Transgender Europe.[2]

targets.targetText: Farah Abdullahi Abdi (an haife ta a ranar 21 ga watan Yuli 1995 a Beledweyne) 'yar rajin kare hakkin ɗan adam ce. Ita 'yar gudun hijira ce daga Somaliya [1] kuma Jami'yar Siyasa ta Mafaka da Hijira a kungiyar Transgender Europe. [2]

Farah Abdullahi Abdi (an haife shi 21. Yuli 1995 a Beledweyne ) ɗan rajin kare hakkin ɗan adam ne. Ita 'yar gudun hijira ce daga Somaliya [1] kuma Jami'ar Siyasa ta Mafaka da Hijira a kungiyar Transgender Turai . [2]

items.sourceText: In 2023, PepsiCo formed a new portfolio connecting its sports and fitness drink brands under the Gatorade umbrella. Propel was included in this umbrella.[3]

targets.targetText: A cikin 2023, PepsiCo ya kafa sabon fayil ɗin da ke haɗa nau'ikan wasanni da abubuwan sha na motsa jiki a ƙarƙashin laima na Gatorade. An haɗa Propel a cikin wannan laima.[1]
A cikin 2023, PepsiCo ta kafa sabon fayil ɗin da ke haɗa alamun wasanni da abin sha na motsa jiki a ƙarƙashin laima na Gatorade. An haɗa propel a cikin wannan laima.[1]

items.sourceText: Modern sources of CO2 are from industrial processes, such as burning of fossil fuels like coal and methane at power plants, or steam reforming of methane for hydrogen production.

targets.targetText: Tushen CO2 na zamani sun fito ne daga matakai na masana'antu, kamar ƙone burbushin burbushin kamar kwal da methane a tashoshin wutar lantarki, ko sake fasalin tururi na methane don Samar da hydrogen.
Tushen CO2 na zamani sun fito ne daga hanyoyin masana'antu, kamar kona albarkatun mai kamar kwal da methane a tashoshin wutar lantarki, ko gyaran tururi na methane don samar da hydrogen.

items.sourceText: The Nigerian Army University Biu Hostel is located right inside the Nigerian Army Barracks Biu, providing adequate security for students of the institution.

targets.targetText: Ɗakunan kwana na Jami’ar Sojojin Najeriya dake Biu dai suna cikin barikin Sojojin Najeriya ne dake Biu, inda ake samar da isasshen tsaro ga ɗaliban makarantar.
Jami’ar Sojojin Najeriya dake Biu Hostel dai tana cikin barikin Sojojin Najeriya ne dake Biu, inda take samar da isasshen tsaro ga daliban makarantar.

items.sourceText: It is often eaten for breakfast with akara, beans, fish, eggs or other toppings. It is also eaten for lunch and/or dinner with other West African dishes such as peppersoup.

targets.targetText: Sau da yawa ana ci don karin kumallo tare da akara, wake, kifi, ƙwai ko wasu kayan toppings. Ana kuma ci don abincin rana da/ko abincin dare tare da sauran jita-jita na Yammacin Afirka kamar barkono mai daɗi .

Sau da yawa ana ci don karin kumallo tare da akara, wake, kifi, ƙwai ko wasu kayan toppings. Ana kuma ci don abincin rana da/ko abincin dare tare da sauran dishes na Yammacin Afirka kamar barkono mai daɗi.

items.sourceText: Usermontu was an ancient Egyptian vizier from the reign of Tutankhamun to likely the reign of Horemheb, during the 18th Dynasty.

targets.targetText: Usermontu wani tsohon masarautar Masar ne daga mulkin Tutankhamun zuwa yiwuwar mulkin Horemheb, a lokacin Daular 18.
Usermontu tsohon wazirin Masar ne tun daga mulkin Tutankhamun zuwa wataƙila zamanin Horemheb, a lokacin daular 18th.

items.sourceText: At Moscow State University, he studied Dutch and Irish.[4] To order to improve his Irish, he spent one term at Trinity College Dublin.[4] He later spent time in the Irish-speaking communities of An Spidéal and An Cheathrú Rua, and attended Acadamh na hOllscolaíochta Gaeilge.[4][5][6]

targets.targetText: A Jami'ar Jihar Moscow, ya karanta Dutch da Irish . [ 4 ] Don inganta ɗan Irish ɗinsa, ya yi wa'adi ɗaya a Kwalejin Trinity Dublin . [ 4 ] Daga baya ya shafe lokaci a cikin al'ummomin masu jin Irish na An Spidéal da An Cheathrú Rua, kuma ya halarci Acadamh na hOllscolaíochta Gaeilge . [ 4 ]

A Jami'ar Jihar Moscow, ya karanta harsunan Dutch da Irish. [ 4 ] Don inganta yaren Irish ɗinsa, ya yi wa'adi ɗaya a Kwalejin Trinity Dublin. [ 4 ] Daga baya ya shafe lokaci a cikin al'ummomin masu jin Irish na An Spidéal da An Cheathrú Rua, kuma ya halarci Acadamh na hOllscolaíochta Gaeilge. [ 4 ]

items.sourceText: Wapakhabulo was born and raised in the Iringa District of Tanzania. While a student at the University of Dar es Salaam,[citation needed] she met James Wapakhabulo (23 March 1945 – 27 March 2004), the late former Minister of Foreign Affairs, from 2001 until 2004. They were married and had four children together. Their daughter, Josephine Wapakabulo is the former Executive Director of Uganda National Oil Company.[4]

targets.targetText: An haifi Wapakhabulo kuma ya girma a gundumar Iringa ta Tanzaniya . Lokacin da yake dalibi a Jami'ar Dar es Salaam , Ta sadu ( 23 Maris 1945 - 27 Maris 2004), marigayi tsohon Ministan Harkokin Waje, daga 2001 har zuwa 2004. Sun yi aure sun haifi 'ya'ya hudu tare. Diyarsu, Josephine Wapakabulo, tsohuwar Darakta ce ta Kamfanin Mai na Uganda . [1]

An haifi Wapakhabulo kuma ta girma a gundumar Iringa ta Tanzaniya. Lokacin da take ɗaliba a Jami'ar Dar es Salaam, Ta haɗu James Wapakhabulo ( 23 Maris 1945 - 27 Maris 2004), marigayi tsohon Ministan Harkokin Waje, daga shekarun 2001 har zuwa 2004. Sun yi aure sun haifi 'ya'ya huɗu tare. Ɗiyar su, Josephine Wapakabulo, tsohuwar Darakta ce ta Kamfanin Mai na Uganda. [1]

items.sourceText: Among was elected as the new Speaker of the parliament of Uganda on the March 25, 2022[1] replacing Jacob Oulanyah, the former Speaker of the Parliament of Uganda, who died in Seattle, Washington.[22][23][24]

targets.targetText: Daga cikin an zabe shi a matsayin sabon shugaban majalisar dokokin Uganda a ranar 25 ga Maris, 2022 [1] wanda ya maye gurbin Jacob Oulanyah, tsohon kakakin majalisar dokokin Uganda, wanda ya mutu a Seattle, Washington . [2] [3] [4]

Anita Among an zaɓe ta a matsayin sabuwar shugabar majalisar dokokin Uganda a ranar 25 ga watan Maris, 2022 [1] wacce ta maye gurbin Jacob Oulanyah, tsohon kakakin majalisar dokokin Uganda, wanda ya mutu a Seattle, Washington. [2] [3] [4]

items.sourceText: Joyce Moriku also called Joyce Kaducu (born 21 April 1969), is a Ugandan pediatrician, academic and politician. In the 2021-26 cabinet, she is State Minister for Primary education, having succeeded Rosemary Seninde.[1]

targets.targetText: Joyce Moriku kuma ana kiranta Joyce Kaducu (an haife ta 21 Afrilu 1969), likitan yara ne 'yar Uganda, ilimi kuma ' yar siyasa . A cikin majalisar ministocin 2021-26, ita ce karamar ministar ilimin firamare, bayan ta gaji Rosemary Seninde . [1]

Joyce Moriku kuma ana kiranta Joyce Kaducu (an haife ta a ranar 21 ga watan Afrilu 1969), likitar yara ce 'yar ƙasar Uganda, malamar jami'a kuma 'yar siyasa. A cikin majalisar ministocin 2021-26, ita ce karamar ministar ilimin firamare, bayan ta gaji Rosemary Seninde. [1]

items.sourceText: The Mozilla Add-ons website published the Ukrajinsjka Latynka extension to transliterate Ukrainian texts from Cyrillic to Latin script on web pages.[1]

targets.targetText: Gidan yanar gizon Mozilla Add-ons ya buga tsawo na Ukrajinsjka Latynka don fassara rubutun Ukrainian daga Cyrillic zuwa rubutun Latin a shafukan yanar gizo.[1]
Gidan yanar gizon Mozilla Add-ons ya buga sabon Ukrajinsjka Latynka don fassara rubutun Yukren daga Cyrillic zuwa rubutun Latin a shafukan yanar gizo.[1]

items.sourceText: The Battle of Ansaba took place in autumn of 1963, and was part of the Eritrean War of Independence. It was fought in Jengeren, North of Keren, In Anseba Region.

targets.targetText: Yakin Ansaba ya faru ne a cikin kaka na shekara ta 1963, kuma yana cikin yakin 'yancin kai na Eritriya . An yi yakin ne a Jengeren da ke Arewacin Keren a yankin Anseba .
Yakin Ansaba ya faru ne a cikin kakar shekara ta 1963, kuma yana cikin yakin neman 'yancin kai na Eritriya. An yi yakin ne a Jengeren da ke Arewacin Keren a yankin Anseba.

items.sourceText: According to a biography by Joan Graff Clucas, Teresa was in her early years when she was fascinated by stories of the lives of missionaries and their service in Bengal; by age 12, she was convinced that she should commit herself to religious life.[19] Her resolve strengthened on 15 August 1928 as she prayed at the shrine of the Black Madonna of Vitina-Letnice, where she often went on pilgrimages.[20]

targets.targetText: Dangane da tarihin rayuwar Joan Graff Clucas, Teresa ta kasance a cikin shekarunta lokacin da labaru game da rayuwar mishaneri da hidimarsu a Bengal ; har ya kai shekara 12, ta hakikance cewa yakamata ta sadaukar da rayuwarta ga addini. [1] Resolveudurin ta ya ƙarfafa a ranar 15 ga Agusta 1928 yayin da tayi addu'a a farfajiyar Madonna na Madina na Vitina-Letnice, inda ta saba yin aikin haji . [2]

Dangane da tarihin daga Joan Graff Clucas, Teresa ta kasance a cikin shekarunta lokacin da labaru game da rayuwar mishaneri da hidimarsu a Bengal ya burge ta ; har ta kai shekara 12, ta hakikance cewa yakamata ta sadaukar da rayuwarta ga addini. [1] Shirin ta ya ƙarfafa a ranar 15 ga Agusta 1928 yayin da tayi addu'a a farfajiyar Madonna na Madina na Vitina-Letnice, inda ta saba yin aikin haji . [2]

items.sourceText: Watari Dam is a dam located in Bagwai Local Government area in the north west of Kano State of Nigeria.[1]

targets.targetText: Watari Dam madatsar ruwa ne dake a karamar hukumar Bagwai a arewa maso yamma ta jihar Kano na Najeriya . [1]
Watari Dam ne dam located in Bagwai karamar yanki a arewa yamma na jihar Kano na Najeriya . [1]

items.sourceText: Skyline University College (SUC) is a university in University City of Sharjah, United Arab Emirates, on the border of Sharjah and Dubai.[1]

targets.targetText: Kwalejin Jami'ar Skyline ( ko Skylin University CollegeUC ) jami'a ce a Sharjah, Hadaddiyar Daular Larabawa, a kan iyakar Sharjah da Dubai . [1]
Kwalejin Jami'ar Skyline ( SUC ) jami'a ce a Jami'ar Jami'ar Sharjah, Hadaddiyar Daular Larabawa, a kan iyakar Sharjah da Dubai . [1]

items.sourceText: Olufunmilayo Aduni Olayinka, née Famuagun (20 June 1960 – 6 April 2013), was a Nigerian banker and politician who served as the Deputy Governor of Ekiti State.[1][2][3]

targets.targetText: Olufunmilayo Aduni Olayinka, mai suna Famuagun (20 ga Yuni 1960 - 6 Afrilu 2013), ya mai Nijeriya banki da kuma siyasa wanda ya yi aiki a matsayin mataimakin gwamnan jihar Ekiti . [1] [2] [3]

Olufunmilayo Aduni Olayinka, mai suna Famuagun (20 ga Yuni 1960 - 6 Afrilu 2013), ta kasance maaikaciyar banki ce a Nijeriya. kuma yar siyasa ce wacce tayi aiki a matsayin mataimakin gwamnan jihar Ekiti . [1] [2] [3]

items.sourceText: Her nursery school was at the International Women's Society Nursery School in Lagos while her primary school was University of Lagos Staff School.

targets.targetText: Tayi makarantar nursery ne a Makarantar Nursery ta Mata ta Duniya da ke Legas yayin da makarantar firamare ta ke Makarantar Ma'aikata ta Jami'ar Legas.
Makaranta a makarantar nursery take a Makarantar Nursery ta Mata ta Duniya da ke Legas yayin da makarantar firamare ta ke Makarantar Ma'aikata ta Jami'ar Legas.

items.sourceText: Mosun was born in Ibadan to parents from Ekiti State. She was raised with four other siblings.[1] She attended Abeokuta College of Education and earned a degree in Business Administration from Tai Solarin University of Education.[2]

targets.targetText: And haifi Mosun a garin Ibadan ga iyayen shi daga jihar Ekiti . An tashe ta tare da wasu 'yan uwa huɗu. [1] Ta halarci kwalejin ilimi ta Abeokuta kuma ta samu digiri a fannin kasuwanci a jami'ar ilimi ta Tai Solarin . [2]

An haifi Mosun a garin Ibadan ga iyayen ta daga jihar Ekiti. Ta tasy tare da wasu 'yan uwa huɗu. [1] Ta halarci kwalejin ilimi ta Abeokuta kuma ta samu digiri a fannin kasuwanci a jami'ar ilimi ta Tai Solarin . [2]

items.sourceText: Flora Suya is a Malawian actress. She was nominated as best actress at the 6th and 9th Africa Movie Academy Awards ceremonies.

targets.targetText: Flora Suya 'yar wasan Malawi ce. An zabe ta a matsayin yar wasan kwaikwaiyo a bukukuwan bada kyaututtuka na Afirka na 6 da 9 na Afirka .
Flora Suya 'yar wasan Malawi ce. An zabe ta a matsayin yar wasan kwaikwaiyo a bukukuwan bada kyaututtuka na Afirka na 6 da 9 na African Movie Academy Awards .

items.sourceText: Dams and reservoirs in Nigeria are used for irrigation, water supply, hydro-electric power generation or some combination. They are of particular importance in the north of the country, where rainfall is low. The table below lists some of the larger ones.

targets.targetText: Ana amfani da madatsun ruwa da madatsun ruwa a Najeriya don ban ruwa, samar da ruwa, samar da wutar lantarki ta hydro-ko wasu hadewa. Suna da mahimmancin gaske a arewacin ƙasar, inda ruwan sama ke ƙasa. Teburin da ke ƙasa ya lissafa wasu manyan.

Ana amfani da madatsun ruwa a Najeriya don ban ruwa, samar da ruwa, samar da wutar lantarki ko kuma kawar da ambaliya. Suna da mahimmancin gaske a arewacin ƙasar, inda ruwan sama ke ƙasa. Teburin da ke ƙasa ya lissafa wasu manyan.

items.sourceText: Islam was born in Tower Hamlets, London, England[1] and grew up in London, England.[2] He attended Swanlea School. In 2008, he left City and Islington College.[3][4]

targets.targetText: An haifi musulunci a Tower Hamlets, London, England [1] kuma ya girma ne a London, England. [2] Ya halarci makarantar Swanlea . A cikin 2008, ya bar Kwalejin City da Islington . [3] [4]

An haifi Sabirul Islam a Tower Hamlets, London, England [1] kuma ya girma ne a London, England. [2] Ya halarci makarantar Swanlea . A cikin shekara ta 2008, ya bar Kwalejin City da Islington . [3] [4]

items.sourceText: There was, thereafter, clamour to rebuild the facility. This led to teamed efforts by the then old Anambra State Government in partnership with the private sector to raise funds for the rebuilding of the stadium, which was inaugurated in 1986.

targets.targetText: Akwai, daga baya, ihun sake gina makaman. Wannan ya haifar da kokarin hadin gwiwa daga tsohuwar Gwamnatin Jihar Anambra tare da hadin gwiwar kamfanoni masu zaman kansu don tara kudade don sake gina filin wasan, wanda aka kaddamar a 1986.

Daga baya anyi yunkurin sake Gina sabon filin wasan. Wannan ya haifar da kokarin hadin gwiwa daga tsohuwar Gwamnatin Jihar Anambra tare da hadin gwiwar kamfanoni masu zaman kansu don tara kudade don sake gina filin wasan, wanda aka kaddamar a 1986.

items.sourceText: Aidara was born in 1984 to an Italian mother and a Senegalese father. She is of Fula, Mandinka and Sardinian descent.[1]

targets.targetText: An haifi Aidara a cikin 1984 ga mahaifiyarsa ta Italiya da mahaifin Senegal. Tana daga Fula, Mandinka da Sardiniyanci . [1]
An haifi Aidara a shekara 1984 ga mahaifiyar ta yar Italiya da mahaifi dan Senegal. Tana daga zurriya Fula, Mandinka da Sardiniyanci . [1]

items.sourceText: Katsina-Ala is the capital and major town of Katsina Ala local government in Benue State, Nigeria. It is found along the course of river Katsina Ala with numerous hamlets and villages along the road. It has a central market that holds every Thursdays of the week.

targets.targetText: Katsina-Ala babban birni ne kuma babban gari na karamar hukumar Katsina Ala a jihar Binuwai, Najeriya. Ana samun sa a bakin kogin Katsina Ala tare da ƙauyuka da ƙauyuka da yawa a kan hanyar. Tana da babbar kasuwa da ke riƙe kowane Alhamis ɗin mako.

Katsina-Ala babban birni ne kuma babban gari na karamar hukumar Katsina Ala a jihar Binuwai, Najeriya. Ana samun sa a bakin kogin Katsina Ala tare da ƙauyuka da yawa a kan hanyar. Tana da babbar kasuwa da ke ci a kowane Alhamis ɗin mako.

items.sourceText: Gwandara is a West Chadic language, and the closest relative of Hausa. Its several dialects are spoken in northern Nigeria, predominantly in the north central region of Nigeria by about 30,000 people. They are found in large numbers in Abuja, Niger, Kaduna, Kogi and a resettlement town of New Karshi, Karu LGA, Nasarawa State. New Karshi has a Gwandara first class emir Muhammadu Bako III (PhD).

targets.targetText: Gwandara yare ne na Chadi ta Yamma, kuma shi ne mafi kusancin dangin Hausa . Ana magana da yarukanta da yawa a arewacin Najeriya, galibi a yankin tsakiyar arewacin Najeriya da kusan mutane 30,000. Ana samun su da yawa a Abuja, Niger, Kaduna, Kogi da kuma wani garin da aka tsugunar da New Karshi, karamar hukumar Karu, jihar Nasarawa. Sabon Karshi yana da sarki mai daraja ta farko a Gwandara Muhammadu Bako III (PhD).

Gwandara yare ne na Chadi ta Yamma, kuma shi ne mafi kusanci daga dangin harshen Hausa . Ana magana da yarukanta da yawa a arewacin Najeriya, galibi a yankin tsakiyar arewacin Najeriya da kusan mutane 30,000. Ana samun su da yawa a Abuja, Niger, Kaduna, Kogi da kuma wani garin da aka tsugunar dasu a Sabuwar Karshi, ƙaramar hukumar Karu, jihar Nasarawa. Sabon Karshi yana da sarki mai daraja ta farko a Gwandara Muhammadu Bako III (PhD).

items.sourceText: This is a list of villages and settlements in Niger State, Nigeria organised by local government area (LGA) and district/area (with postal codes also given).[1][2]

targets.targetText: Waɗannan jerin ƙauyuka ne a cikin jihar Neja, Nijeriya waɗanda ƙaramar hukuma (LGA) da gunduma / yanki suka tsara (tare da lambobin gidan waya kuma an ba su). [1] [2]
Wannan jerin ƙauyuka da ƙauyuka a cikin jihar Neja, Nijeriya waɗanda localaramar hukuma (LGA) da gunduma / yanki suka tsara (tare da lambobin gidan waya kuma an ba su). [1] [2]

items.sourceText: Burkina Faso hosts the Panafrican Film and Television Festival of Ouagadougou (FESPACO) every two years in Ouagadougou, Burkina Faso's capital.

targets.targetText: Burkina Faso tana karbar bakuncin Fina -finan Fina -Finan Fina -Finan da Talabijin na Ouagadougou (FESPACO) duk shekara biyu a Ouagadougou, babban birnin Burkina Faso.
Burkina Faso tana karɓar baƙuncin Bikin baje kolin Fina-Finan da Talabijin na Ouagadougou (FESPACO) duk shekara biyu a Ouagadougou, babban birnin Burkina Faso.

items.sourceText: Hamdallaye, Niger is a village and rural commune in Niger.[1] It is the location of the US Peace Corps training site.

targets.targetText: Hamdallaye, Nijar ne wani kauye da karkara ƙungiya a Nijar . [1] Shi ne wurin da ake ba da horo na Ƙungiyar Peace Corps ta Amurka.
Hamdallaye, Nijar wani kauye ne na ƙungiyar karkara a Nijar . [1] Shi ne wurin da ake ba da horo na Ƙungiyar Peace Corps ta Amurka.

items.sourceText: The cinema of Liberia, or Liberian cinema, refers to the filmmaking industry in Liberia. Liberian cinema has played an important part in Liberian culture and in recent years has begun flourishing again after the civil war.

targets.targetText: Sinima a Laberiya, ko Liberia cinema, yana nufin masana'antar fim a Liberia. Fim ɗin Laberiya ya taka muhimmiyar rawa a al'adun Laberiya kuma a cikin ƴan shekarun nan ya fara bunƙasa bayan yaƙin basasa.

A cinema na Liberia, ko Liberia cinema, yana nufin da harkar fim masana'antu a Liberia. Fim ɗin Laberiya ya taka muhimmiyar rawa a al'adun Laberiya kuma a cikin 'yan shekarun nan ya fara bunƙasa bayan yaƙin basasa.

items.sourceText: In fall 2006, the school, together with the Royal Film Commission of Jordan, created the Red Sea Institute of Cinematic Arts (RSICA) in Aqaba, Jordan.[7] The first classes were held in 2008, and the first graduating class for the university was in 2010.

targets.targetText: A cikin shekarata 2006, makarantar, tare da Royal Film Commission na Jordan, sun kirkiro Cibiyar Harkokin Fasahar Sinima ta Red Sea (RSICA) a Aqaba, dake birnin Jordan. [1] An gudanar da azuzuwan farko a shekarar 2008, kuma ajin farko da aka yaye jami’a a shekarar 2010 ne.

A cikin fall 2006, makarantar, tare da Royal Film Commission na Jordan, sun kirkiro Cibiyar Harkokin Ciniki ta Red Sea (RSICA) a Aqaba, Jordan . [1] An gudanar da azuzuwan farko a shekarar 2008, kuma ajin farko da aka yaye jami’a a shekarar 2010 ne.

items.sourceText: In the 2012 Sight & Sound poll, critics voted Vertov's Man with a Movie Camera (1929) the eighth-greatest film ever made.[1]

targets.targetText: A cikin zaben Sight & Sound na 2012, masu sharhin fina-finai sun zaɓi Man with a Movie Camera ((1929) fim na takwas mafi girma da aka taɓa yi. [1]
A cikin zaben Sight & Sound na 2012, masu suka sun zaɓi mutumin Vertov mai Kyamarar Fim (1929) fim na takwas mafi girma da aka taɓa yi. [1]

items.sourceText: Deforestation in Borneo has taken place on an industrial scale since the 1960s. Borneo, the third largest island in the world, divided between Indonesia, Malaysia and Brunei, was once covered by dense tropical and subtropical rainforests.

targets.targetText: An yi saran gandun daji a Borneo bisa ma'aunin masana'antu tun a shekarun 1960. Borneo, tsibiri na uku mafi girma a duniya, wanda aka raba tsakanin ƙasashen Indonesia, Malaysia da Brunei, ya taɓa rufe dazuzzuka dawurare masu zafi da na wurare na muhalli.

items.sourceText: Losseny Doumbia began his career in the Niger club ASFAN. In 2010, he moved to Motema Pembe from Equatorial Guinea. Now goalkeeper stands for Premier League club South Africa Chippa United.

targets.targetText: Losseny Doumbia ya fara aikinsa a kungiyar ASFAN ta ￼￼Nijar￼￼. A cikin shekarar 2010, ya koma Motema Pembe daga Equatorial Guinea. Yanzu Goalkeeper ne tsaye ga Premier League kulob ɗin Afirka ta Kudu Chippa United.

items.sourceText: At the 1999 European Parliament election, Foster was selected by Conservatives in the North West as fifth on their list. She won the last seat available on the list system.[citation needed]

targets.targetText: A zaben Majalisar Tarayyar Turai na 1999, masu ra'ayin mazan jiya a Arewa maso Yamma sun zabi Foster a matsayin na biyar a jerin 'yan takarar su. Ta lashe kujerar karshe da aka samu akan tsarin rukunonin.

items.sourceText: The Uganda women's national football team is the national women's football team of Uganda and is controlled by the Federation of Uganda Football Associations.

targets.targetText: Kungiyar kwallon ƙafa ta mata ta Uganda, ita ce babbar ƙungiyar ƙwallon ƙafa ta mata ta ƙasar Uganda kuma hukumar kula da wasan ƙwallon ƙafa ta Uganda ce ke kula da ita .
Tawagar ƙwallon ƙafa ta mata ta Uganda ita ce ƙungiyar ƙwallon ƙafa ta mata ta ƙasar Uganda kuma ƙungiyar ƙwallon ƙafa ta Uganda ce ke kula da ita .

items.sourceText: The Tunisian Basketball Federation (Arabic: الجامعة التونسية لكرة السلة, FTBB) is the governing body of basketball in Tunisia. that was Formed in 1956, it is based in the capital town Tunis. The FTBB is a member of the International Basketball Federation (FIBA) and also belong to the FIBA Africa zone. The current president of the federation is Ali Benzarti.

targets.targetText: Hukumar Kwallon Kwando ta Tunisiya ( Arabic , FTBB) ita ce hukumar kula da kwallon kwando a Tunisia . An kafa shi a cikin 1956, yana kan babban birnin Tunis . FTBB memba ne na Hukumar Kwallon Kwando ta Duniya (FIBA) kuma tana cikin yankin FIBA na Afirka . Shugaban tarayyar na yanzu Ali Benzarti .

Hukumar Kwallon Kwando ta Tunisiya ( Arabic , FTBB) ita ce hukumar kula da kwallon kwando a Tunisia. An kafa ta a cikin shekarar 1956, tana babban birnin Tunis. FTBB memba ce na Hukumar Kwallon Kwando ta Duniya (FIBA) kuma tana cikin yankin FIBA na Afirka. Shugaban tarayyar na yanzu Ali Benzarti.

items.sourceText: CMC Connect Burson Cohn & Wolfe (CMC BCW) formerly known as CMC Connect Burson-Marsteller is a public relations firm that provides communication solutions. [buzzword][1] The company was founded in 1992 by Yomi Badejo Okusanya in Ikeja, Lagos, Nigeria. In 2015, CMC Connect announced an exclusive affiliation with Burson-Marsteller, a global public relations agency which is now known as Burson Cohn & Wolfe.[2][3][4][5][6][7]

targets.targetText: CMC Connect Burson Cohn & Wolfe (CMC BCW) wanda aka fi sani da CMC Connect Burson-Marsteller kamfani ne na hulda da jama'a wanda ke samar da hanyoyin sadarwa. Yomi Badejo [1] kamfanin a 1992 a Ikeja, Lagos, Nigeria . A cikin 2015, CMC Connect ya sanar da keɓancewar haɗin gwiwa tare da Burson-Marsteller, hukumar hulɗar jama'a ta duniya wanda yanzu ake kira Burson Cohn & Wolfe . [2] [3] [4] [5] [6] [7]

CMC Connect Burson Cohn & Wolfe (CMC BCW) wanda aka fi sani da CMC Connect Burson-Marsteller kamfani ne na hulda da jama'a wanda ke samar da mafita na matsalolin sadarwa. Yomi Badejo ne ya kafa [1] kamfanin a 1992 a Ikeja, Lagos, Nigeria . A cikin 2015, CMC Connect ya sanar da keɓancewar haɗin gwiwa tare da Burson-Marsteller, hukumar hulɗar jama'a ta duniya wanda yanzu ake kira Burson Cohn & Wolfe . [2] [3] [4] [5] [6] [7]

items.sourceText: The Lagos State Government emerged as the most responsive COVID-19 State Government of the Year at the Nigerian Healthcare Excellence Award 2021, due to the state government and the Lagos state ministry of health effective and efficient response to the outbreak of COVID-19.[14][15][16]

targets.targetText: Gwamnatin jihar Legas ta fito a matsayin gwamnatin jihar da ta fi daukar nauyin COVID-19 na shekara a lambar yabo ta kiwon lafiya ta Najeriya 2021, saboda gwamnatin jihar da ma'aikatar lafiya ta jihar Legas sun yi tasiri da ingantaccen martani ga barkewar COVID-19.[1] [2] [3] [4][5][6]

items.sourceText: Mudalur is a village in the Thoothukudi District of India. It was the first purely Christian settlement. It was formed by missionaries in South India with 28 Christians.[2][3] Today it has a population of more than 4,500 people.

targets.targetText: Mudalur ƙauye ne a gundumar Thoothukudi ta Indiya. Ita ce ta farko kuma mazauna kauyen zalla Kiristoci ne. ’Yan mishan ne suka kafa ta a Kudancin Indiya tare da Kiristoci 28. [1] [2] A yau tana da yawan jama'a fiye da mutane 4,500.

Mudalur ƙauye ne a gundumar Thoothukudi ta Indiya. Ita ce ta farko zalla Kirista. ’ Yan mishan ne suka kafa ta a Kudancin Indiya tare da Kiristoci 28. [1] [2] A yau tana da yawan jama'a fiye da mutane 4,500.

items.sourceText: Yussif Daouda Moussapronunciation (born 4 September 1998) is a professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Finnish club Ilves. Born in Ghana, he represents the Niger national football team.

items.sourceText: Following the death of Ohinoyi Sanni Omolori of the Ogu clan in 1997,[1] the Lagos-based entrepreneur and son of the second paramount ruler of Ebiraland, AbdulRahman Ado Ibrahim, ascended the Okene throne as the second ohinoyi or fourth independent traditional ruler of Ebiraland on June 2, 1997.[2][3][7]

targets.targetText: Bayan rasuwar Ohinoyi Sanni Omolori na kabilar Ogu a shekarar 1997, [1] dan kasuwa mazaunin Legas kuma dan sarkin Ebiraland na biyu, AbdulRahman Ado Ibrahim, ya hau gadon sarautar Okene a matsayin ohinoyi na biyu ko kuma na hudu basaraken gargajiya mai zaman kansa . Ebiraland ranar 2 ga Yuni, 1997. [2] [3] [1]

items.sourceText: Medjahdi has a WTA singles career high ranking of 370 achieved on 7 August 2006. She also has a WTA doubles career high ranking of 505 achieved on 29 August 2005. Medjahdi has won one ITF doubles title.

items.sourceText: Mahamoud is a youth product of Viry-Châtillon and Nantes.[1] He was promoted to Nantes reserves in 2021 in the Championnat National 2.[2]

items.sourceText: Jesús and his partner got married in Luanda in 1983; they had a son, Hadja.[1] His idol is Portuguese footballer Cristiano Ronaldo.[2]

items.sourceText: Vitaly Borisovich Linetsky (October 22, 1971 - July 16, 2014) was a Ukrainian theater and film actor, Honored Artist of Ukraine (2004).

items.sourceText: Nimo is located in the local government area of Njikoka in Anambra State. Nimo's postal code is 421102.[2] Its neighbouring towns are Enugwu Ukwu, Abagana, Neni, Eziowelle, Abatete, Oraukwu, Adazi, Nri, and Abacha.

items.sourceText: Owhelogbo is an Isoko town in Isoko North Local Government Council, Delta State, southern Nigeria. It has a humid climate.

items.sourceText: Kwale is host to oil and gas companies, some of which have presence in different parts of the African city such as a gas flow facility which is situated at Ebedei nearby Umukwata area and another at Ebendo and Umusadege with a pipeline running from Aboh and river Ase creeks.[3][citation needed]

items.sourceText: Ebenator Ekwe is an autonomous community in Ekwe Community in Isu Local Government Area of Imo State, Nigeria. It comprises Eluama, Umuokorokoro and Umuduruewuru villages and several kindreds.

items.sourceText: Florence Koehler (1861 – 1944) was an American craftswoman, designer and jeweler. She was one of the best-known jewelers of the Arts and Crafts movement that flourished in the late 19th and early 20th centuries.[1][2]

items.sourceText: Mku ran as the flagbearer of The People's Democratic Party (PDP) for the Benue North-West Senatorial District, otherwise known as "Zone B" where he sought to represent the District at the Nigerian Senate in the 2015 General Elections, but lost to George Akume for the fifth consecutive time under sad circumstances.[6]

items.sourceText: Children's rights cover all rights belonging to children. When individuals grow up, they are granted new rights (such as voting, consent, and driving) and duties (such as criminal responsibility and draft eligibility). There are different minimum limits of age at which youth are, situationally, not independent or deemed legally competent to make certain decisions or take certain actions.
