items.sourceText: Harriet Bulkeley, FBA (born 17 November 1972) is a British geographer and academic. She is Professor of Geography at Durham University. Bulkeley is also a coordinator in the Naturvation project.[1] Through her work at Durham University, Harriet is involved in the ReInvent-EU project,[2] which aims to encourage decarbonisation in 4 key areas: plastic, steel, paper and meat and dairy. Her research largely explores the politics and processes surrounding environmental governance, as well as the management of municipal waste in the United Kingdom and the politics, specifically urban politics, of climate change.

targets.targetText: Harriet Bulkeley, FBA (an Haife ta 17 Nuwamba 1972) 'yar ƙasar Biritaniya ce me labarin ƙasa kuma ilimi. Ita ce Farfesa na Geography a Jami'ar Durham. Bulkeley kuma mai gudanarwa ce acikin aikin Naturvation.[1] Ta hanyar aikinta a Jami'ar Durham,Harriet ta shiga cikin aikin ReInvent-EU,[2]wanda ke da nufin ƙarfafa lalatawa a cikin mahimman wurare 4: filastik, karfe, takarda da nama da kiwo.Binciken nata ya fi bincikar siyasa da tsarin tafiyar da muhalli, da kuma sarrafa sharar gida a Burtaniya da siyasa, musamman siyasar birane, na sauyin yanayi.

items.sourceText: The Ekpo same in meaning as Ekpe, Okpo-owo or Akpo-owo as pronounced by the Efik, Ibibio and Annang peoples simply describe it as a non-living human or a dead soul that comes to the land of the living.[clarification needed][4]

targets.targetText: Ekpo iri ɗaya a ma'anar Ekpe, Okpo-owo ko Akpo-owo kamar yadda Efik, Ibibio da Annang ke bayyana shi kawai a matsayin mutum marar rai ko mataccen rai wanda ke zuwa ƙasar masu rai. [ bayani da ake bukata ] [1]

items.sourceText: After earning a diploma from the International Centre for Theoretical Physics in Trieste, Italy,[5] studying there with Ravi K. Sheth,[4] Okoli came to the Perimeter Institute for Theoretical Physics in Waterloo, Canada, in 2012, as part of Perimeter Scholars International, a master's program at the institute.[5] After completing the program in 2014,[2] she continued her studies at the Perimeter Institute and the University of Waterloo, jointly advised by Perimeter Institute cosmologist Niayesh Afshordi and University of Waterloo astrophysicist James Taylor,[5] and continuing through the birth of her son in 2017.[3] She successfully defended her doctoral thesis in December 2018, and was scheduled to receive a diploma in June 2019.[5]

targets.targetText: Bayan samun difloma daga Cibiyar Nazarin Ilimin Kimiyya ta Duniya a Trieste, Italiya, [5] tana karatu a can tare da Ravi K. Sheth, [4] Okoli ta zo Cibiyar Perimeter for Theoretical Physics a Waterloo, Kanada, a cikin shekarar 2012, a matsayin wani ɓangare na Perimeter Scholars International, babban shiri a cibiyar. [5] Bayan kammala shirin a cikin shekarar 2014, [2] ta ci gaba da karatunta a Cibiyar Perimeter da Jami'ar Waterloo, tare da shawarar da Perimeter Institute Cosmologist Niayesh Afshordi da Jami'ar Waterloo astrophysicist James Taylor suka ba ta, [5] kuma ta ci gaba ta harta haifi ɗan ta a shekara ta 2017. [3] Ta yi nasarar kare karatun digirin ta a watan Disamba 2018, kuma ta shirya samun difloma a watan Yuni 2019. [5]

Bayan samun difloma daga Cibiyar Nazarin Ilimin Kimiyya ta Duniya a Trieste, Italiya, [5] yana karatu a can tare da Ravi K. Sheth, [4] Okoli ya zo Cibiyar Perimeter for Theoretical Physics a Waterloo, Kanada, a cikin 2012, a matsayin wani ɓangare na Perimeter Scholars International, babban shiri a cibiyar. [5] Bayan kammala shirin a cikin 2014, [2] ta ci gaba da karatunta a Cibiyar Perimeter da Jami'ar Waterloo, tare da shawarar da Perimeter Institute Cosmologist Niayesh Afshordi da Jami'ar Waterloo astrophysicist James Taylor suka ba ta, [5] kuma ta ci gaba ta hanyar haihuwar ta. son a 2017. [3] Ta yi nasarar kare karatun digirin ta a watan Disamba 2018, kuma an shirya samun difloma a watan Yuni 2019. [5]

items.sourceText: AbdulAzeez Arisekola-Alao (February 14, 1945 - June 18, 2014)[1] was a Nigerian billionaire and Islamic leader based in Ibadan, he was the Aare Musulumi of Yorubaland and Vice-President General, Nigeria Supreme Council for Islamic Affairs (NSCIA).[2]

targets.targetText: AbdulAzeez Arisekola-Alao (14 ga Fabrairu, 1945 - Yuni 18, 2014) [1] hamshakin attajirin Najeriya ne kuma shugaban addinin Musulunci da ke zaune a Ibadan, ya kasance Aare Musulmi na yankin Yarbawa kuma mataimakin shugaban kasa, Majalisar Koli ta Addinin Musulunci ta Najeriya (NSCIA). ). [2]

items.sourceText: The Peacock[1] (Egyptian Arabic: الطاووس translit: Al-Tawous) is an Egyptian crime thriller film released in 1982.[2][3][4] It stars Salah Zulfikar, Nour El Sherief, Laila Taher and Raghda. The film is directed by Kamal El Sheikh and written by Abdelhay Adib.[5][6][7]

[2] [3] [4] Taurarin fina-finansa Salah Zulfikar, Nour El Sherief, Laila Taher da Raghda . Kamal El Sheikh ne ya bada umarni kuma Abdelhay Adib ne ya rubuta fim din. [5] [6] [7]

[2] [3] [4] Taurarin fim ɗin sune: Salah Zulfikar, Nour El Sherief, Laila Taher da Raghda. Kamal El Sheikh ne ya bada umarni kuma Abdelhay Adib ne ya rubuta fim din. [5] [6] [7]

items.sourceText: A couple on a vacation aiming to re-new their lost sparkle in their marriage, Seek help/counselling from someone else who they believe knows better. items.sourceText: Alidou Badini is a filmmaker from Burkina Faso who has worked on many films and TV productions. He co-directed the widely discussed Le Beurre et l'argent du beurre, which documents the realities of free trade.[1]

items.sourceText: Mehdi Hmili, is a Tunisian filmmaker.[1] He is best known as the director of critically acclaimed shorts and feature films Thala My Love, The Night of Badr and Li-La.[2][3]

items.sourceText: Patrick Lualua Jr commonly known as Director P', is a Zambian- Congolese filmmaker.[1][2]He is notable as the director of the critically acclaimed film Killface.[3]Besides film director, Patrick is also an actor, screenwriter, producer and Musician.[4][5]

[1][4] [5] Bayan kasancewarsa darektan fina-finai, Patrick kuma ɗan wasan kwaikwayo ne, marubuci, furodusa, kuma mawaƙi.

items.sourceText: Reine Swart (née Malan; born 17 May 1990) is a South African director, writer and actress. items.sourceText: The Nursing and Midwifery Council of Nigeria (abbr. NMCN), is the sole governing body that regulates all cadres of nurses and midwives in Nigeria.[1][2] It was established by government decree in 1979, and re-established as a parastatal by the government of Nigeria by Act Cap. No 143 Laws of the Federation of Nigeria, 2004.[3][4]

items.sourceText: In 2015, al-Kashif began learning more about politics, feminism, and LGBT rights.[1] She became interested in the effects of political repression on individual rights, and became determined to be politically active so as to improve her life and the lives of other transgender people.[2]

items.sourceText: In January 2003, Middlesbrough spent £3.5 million to sign him from Bolton.[6] He failed to recapture his goal-scoring form, netting just four times in 38 matches. While at Middlesbrough he did, however, win the League Cup in the 2003–04 season, coincidentally against Bolton.

targets.targetText: A watan Janairun shekara ta 2003, Middlesbrough ta kashe fam miliyan 3.5 don sanya hannu a kawosa daga Bolton.[1] Ya kasa sake dawo da tsarin cin kwallayen dayakeyi a baya, ya zira kwallayen sau hudu kawai a wasanni 38. Yayinda yake a Middlesbrough, duk da haka, ya lashe Kofin League a kakar 2003-04, daidai da Bolton.

items.sourceText: Mangei Gomango (16 June 1916 – 1980), popularly known as Pandita Sabara Mangei Gamango was an Indian language activist who is said to have devised[1][2] the tribal language of Rayagada district.[3][4] He has been awarded by Odisha Sahitya Academy.[5]

items.sourceText: Adara people (also Eda[2] and Kadara), are an ethnic group in the Middle Belt who speak the Adara language, a north Plateau language of Nigeria.

items.sourceText: The cinema of São Tomé and Príncipe does not have an extensive history, since São Tomé and Príncipe is not a large island. However there has been some filmmaking.

items.sourceText: Vitaliy Oleksiyovych Hodziatsky (Ukrainian: Годзяцький Віталій Олексійович, born 26 December 1936) is a Ukrainian composer and teacher. He was made a Merited Artist of Ukraine in 1996.

items.sourceText: The Isa Kaita College of Education is a state government higher education institution located in Dutsin-Ma, Katsina State, Nigeria. It is affiliated to Ahmadu Bello University for its degree programmes. The current provost is Maigari Abdu.[1][2][3]

items.sourceText: Women's football was born in Mauritania on 2007 with the organisation of the unofficial tournament that was won by a team École feu Mini.[1] On 2014, another tournament taked part under the name of Tournoi pour la promotion du football féminin.[2]

items.sourceText: The Comorian Women's Championship (Arabic: بطولة جزر القمر للسيدات) is the top flight of women's association football in Comoros. The competition is run by the Comoros Football Federation.

items.sourceText: Muhammad Abbas was a Regent of Kano and later Emir of Kano.[1] He was appointed regent by Lord Lugard after the pacification of Northern Nigeria, he presided over the transformation of the Caliphal Emirate into an Emirate subject to the British throne under the Protectorate of Northern Nigeria.

targets.targetText: Muhammad Abbas ya kasance Sarkin Kano sannan kuma Sarkin Kano. [1] Lord Lugard ne ya nada shi sarauta bayan zaman lafiyar Arewacin Najeriya, ya jagoranci sauya masarautun Halifa zuwa Sarautar Birtaniyya a karkashin Mallakar Arewacin Najeriya .

Muhammad Abbas ya kasance Sarkin Kano na riƙo sannan kuma daga baya ya zama Sarkin Kano. [1] Lord Lugard ne ya naɗa shi sarauta bayan zaman lafiyar Arewacin Najeriya, ya jagoranci sauya masarautun Halifa zuwa Sarautar Birtaniyya a karkashin Mallakar Arewacin Najeriya .

items.sourceText: Ilé-Ifè is famous worldwide for its ancient and naturalistic bronze, stone and terracotta sculptures, dating back to between 1200 and 1400 A.D.[1]

items.sourceText: The University of West London (UWL) is a public research [4]university in the United Kingdom with campuses in Ealing, Brentford, and in Reading, Berkshire.

items.sourceText: Ebrima Ebou Sillah (born 12 April 1980) is a Gambian former professional footballer who played as a winger or striker.

items.sourceText: It serves as a small administrative and trading centre for the surrounding mixed farming area. In recent years it has grown rapidly and has become a popular area for people moving out of Harare.

Garin na aiki a matsayin ƙaramar cibiyar gudanarwa da kasuwanci na kewayen yankin noma. A cikin shekarun baya-bayan nan garin ya bunƙasa cikin sauri kuma ya zama yanki mai farin jini ga mutanen da ke ƙaura daga birnin Harare.

items.sourceText: The Central Bank of the Republic of Guinea (French: Banque Centrale de la République de Guinée, BCRG; N'Ko: ߖߌ߬ߣߍ߫ ߞߊ߲ߓߍ߲ ߕߊ߲ߓߊ߲ ߜߍߓߏ߲) is the central bank of Guinea. items.sourceText: Africa Paradis is a 2006 satirical speculative fiction film written and directed by Beninese actor Sylvestre Amoussou. It was produced in France and Benin and was intended to comment on the situation of African refugees in Europe.[1]

items.sourceText: A young Masai women has a future determined for her by relatives to marry the son of the chief. However, she plans to improve herself through education. She runs from the village to seek a better life in the capital, Nairobi, where she faces several challenges.[2][3][4]

targets.targetText: Wata matashiya mata Masai tana da makomar da dangi suka ƙaddara don auren ɗan shugaban. Koyaya, tana shirin inganta kanta ta hanyar ilimi. [1][2][3] gudu daga ƙauyen don neman rayuwa mafi kyau a babban birnin, Nairobi, inda ta fuskanci ƙalubale da yawa.

items.sourceText: From 1994 to 1999, she studied History and a University Diploma in Cinema and Audiovisual at the University of Strasbourg.[3] In 2005, Claude completed her master's degree at Sorbonne University.[4]

items.sourceText: Djoudja debuted internationally for the Comoros national team in a COSAFA Cup on 27 May 2018 in a 1–1 draw against Seychelles. A year later at another COSAFA Cup, Djoudja scored his first goal for Comoros against Eswatini resulting a 2–2 draw.

items.sourceText: Kanta was once the Leka-fari and a Barde, one of the great captains of Askia Mohammed. However, Kanta had revolted against Askia and with his followers moved into the territory of the Kebbawa taking control and establishing the independent state of Kebbi.

targets.targetText: Kanta ya taɓa zama Leka-fari kuma Barde, ɗaya daga cikin manyan kyaftin din Askia Mohammed. Duk da haka, Kanta ya yi wa Askia tawaye, tare da mabiyansa suka shiga cikin yankin Kebbawa suka mamaye kuma suka kafa jihar Kebbi mai cin gashin kanta.

Kanta ya taba zama Leka-fari kuma Barde, daya daga cikin manyan kyaftin din Askia Mohammed . Duk da haka, Kanta ya tayar wa Askia, tare da mabiyansa suka shiga cikin yankin Kebbawa suka mamaye kuma suka kafa jihar Kebbi mai cin gashin kanta.

items.sourceText: Khamir (Arabic: خمر, romanized: Khamir) is a small city in the 'Amran Governorate of Yemen. It is the seat of Khamir District. It is now closely associated with the tribal confederation of Hashid, although it is named after a member of the Bakil tribe and was historically mainly a Bakil town.[1]

items.sourceText: The deafblind community has its own culture, comparable to those of the deaf community. Members of the deafblind community have diverse backgrounds but are united by similar experiences and a shared, homogeneous understanding of what it means to be deafblind.[1] Some deafblind individuals view their condition as a part of their identity.[2]

items.sourceText: Sumney was born in Canada to Dr. Kodjoe Sumney and Dr. Akosuah Sumney but moved to the United States when she was two years old.[1][5] She studied nursing at the Summit career college, California and also had her tertiary education at the University of California, Riverside in California.[6][7]

targets.targetText: [1][2] An haifi Sumney a Kanada ga Dokta Kodjoe Sumney da Dokta Akosuah Sumney amma ta koma Amurka lokacin da take ƴar shekara biyu. [3][4] Ta yi karatun jinya a Kwalejin aiki ta Summit, California kuma tana da karatun sakandare a Jami'ar California, Riverside a California.

[1][2] haifi Sumney a Kanada ga Dokta Kodjoe Sumney da Dokta Akosuah Sumney amma ta koma Amurka lokacin da take 'yar shekara biyu. [3][4] yi karatun jinya a Kwalejin aiki na Summit, California kuma tana da karatun sakandare a Jami'ar California, Riverside a California.

items.sourceText: Skefu was born on 14 April 1964 in Botswana and moved to Soweto, Gauteng.[3] She later grew up in Bloemfontein with her grandparents and Lesotho. She graduated with a higher Diploma in Beauty Therapy from the University of St. Thomasin Texas, Houston.[4]

targets.targetText: An haifi Skefu ranar 14 ga watan Afrilu 1964 a Botswana kuma ta koma Soweto, Gauteng da zama. [1] Daga baya ta girma a Bloemfontein tare da kakanninta da Lesotho. [2] Ta kammala karatu tare da difloma mafi girma a fannin Beauty Therapy daga Jami'ar St. Thomas Texas, Houston.

An haifi Skefu a ranar 14 ga Afrilu 1964 a Botswana kuma ya koma Soweto, Gauteng . [1] Daga baya ta girma a Bloemfontein tare da kakanninta da Lesotho . [2] kammala karatu tare da difloma mafi girma a cikin Beauty Therapy daga Jami'ar St. Thomas Texas, Houston . [1]

items.sourceText: Participation in labour unionism started while working at OK chain stores early 1990s, rising to become the chairperson for the Commercial Workers' Union of Zimbabwe.[1]

targets.targetText: Kasancewa cikin ƙungiyar kwadago ta fara ne yayin aiki a shagunan OK a farkon shekarun 1990, ya tashi ya zama shugaban kungiyar ma'aikatan kasuwanci ta Zimbabwe.[1]
Shigarta cikin ƙungiyar kwadago ta fara ne a lokacin da take aiki a shagunan OK a farkon shekarun 1990, ta samu daukaka ta zama shugaban kungiyar ma'aikatan kasuwanci ta Zimbabwe.[1]

items.sourceText: In February 2011, the price of Bitcoin rose to US$1.06, then fell to US$0.67 that April. This spike was encouraged by several Slashdot posts about it.[1] In June 2011, Bitcoin's price again rose, to US$29.58. This came after attention from a Gawker article about the dark web market Silk Road. The price then fell to US$2.14 that November.[1]

targets.targetText: A watan Fabrairun 2011, farashin Bitcoin ya tashi zuwa US$1.06 , sannan ya fadi zuwa US$0.67 bayan Afrilu. Wannan karu ya sami kwarin gwiwa daga rubuce-rubucen Slashdot da yawa game da shi. [1] A watan Yuni 2011, farashin Bitcoin ya sake tashi, zuwa US$29.58 . Wannan ya zo ne bayan jan hankali daga labarin Gawker game da kasuwar siliki(silk).Farashin daga nan ya faɗi zuwa US$2.14 a waccan Nuwamba. [1]

A watan Fabrairun 2011, farashin Bitcoin ya tashi zuwa US$ , sannan ya fadi zuwa US$ waccan Afrilu. Wannan karu ya sami kwarin gwiwa daga rubuce-rubucen Slashdot da yawa game da shi. [1] A watan Yuni 2011, farashin Bitcoin ya sake tashi, zuwa US$ . Wannan ya zo ne bayan hankali daga labarin Gawker game da kasuwar siliki mai duhu. Farashin daga nan ya faɗi zuwa US$ a waccan Nuwamba. [1]

items.sourceText: Chraime (Arabic: حرايمي haraime, Hebrew: חריימה) is a spicy fish stew with tomatoes from Northern Africa. The name of the dish comes from the Arabic word for "hot".[1][2]

targets.targetText: Chraime (Arabic حرايمي haraime, Hebrew חריימה) wani irin kifi ne mai yaji da ake haɗa shi tare da tumatir daga Arewacin Afirka. Sunan tasa ya fito daga kalmar Larabci "zafi". [1] [2]

items.sourceText: Rogerio has covered a variety of stories both at home and abroad, including the Lusaka Protocol and the 2018 DRC general election.[1][2] She has written for Jornal de Angola and Rede Angola.[6]

targets.targetText: Rogerio ta ba da labarai iri-iri na gida da waje, ciki har da yarjejeniyar Lusaka da babban zaɓe na shekarar 2018 DRC. [1] [2] Ta rubuta Jornal de Angola da Rede Angola. [3]

items.sourceText: Azami then reviewed his work and made minor modifications resulting in the second and final edition that was published by Maktaba bayt al-Salam, Dar Ibn Bashir (دار ابن بشیر) in Pakistan in 19 volumes. This is the used (mu'tamad) edition representing the author's settled views.

targets.targetText: Azami daga nan ya sake nazarin aikinsa kuma ya yi ƙananan gyare-gyare wanda ya haifar da bugu na biyu da na ƙarshe wanda Maktaba bayt al-Salam, Dar Ibn Bashir (دار ابن بشیر) ya buga a Pakistan a cikin kundin 19. Wannan shi ne amfani (mu'tamad) edition wakiltar da marubucin ya amince da shi.

Wannan shi ne amfani da (mu'tamad) wakiltar abin da marubucin ya amince da shi.

items.sourceText: She is married to Professor Nelson Ochekpe from Otukpo Local Government in Benue State. He is a professor of Pharmaceutical Chemistry and Deputy Vice Chancellor[3] at the University of Jos.

targets.targetText: Ta kasance tana auran Farfesa Nelson Ochekpe daga Otukpo karamar a Jihar Binuwai . Shi farfesa ne a fannin kimiyyar harhada magunguna kuma Mataimakin Shugaban Jami’a [1] a Jami’ar Jos .
Ta aka aure su, Farfesa Nelson Ochekpe daga Otukpo karamar a Jihar Binuwai . Shi farfesa ne a fannin kimiyyar harhada magunguna da kuma Mataimakin Mataimakin Shugaban Jami’a [1] a Jami’ar Jos .

items.sourceText: On 6 July 2001 she officially became a Spanish citizen and she won the gold medal at the 2002 European Athletics Championships the year after.

items.sourceText: The Afemai, also spelled Afenmai, are an ethnic group living in the northern part of Edo State south geopolitical zone of Nigeria.

targets.targetText: A Afemai, kuma rattaba kalma Afenmai, ne wata kabila da suke zaune a arewacin jihar Edo kudu geopolitical sashi na Najeriya .

items.sourceText: In the mid-1990s and 2010s he appeared as the "Yebo Gogo man" in a number television advertisements for Vodacom mobile phones.[1][8]

targets.targetText: A cikin tsakiyar 1990s da 2010 ya bayyana a matsayin "Yebo Gogo man" a cikin tallace-tallace na talabijin mai lamba na Vodacom wayoyin hannu . [1] [2]
A cikin tsakiyar 1990s da 2010 ya bayyana a matsayin "Yebo Gogo man" a cikin tallace-tallace na talabijin na kamfanin wayoyin hannu watau Vodacom. [1] [2]

items.sourceText: Busia is the daughter of Kofi Abrefa Busia, who was prime minister of the Republic of Ghana (from 1969 to 1972)[3] and a prince of the royal family of Wenchi,[4] a subgroup of the Ashanti, making Akosua a princess too.[citation needed] Her sister, Abena Busia, is a poet and academic, who was a professor in English at Rutgers University,[5] and since 2017 has been the Ghanaian ambassador to Brazil.

targets.targetText: Busia 'yar Kofi Abrefa Busia ce, wanda ya kasance firayim minista na Jamhuriyar Ghana (daga 1969 zuwa 1972) [1] kuma basarake na gidan sarauta na Wenchi, [2] wani rukuni na Ashanti, wanda ya sa Akosua ta zama gimbiya. kuma. 'Yar Busia, mawaƙi ne kuma malami, wanda farfesa ne a Turanci a Jami'ar Rutgers, [3] kuma tun 2017 ya kasance jakadan Ghana a Brazil .

Busia 'yar Kofi Abrefa Busia ce, wanda ya kasance firayim minista na Jamhuriyar Ghana (daga 1969 zuwa 1972)[1] kuma basarake na gidan sarauta na Wenchi,[2] wani rukuni na Ashanti, wanda ya sa Akosua ta zama gimbiya. 'Yar uwarta, Abena Busia, mawakiya ce kuma malami, wacce farfesa ce a Turanci a Jami'ar Rutgers,[3] kuma tun 2017 ta kasance jakadan Ghana a Brazil.

items.sourceText: On 16 July 1973, he was created a life peer as Baron Allan of Kilmahew, of Cardross in the County of Dunbartonshire.[4]

A ranar 16 ga watan Yulin 1973, an bashi matsayin Baron Allan na Kilmahew, na Cardross a cikin gundumar Dunbartonshire . [1]

items.sourceText: Adão played his first international game for Angola on 5 March 2014, in a 1–1 draw against Mozambique.[4] He was part of the starting lineup and played the entire match.[4]

targets.targetText: Adão ya buga wasansa na farko na kasa da kasa a Angola a ranar 5 ga Maris 2014, a wasan da suka tashi – da Mozambique . [1] Yana cikin rukunin farawa kuma ya buga wasan gaba daya. [1]

items.sourceText: In 2014, Colley signed for Bradford (Park Avenue) in the English sixth division after playing for English eighth division club Harrogate Railway Athletic.

targets.targetText: A cikin shekarar 2014, Colley ya rattaba hannu a kulob ɗin Bradford (Park Avenue) a cikin rukuni na shida na Ingilishi bayan ya taka leda a kulob din Ingila na takwas na Harrogate Railway Athletic.
A cikin 2014, Colley ya rattaba hannu kan Bradford (Park Avenue) a cikin rukuni na shida na Ingilishi bayan ya taka leda a kulob din Ingila na takwas na Harrogate Railway Athletic .

items.sourceText: Berihu Aregawi was the bronze medalist in the 10,000 metres at the 2018 World U20 Championships in Tampere behind Rhonex Kipruto and Jacob Kiplimo.[2] He won the 3000 metres race at the African Youth Games that year. He then went to Argentina for the Summer Youth Olympics held in Buenos Aires and placed second in the combined 3000 m event.[2]

targets.targetText: Berihu Aregawi shi ne ya lashe lambar tagulla a tseren mita 10,000 a gasar cin kofin duniya ta 'yan kasa da shekaru 20 na shekarar 2018 a Tampere bayan Rhonex Kipruto da Jacob Kiplimo. [1] [2] Ya lashe tseren mita 3000 a gasar matasan Afirka a waccan shekarar. Daga nan ya je Argentina don gasar Olympics ta matasa ta bazara da aka gudanar a Buenos Aires kuma ya zo na biyu a cikin tseren 3000 m. [3]

[1] Ya lashe tseren mita 3000 a gasar matasan Afirka a waccan shekarar. Daga nan ya je Argentina don gasar Olympics ta matasa ta bazara da aka gudanar a Buenos Aires kuma ya sanya na biyu a cikin 3000 hade. m taron . [2]

items.sourceText: After taking his seat in the Senate he was appointed to committees on Selection, Senate Services, Power & Steel, Agriculture, Water Resources and Drug & Narcotics.[2]

items.sourceText: Moundounga has made several appearances for the Gabon national football team. He played for the side the finished third at the 2005 CEMAC Cup.[2]

items.sourceText: Albert Tokinirina Rafetraniaina (born 9 September 1996) is a Malagasy professional footballer who plays as a defender or defensive midfielder.

items.sourceText: Borges made his international debut in August 2009, receiving a call-up for games against Angola and Malta.[2] Borges earned a third cap in May 2010, in a 0-0 draw with Portugal.[3]

targets.targetText: Borges ya fara buga wasansa na farko a duniya a watan Agustan 2009, ya karbi kiran wasanni da Angola da Malta.[1] [2] Borges ya samu fitowa a karo na uku a watan Mayun 2010, a wasan da suka tashi 0-0 da Portugal.[3] [4]

items.sourceText: Reis received his first cap for Cape Verde national team at the friendly match against Luxembourg on 27 May 2008.

items.sourceText: Hope was born and raised up in a family near Mombasa. She was the first in her family to attend university to pursue her higher studies.[3] She completed her Bachelor's degree in Aquatic sciences from the Egerton University in 2010. In 2013, she graduated in Environmental sciences from the UNESCO-IHE which is situated in Netherlands.[3]

targets.targetText: An haifi bege kuma ya tashi a cikin dangi kusa da Mombasa . Ita ce ta farko a gidanta da ta shiga jami'a don ci gaba da karatun ta. [1] Ta kammala digirinta na farko a fannin kimiyyar ruwa daga jami'ar Egerton a shekarar 2010. A cikin 2013, ta sauke karatu a Kimiyyar Muhalli daga UNESCO-IHE wanda ke cikin Netherlands . [1]

An haifi Hope kuma ta tashi a cikin dangi kusa da Mombasa. Ita ce ta farko a gidanta da ta shiga jami'a don ci gaba da karatun ta.[1] [2] Ta kammala digirinta na farko a fannin kimiyyar ruwa daga jami'ar Egerton a shekarar 2010. A cikin 2013, ta kammala karatu a Kimiyyar Muhalli daga UNESCO-IHE wanda ke cikin Netherlands.[3] [2]

items.sourceText: Mama Colonel (French: Maman Colonelle) is a documentary film from Democratic Republic of the Congo, directed by Dieudo Hamadi.[1] The film focuses on the work of Colonel Honorine Munyole who, fights against sexual abuse and child abuse.[2]

items.sourceText: Her second feature film told the story of a family during the Second Congo War. It was announced under the title Zaïria in 2019.[12][13] Yet due to the worldwide COVID-19 pandemic all her projects came then to a halt and contacts to some production partners faded away.[14]

items.sourceText: Spicer benefited from the growth of independent production companies in Zimbabwe between 1980 and 1995.[3] Her documentaries have received funding from international donors and the Catholic Commission for Justice and Peace in Zimbabwe.[4]

items.sourceText: Tahani Rached is a Canadian-Egyptian documentary filmmaker. She is best known for her work Four Women of Egypt. She has directed more than 20 documentary films in her career.[1]

items.sourceText: Batma was a founding member of Nass El Ghiwane. He was a vocalist and percussionist for the group until his death in 1997. He was considered the architect of the group.[1]

items.sourceText: Obaseki was born on 19 March 1986 in Benin City, Oredo Local Government Area, Edo State where she grew up. She is the youngest of seven children.[2][3]

items.sourceText: Thahane was born in Orlando East to Trevor Thamsanqa Tutu and Nomaswazi Mamakoko.[4] She is the granddaughter of Archbishop Desmond Tutu.[5] She moved to Cape Town where she attended Milnerton High School.[6] She went on to graduate with a degree in accounting from the University of the Witwatersrand. In 2018, she completed a 1-Year Conservatory program in Acting for Film at the New York Film Academy in Manhattan.[7]

[1] [3] koma Cape Town inda ta halarci Makarantar Sakandare ta Milnerton . [1] Ta ci gaba da kammala karatu tare da digiri a lissafi daga Jami'ar Witwatersrand . [4] cikin 2018, ta kammala shirin Conservatory na shekara 1 a cikin Acting for Film a Kwalejin Fim ta New York a Manhattan . [1]

items.sourceText: Her second husband was Abu Ruhm ibn Abd al-Uzza from the Amir ibn Luayy clan of the Quraysh. Their son was named Abu Sabra.[4] Barra died a believer of one God; Allah. Her husband went on to marry Maymunah bint al-Harith, who later married Muhammad.

items.sourceText: After her studies, she was a lecturer at the University Paris, where she supported a thesis in 2003 entitled "The Conception of the Person in the Philosophy of John Rawls: Trial of Reconstruction of the Theory of Justice as Equity," in front of a jury chaired by Emmanuel Picavet, and also including Catherine Audard and Monique Canto-Sperber.[1][2] Next, she conducted postdoctoral research at the University of Louvain-la-Neuve and, in 2005, returned to teach in Tunisia. She was a professor at the Faculty of Humanities and Social Sciences in Tunis.

items.sourceText: Rights are widely regarded as the basis of law, but what if laws are bad? Some theorists suggest civil disobedience is, itself, a right, and it was advocated by thinkers such as Henry David Thoreau, Martin Luther King Jr., and Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi.

items.sourceText: He debuted professionally for Auxerre's first team in 1993.[1] During his illustrious 21-year career he also played for Real Oviedo, Vitória de Guimarães, Skoda Xanthi and Stade Tamponnaise.

targets.targetText: Ya yi muhawara da fasaha don ƙungiyar farko ta Auxerre a cikin 1993. [1] A lokacin aikinsa na shekaru 21 mai ban mamaki ya kuma taka leda a Real Oviedo, Vitória de Guimarães, Skoda Xanthi da Stade Tamponnaise .

Ya fara wasan sa na farko a ƙungiyar ƙwallon ƙafa ta Auxerre a cikin shekarar 1993. [1] A lokacin aikinsa na shekaru 21 mai ban mamaki ya kuma taka leda a Real Oviedo, Vitória de Guimarães, Skoda Xanthi da Stade Tamponnaise.

items.sourceText: Pointe Vele Airport (IATA: FUT, ICAO: NLWF) is an airport serving Futuna Island in the French overseas territory of Wallis and Futuna.[1] The airport is located 10 kilometres (6 mi) east of Leava.[1]

targets.targetText: Filin jirgin sama na Pointe Vele ( filin jirgin sama ne mai hidimar Tsibirin Futuna a yankin Wallis da Futuna na Faransa na ketare . [1] Filin jirgin saman yana da nisan 10 kilometres (6 mi) gabas da Leava . [1]

Filin jirgin sama na Pointe Vele (IATA: FUT, ICAO: NLWF) filin jirgin sama ne mai hidima a Tsibirin Futuna a yankin Wallis da Futuna na Faransa na ketare. [1] Filin jirgin saman yana da nisan kilomita 10 kilometres (6 mi) gabas da Leava. [1]

items.sourceText: Nkonya is a Guang language spoken by the people of Nkonya in the Biakoye District of the Oti Region of Ghana. A phonology[2] and a dictionary are available.[3]

targets.targetText: Nkonya yaren Guang ne da mutanen Nkonya ke magana da shi a gundumar Biakoye a yankin Oti na ƙasar Ghana . Akwai ƙamus [1] a cikin harshen. [2]
Nkonya yaren Guang ne da mutanen Nkonya ke magana da shi a gundumar Biakoye a yankin Oti na Ghana . Akwai ƙamus [1] da ƙamus. [2]

items.sourceText: Following the sale of the rights to film producer Ross Garland, the film Spud - the Movie was shot between March and April 2010, and released on 3 December 2010. Van der Ruit portrays the teacher, Mr Lennox, in a cameo role.

targets.targetText: Bayan sayar da haƙƙin haƙƙin mai shirya fim Ross Garland, an harbe fim ɗin Spud - Fim ɗin tsakanin Maris da Afrilu 2010, kuma an sake shi a ranar 3 ga Disamba 2010. Van der Ruit ya kwatanta malamin, Mista Lennox, a cikin rawar taho.

Bayan sayar da haƙƙin mai shirya fim Ross Garland, an nuna fim ɗin Spud a tsakanin watan Maris da Afrilu 2010, kuma an sake shi a ranar 3 ga watan Disamba 2010. Van der Ruit ya kwatanta malamin, Mista Lennox, a cikin rawar taho.

items.sourceText: Gelanesh Haddis (1896 – 1986) was a teacher and scholar in the Ethiopian Orthodox Church. She was known for her skill with the complex Ethiopian style of poetry called qene.

targets.targetText: Gelanesh Haddis (1896 - 1986) malama ce kuma mai koyarwa a Cocin Orthodox na Habasha.   An san ta da ƙwarewarta tare da wani nau'i na waka mai wahala da ake kira qene .
Gelanesh Haddis (1896 - 1986) malami ne kuma malami a Cocin Orthodox na Habasha .   An san ta da ƙwarewarta tare da rikitarwa na Habasha na waka da ake kira qene .

items.sourceText: Saloma became the third wife of the multi-talented film actor, director, singer, songwriter, composer and producer Tan Sri Datuk Amar P. Ramlee after their marriage in 1961.

targets.targetText: Saloma ta zama mata ta uku na dan wasan fina-finai, darekta, marubucin waƙa, mawaki, kuma mai gabatarwa Tan Sri Datuk Amar P. Ramlee bayan aurensu a shekarar 1961.
Saloma ta zama matar ta uku a wasan fina-finai da yawa, darekta, mawaƙa, mawaki, mawaki kuma mai gabatarwa Tan Sri Datuk Amar P. Ramlee bayan aurensu a shekarar 1961.

items.sourceText: Angela Freeman Miri is a Nigerian Professor who became the Vice Chancellor of Federal University, Lokoja in 2017. She is a professor of English and a published poet also.[citation needed]

targets.targetText: Angela Freeman Miri farfesa ce ta Najeriya wacce ta zama mataimakiyar shugabar jami'ar tarayya ta Lokoja a shekarar 2017. Ita farfesa ce a Turanci kuma mawaƙin da aka buga kuma.
Angela Freeman Miri farfesa ce ta Najeriya wacce takuma taba zama mataimakiyar shugabar jami'ar tarayya ta Lokoja a shekarar 2017. Ita farfesa ce a ta harshen turanci kuma marubuciyar waka.

items.sourceText: The architecture was designed by John Elliott.[citation needed] It was established by decree to fulfill this traditional mandate, its motto "Knowledge for Service".[4]

targets.targetText: John Elliott ne ya tsara gine-ginen jami'ar.  An kafa ta ne bisa doka don cika wannan umarni na gargajiya, taken jami'ar shi ne, "Ilimi don yin Hidima". [1]
John Elliott ne ya tsara gine-ginen.  ne bisa doka don cika wannan umarni na gargajiya, takensa "Ilimi don Hidima". [1]

items.sourceText: Djibril was called up to the Togo national team in March 2022.[3] He did not make his debut for his nation at that time.

targets.targetText: An kira Djibril zuwa tawagar kasar Togo a watan Maris 2022. [1] Bai fara fara wa al'ummarsa ba a lokacin.
An kira Djibril zuwa tawagar kasar Togo a watan Maris 2022. [1][2] Bai fara yiwa kasar sa wasa ba a lokacin.

items.sourceText: According to researcher Hoda Gamal, she is credited with establishing the tradition of setting up voluntary iftars for male fuqaha.[5]

targets.targetText: A cewar mai bincike Hoda Gamal, an girmama ta Saboda kafa al'adar buda baki da ta yi na malaman fiqhu maza . [1]
A cewar mai bincike Hoda Gamal, an ba ta ne wajen kafa al'adar kafa buda baki na son rai ga maza fukaha. [1]

items.sourceText: The people of Afaha Atai primarily engage in farming and cultivating of Palm Tree, Yams, Cassava and Palm Wine. They speak Ekid.

targets.targetText: Mutanen Afaha Atai da farko suna yin noma da noman Dabino, Dawa, Rogo da Dabino . Suna magana Ekid .
Mutanen Afaha Atai da farko suna yin noma da noman kwakwar manja, Dawa, Rogo da giyar kwakwa. Suna magana harshen Ekid .

items.sourceText: Christine Ouinsavi was a member of the government of Dr. Boni Yayi. She handled the portfolio of the ministry in charge of Primary Education, Literacy and National languages of Benin.[1]

targets.targetText: Christine Ouinsavi ta kasance memba a gwamnatin Dr. Boni Yayi. Ta riƙe ma'aikatar da ke kula da Ilimin Firamare, Karatu da Harsuna na ƙasar Benin. [1]
Christine Ouinsavi ne adam wata ya kasance memba a gwamnatin Dr. Boni Yayi . Ta rike ma'aikatar da ke kula da Ilimin Firamare, Karatu da Harsuna na kasar Benin. [1]

items.sourceText: The film was shot on 16 mm film with the participation of the inhabitants of the village of Keur Haly Sarrata.

targets.targetText: An harbe fim din akan fim din 16 mm tare da halartar mazauna ƙauyen Keur Haly Sarrata.
An dauki shirin fim din akan 16 mm film tare da halartar mazauna ƙauyen Keur Haly Sarrata.

items.sourceText: From 1998 to 2006, Among worked at Centenary Bank, one of the large commercial banks in the country. At the time she left in 2006, she had risen to the rank of branch manager. For the ten years prior to her election to Parliament, she served as a lecturer in accounting, at Makerere University Business School and Kampala International University.[1]

targets.targetText: Daga 1998 zuwa 2006, Daga cikin aiki a Centenary Bank, daya daga cikin manyan bankunan kasuwanci a kasar. A lokacin da ta tafi a shekara ta 2006, ta kai matsayin mai kula da reshe. Shekaru goma kafin zabenta Majalisar, ta yi aiki a matsayin malami a fannin lissafin kudi, a Makarantar Kasuwanci ta Jami'ar Makerere da Jami'ar Kampala International University. [1]

Daga shekarun 1998 zuwa 2006, Among tayi aiki a Centenary Bank, ɗaya daga cikin manyan bankunan kasuwanci a ƙasar. A lokacin da ta tafi a shekara ta 2006, ta kai matsayin mai kula da reshe. Shekaru goma kafin zaɓen ta a Majalisar, ta yi aiki a matsayin malama a fannin lissafin kuɗi, a Makarantar Kasuwanci ta Jami'ar Makerere da Jami'ar Kampala International University. [1]

items.sourceText: Before the 2021–22 season, he moved to Sète.[3] On 10 January 2022, he signed for Fleury in the Championnat National 2.[4]

targets.targetText: Kafin lokacin 2021–22, ya koma Sète. [1][2] A ranar 10 ga watan Janairu 2022, ya sanya hannu a kungiyar Fleury a cikin Championnat National 2.[3] [4]
Kafin lokacin 2021–22, ya koma Sète . [1] A ranar 10 ga Janairu 2022, ya sanya hannu don Fleury a cikin Championnat National 2 . [2]

items.sourceText: Major General Onwuamaegbu is the son of Obumneme G. Onwuamaegbu, who was the attorney general of East Central State and the nephew of journalist Joseph Egemonye.

targets.targetText: Manjo Janar Onwuamaegbu ɗa ne ga Obumneme G. Onwuamaegbu, wanda shi ne babban lauyan gwamnatin jihar ta Gabas ta tsakiya kuma ɗan, ɗan jarida Joseph Egemonye.
Manjo Janar Onwuamaegbu da ne ga Obumneme G. Onwuamaegbu, wanda shi ne babban lauyan gwamnatin jihar ta Gabas ta tsakiya kuma dan dan jarida Joseph Egemonye .

items.sourceText: In 2021, the gallery opened a location in Los Angeles, California. It is the first African gallery to open in Los Angeles.[2][3]

targets.targetText: A cikin 2021, hoton ya buɗe wuri a Los Angeles, California. Ita ce taswirar Afirka ta farko da aka buɗe a Los Angeles. [1] [2]
A cikin shekarar 2021, Gallery ɗin ya buɗe wani wuri a Los Angeles, California. Ita ce taswirar Afirka ta farko da aka buɗe a Los Angeles.[1] [2] [3] [4]

items.sourceText: The university's current president is Dr. Margee Ensign, preceded by Dr. David Huwiler, Dr. Michael Smith, Dr. Margee Ensign, Dr. Dawn Dekle.

targets.targetText: Shugaban jami'ar na yanzu shine Dr. Margee Ensign, wanda Dr. David Huwiler, Dr. Michael Smith, Dr. Margee Ensign, Dr. Dawn Dekle .
Shugaban jami'ar na yanzu shine Dr. Margee Ensign, magabatansa sune Dr. David Huwiler, Dr. Michael Smith, Dr. Margee Ensign, Dr. Dawn Dekle .

items.sourceText: Chiamaka Favour Ojukwu (born 13 November 1995) better known as Honey Ojukwu or Honey, is a Nigerian On-Air Personality and Writer.[1][2]

targets.targetText: Chiamaka Favour Ojukwu (an haife ta 13 Nuwamba 1995) wanda aka fi sani da Honey Ojukwu ko Honey, ma'aikaciyar Sadarwa ce ƴar Nijeriya kuma Marubuciya. [1] [2]
Chiamaka Favour Ojukwu (an haife shi 13 Nuwamba Nuwamba 1995) wanda aka fi sani da Honey Ojukwu ko Honey, , abi'ar Jirgin Sama ne ta Nijeriya kuma Marubuciya. [1] [2]

items.sourceText: On 8 March 2022 in Sabaka, bandits ambushed and killed at least 62 members of volunteer vigilante group Yan Sa Kai in Kebbi.[1][2]

targets.targetText: A ranar 8 ga Maris, 2022 a garin Sabaka, ‘yan bindiga sun yi wa ‘ yan banga ‘Yan Sa Kai kwanton bauna 62 kwanton bauna a Kebbi. [1] [2]
A ranar 8 ga Maris, 2022 a garin Sabaka, ‘yan bindiga sun yi wa ‘ yan banga (ƴan Sa Kai) kwanton bauna suka kashe mutane 62 daga cikin ƴan bangar a Kebbi. [1] [2]

items.sourceText: Soleils is a 2013 French-Burkinabé road movie about the way in which the history of Africa has been written, especially in relationship to European colonialism.

targets.targetText: Soleils fim ne na hanyar 2013 na Faransa da Burkinabé game da yadda aka rubuta tarihin Afirka, musamman dangane da mulkin mallaka na Turai .
Soleils fim ne na shekarar 2013 na Faransa da Burkina Faso game da yadda aka rubuta tarihin Afirka, musamman dangane da mulkin mallaka na Turai.

items.sourceText: He is the founder of the Reguibat, the largest and most powerful Sahrawi tribe, whose areas extended from Western Sahara into modern-day Mauritania, Morocco and Algeria.

targets.targetText: Shi ne wanda ya assasa Reguibat, kabila mafi girma da iko kan Ƙabilar Sahrawi, wanda yankunanta suka kai daga Yammacin Sahara zuwa Mauritania na zamani, Morocco da Aljeriya.
Shi ne wanda ya kafa Reguibat, mafi girma Ruwa mafi iko Ƙabilar Sahrawi, wanda yankunanta suka kai daga Yammacin Sahara zuwa Mauritania na zamani, Morocco da Aljeriya.

items.sourceText: In 2012, The Hardkiss were nominated for the MTV Europe Music Award for Best Ukrainian Act.[9] The band performed at MIDEM festival on 29 January.[10][11]

targets.targetText: A cikin 2012, The Hardkiss an zabi ga MTV Turai Music Award for Best Ukrainian Dokar . [1] Ƙungiyar ta yi a bikin MIDEM a ranar 29 ga Janairu. [2] [3]
A cikin 2012, an zabi Hardkiss don kyautar MTV Europe Music Award for Best Ukrainian Act. [1] Ƙungiyar ta yi wasa a bikin MIDEM na ranar 29 ga Janairu. [2] [3]

items.sourceText: Peace Uko (born 26 December 1995) is a Nigerian track and field sprinter who specialises in the 100 metres.[1] She won the 100 m at the 18th Nigerian National Sports Festival.[2]

targets.targetText: Aminci Uko (haife 26 Disamba 1995) ne a Nijeriya hanya da kuma filin tseren wanda ya ƙware a tseren mita 100 . [1] Ta lashe tseren mita 100 a bikin Wasannin Kasa na Najeriya karo na 18. [2]
Aminci Uko (an haifeta 26 Disamba 1995) ƴar wasan tsere ce a Nijeriya wanda ta ƙware a tseren mita 100 . [1] Ta lashe tseren mita 100 a bikin Wasannin Ƙasa na Najeriya karo na 18. [2]
